programme.title: Wildest Africa: Mount Kenya: African Heart of Ice
programme.sub-title: Mount Kenya: African Heart of Ice
programme.desc: Mount Kenya soars over 5km into the air. It is the second highest mountain in Africa. At its summit, temperatures fluctuate from over 30 degrees celsius to below freezing.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Cape Coast: Where Worlds Colide
programme.desc: Watch Africa's Cape Coast that goes from the frigid waters of Cape Point to the sub-tropic seas of Kwazulu-Natal.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Congo: the Untamed Heart
programme.desc: Known for centuries as Africa's Dark Heart, the Congo is a multi-layered, three-dimensional world, seething with innumerable species. By peeling back the layers, we discover how this vast rainforest works, and expose the hidden lives of its inhabitants.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Sahara: Life on the Edge
programme.desc: Watch Africa's Cape Coast that goes from the frigid waters of Cape Point to the sub-tropic seas of Kwazulu-Natal./After, see Africa's Dark Heart in the Congo which is seething with innumerable species./Last,learn about the largest desert in the world.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Lake Turkana: Land of the Crocodile
programme.sub-title: Lake Turkana: Land of the Crocodile
programme.desc: The largest of Africa's Rift valley lakes, Lake Turkana is at the heart of one of the harshest landscapes on the planet. Despite its hostile environment, man and beast have both worked out a way to survive.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Ethiopia: Land of Extremes
programme.desc: Landlocked and surrounded by five countries, Ethiopia is one of east Africa's forgotten lands. Seemingly passive deserts in fact seethe with fire, and cloud-piercing peaks shield a secret Eden of canyons and cliff-tops teeming with life.

programme.title: Austin Stevens' Adventures: Giant Python Invader
programme.desc: The Burmese python is not a native species to the swamplands of Florida. Austin is on the search to relocate one of these reptilian giants to a new home.

programme.title: Austin Stevens' Adventures: Night of the Hyena
programme.desc: Austin explores the rugged landscape of Ethiopia in search of the notorious spotted hyena. He goes as far as to setting up his camcorder in a hyena den, in order to get the best shot.

programme.title: Austin Stevens' Adventures: The Last Serpent
programme.desc: Austin travels to Mexico to catch a glimpse of the Tzabcan rattlesnake, which was once hailed as a god by the ancient Mayans. With the help of local guides and a shaman, he braves underground rivers and dense rainforest in search of the snake.

programme.title: Austin Stevens' Adventures: Australia's Lost Eden
programme.desc: Austin heads to the barren landscape of northern Australia, searching for some of the world's most dangerous reptiles. He battles harsh terrain, high temperatures and monsoons in a bid to photograph the indigenous snakes and lizards.

programme.title: Austin Stevens' Adventures: In the Shadow of Armored Giants
programme.sub-title: In the Shadow of Armored Giants
programme.desc: Austin Stevens travels to Swaziland in search of the rare black rhino. After a number of close and dangerous encounters, Austin finally finds what he is looking for.

programme.title: Austin Stevens' Adventures: Man-Eating Leopards
programme.desc: Austin traverses South Africa in search of one of the Big Five, and one of the most swift killers on the continent. After much tracking, he finally lucks out and comes upon a fresh kill. Now all he has to do is wait.

programme.title: Austin Stevens' Adventures: Grizzly Bear Stakeout
programme.desc: Austin searches for Grizzly Bears in the forests of Western Canada. Unlike the snake, and creature he is most comfortable with, Austin is helpless to control these mighty animals if they decide to turn him into a meal.

programme.title: Austin Stevens' Adventures: Elephant Charge
programme.desc: Austin heads to Sri Lanka to photograph the rare tusked Asian Elephant. These creatures are primarily docile, but when Austin encroaches on their turf, he gets a truck-sized run for his money.

channel.desc: Science lovers, Nature and History buffs: this is your channel! Voyager Documentaries takes you into Earth’s wildest corners, the forbidding realms of deep space, and the dramatic turning points of history.

programme.title: Bachelorette
programme.desc: On the night before an old friend's wedding, three frisky bridesmaids go searching for a little fun but find much more than they bargained for.

programme.title: Left Behind

programme.title: After Life

programme.title: Nobel Son
programme.desc: On the eve of Barkley Michaelson's father receiving the Nobel Prize, Barkley is kidnapped and the requested ransom is the $2,000,000 in Nobel Prize money.

programme.title: My All American

programme.title: Playing for Keeps
programme.desc: George is a retired soccer pro whose glory days are behind him. Burnt out on his playboy lifestyle and bankrupted by a string of bad investments, he moves back to Virginia to reconnect with his estranged ex-wife and neglected son.

programme.title: Left Behind
programme.desc: A small group of survivors are left behind after millions of people suddenly vanish and the world is plunged into chaos and destruction.

channel.desc: Movie lovers' one-stop shop for all things motion pictures. Sit back and escape into edgy indies, illuminating documentaries, chilling thrillers, raucous comedies, and touching dramas.

programme.title: The Crawling Eye

programme.title: The Violent Years

programme.title: Ring of Terror
programme.desc: A medical student (played by George B. Mather) is tormented by a frat-house hazing after being asked to remove a ring from the finger of a corpse.

programme.title: Code Name: Diamond Head

programme.title: Swamp Diamonds

programme.desc: This episode includes: Emery's Last Stand, Hansen Twin Murder (Pts. 1 & 2), Pix Of The Dead, Fatal Obsession and Baseball Amnesia.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Dennis Farina
programme.desc: This episode includes: DJ Death, Bonnie Craig, Update: Lost Gause, Silicon Valley Hit, Fallon Illnesses and Sweetheart Swindler.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Dennis Farina
programme.desc: This episode includes: Tara! Tara! Tara!, Hairy Escape, Spooks, Over the Edge and Black and Blue.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries
programme.desc: This episode includes: Chameleon & UD, Lost For Life, Smitty & UD and Samuel's Ghost.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries: Episode: 14
programme.desc: This episode includes: Point Blank, Searcher's Son, Update: Witch Hunt, Nashville Hit and Silent Testimony.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Dennis Farina
programme.desc: This episode includes: Death by Drowning, Thanks Captain Sharp, Pigtail Fugitive, Two Strikes, Direct Contact and Update: Badlands.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Dennis Farina: Episode: 15
programme.desc: This episode includes: Two for the Road, Boston Healer, Niqui Bride, Bad Dad, Update: Baby Broker and Amazon Women.

channel.desc: Watch classic episodes of Unsolved Mysteries on this eerie channel, Who knows? Perhaps YOU can help solve a mystery...

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 69
programme.desc: Myths tested: Is anti-gravity possible? Can too many lights on a Christmas tree cause it to light on fire? Can vodka help to ease the pain of a jellyfish sting?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 70
programme.desc: Myths tested: Can a bullet travel through a sniper's scope and kill him? Can a fired bullet lodge in the chamber of a revolver? Can two colliding bullets fuse in mid air?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 71
programme.desc: Myths tested: Is it possible to survive a 22,000-foot fall using the blast from a 1,000-pound bomb to break the fall? Is electricity saved by switching off the lights when leaving a room?

programme.title: Mythbusters Pirate Special
programme.desc: Myths tested: Can a person jab a knife in a boat's sail, ride down the sail and land safely on the deck? Does an eyepatch help someone see in the dark?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 82
programme.desc: Myths tested: Was the Hindenburg disaster actually caused by the doping compound with which the LZ 129 Hindenburg was painted? Can running in a zig-zag line save a person from a crocodile?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 83
programme.desc: Myths tested: How can someone escape from a sinking car? Can paper be folded in half more than seven times?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 84
programme.desc: Myths tested: Is it possible to beat a speed-tracking camera? Can a defibrillator cause nitroglycerin patches to explode?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 85
programme.desc: Myths tested: Is there any way to prevent a bloodhound from tracking one's scent? Is it possible to get past a guard dog? Can an old dog be taught new tricks?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 86
programme.desc: Every so often, the MythBusters draw conclusions that leave the fans seething. It’s time for the MythBusters to put more of their most contentious outcomes under the microscope.

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 87
programme.desc: Myths tested: Can a human voice extinguish a flame? Can hypnotists plant suggestions in unwilling patients? Can hypnosis help bring back dormant memories?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 88
programme.desc: Myths tested: Do birds flying in a trailer cause the trailer to become lighter? Will a boat crashing into a channel marker cleave itself in half?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 89
programme.desc: Myths tested: Is it possible to walk on water? Can a speeding arrow be snatched out of the air? Can a sword be stopped with one's bare hands?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 90
programme.desc: Myths tested: Can someone's hat be shot off? Is it possible to break someone out of jail with horses? Can an airbag turn a lock-pick into a lethal spear?

channel.desc: MythBusters explodes onto the screen, bringing with it two Hollywood special effects experts Jamie Hyneman and Adam Savage & attempt to debunk urban legends. Expect science, experiments, explosions & disasters!

programme.title: The FBI Files: Hired Gun
programme.desc: When three people were found murdered in their home, it appeared like a burglary gone awry. But a crime this horrific deserved a closer look.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Hunter's Game
programme.desc: In the 1970's and 80s, people went to Alaska looking for a fresh start, to reinvent themselves, or to disappear for a while. Some of those disappearances weren't by choice.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Moving Target
programme.desc: When a sniper in Utah started targeting African-American men for death, authorities launched a massive investigation. With scant clues and no witnesses they found the odds stacked against them, and they had no idea where the killer would strike next.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Deadly Mission
programme.desc: When a family was murdered in Arkansas, it seemed like an isolated event. But soon the crime was revealed to be part of an ever-widening circle of violence that defined a new age of domestic terrorism.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Under Fire
programme.desc: A series of armored car heists and bloody shoot-outs shocked law enforcement. The brutal violence of the crimes suggested a motive more complex than greed. When the robbers started targeting police, the FBI took charge.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Deadly Heist
programme.desc: In Arizona, an armored van loaded with cash failed to reach its destination. Authorities suspected an inside job. When the vehicle was recovered with the drivers and the cash missing, those suspicions grew even more.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Hidden Agenda
programme.desc: Across the Midwest, a band of armed robbers struck banks at the rate of nearly one per month. They attacked with lightning precision and lethal force. They were in and out in five minutes.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Dixie Mafia
programme.desc: On Mississippi's Gulf Coast, a Judge and his politician wife are murdered in their home. The killer left few clues. It looked like a professional hit, and the investigation led nowhere. But the FBI refused to give up.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Betrayed
programme.desc: On the day before Thanksgiving, a mother discovered her ten-year-old son was missing from his school. When a child of separated parents disappears, investigators first look at the family and divorced parents often suspect each other.

programme.title: The FBI Files: The Killing Zone
programme.desc: In the 1990's the war on drugs was in full swing. The front lines were often America's inner cities where gangs use violence and murder to rule their empires.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Crime Spree
programme.desc: They swept through six states like a plague, thrill killers acting without rhyme or reason. They targeted adults and young girls, kidnapping, and murdering. And in their rampage, they left plenty of clues, but moving targets are the hardest to hit.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: In 1995, our nation's capital was also our nation's murder capital. Even the police weren't safe. While Washington, DC, law enforcement targeted criminals, the criminals targeted law enforcement, even gunning down officers on patrol.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Evil Intent
programme.desc: Drops of blood and a torn screen were all that's left to tell authorities what happened to a woman in Indiana. The 21 yr. old victim was taken from her home on a spring morning. She appeared to have no real enemies, there was no clear motive.

channel.desc: From true-crime factual series to binge-worthy procedurals, this channel will bring together everything that makes crime so fascinating to viewers.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Extreme Building Plunge, Bug Windshield, Rotating Beam To Platform
programme.sub-title: Extreme Building Plunge, Bug Windshield, Rotating Beam To Platform
programme.desc: Contestants will be dangled from a rope off a roof. Contestants will also have to clear a bug splattered car windshield using only their mouth and face.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Tunnel Flag Snag, Potato Bug Bazooka, Tractor Car Roll
programme.sub-title: Tunnel Flag Snag, Potato Bug Bazooka, Tractor Car Roll
programme.desc: Contestant will stand on top of a truck as it speeds trying to grab as many flags. Contestants will shoot potatoes at a target using a shoulder mounted air cannon.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Murphy Bed Transfer, Fear Factor Minature Golf, Helicopter Bar Hang
programme.sub-title: Murphy Bed Transfer, Fear Factor Minature Golf, Helicopter Bar Hang
programme.desc: Contestants will have to play miniature golf to determine the size of a sea cucumber they will have to eat. They will also be seated on the back of a jet ski driven by a professional driver.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Bound in Chains, Get The Gator, Helicopter Rope Transfer
programme.sub-title: Bound in Chains, Get The Gator, Helicopter Rope Transfer
programme.desc: Contestant will be wrapped in a vest of chains. The contestants will crawl, climb and swim through an obstacle. In this stunt the contestant will be sitting in a helicopter flying approx. 20' over the water.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Team Transfer, Hag Fished, Cable Stand
programme.sub-title: Team Transfer, Hag Fished, Cable Stand
programme.desc: Three co-ed couples will be placed on a tight rope and suspended over water in a heart-pounding stunt. In another, players will be stacked in boxes.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Family Beam Walk, Family of Roaches, Kid-a-Pult
programme.sub-title: Family Beam Walk, Family of Roaches, Kid-a-Pult
programme.desc: The parent and the child will have to cross a beam above the water releasing flags along the way. Cockroaches are being poured into the box while the child sits in a box without a top. In this family stunt the child will start by standing on the dock.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Underwater Limo Escape, Gross Blow Tube, Car Building Couples Rescue
programme.sub-title: Underwater Limo Escape, Gross Blow Tube, Car Building Couples Rescue
programme.desc: A contestant will be seated in the driver's seat of a limousine, the second contestant will be in the trunk. The contestant will be tied into their seat and to the steering wheel of a automobile.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Heli Platform Escape, Roadkill Cafe
programme.desc: This episode focuses on the ladies of Fear Factor, escaping from a helicoper platform and eating roadkill.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Underwater Safe Save, Tongue Bob and Transfer, Truck Car Ramp
programme.sub-title: Underwater Safe Save, Tongue Bob and Transfer, Truck Car Ramp
programme.desc: Contestants will be locked in a plexi-glass box that will be hung from a crane, lowered into the water.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Bike Plank Between Box Trailers,Tomato Horn Worm Juice,Teeter Totter
programme.sub-title: Bike Plank Between Box Trailers,Tomato Horn Worm Juice,Teeter Totter
programme.desc: Contestants ride a bicycle on top of semi trucks, squeeze the juices out of hornworms, and walk on a beam between buildings in this jaw-dropping episode.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Jet Ski To Float Plane, Eel Helmet, Donkey Kong
programme.sub-title: Jet Ski To Float Plane, Eel Helmet, Donkey Kong
programme.desc: In one bizarre stunt from this episode, contestants must wear a helmet filled with moray eels. In another, they ride on a moving platform to retrieve flags.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Dual Heli Disc, Spider Head, Sinking Counter Balance
programme.sub-title: Dual Heli Disc, Spider Head, Sinking Counter Balance
programme.desc: Contestants will be placed into a helmet filled with spiders in one horrifying stunt, then couples will be bound to a platform by their ankles in another.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Water Paddle, Fear Factor Bar, Heli Surfing
programme.sub-title: Water Paddle, Fear Factor Bar, Heli Surfing
programme.desc: A contestant will be strapped by their waist, ankles, and wrists then locked to the face of a wheel, half underwater. Contestants must also stand on a swaying platform hanging from a helicopter in this sibling-themed episode.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Tesla Coil Beam, Witches Brew, Bug Tumbler
programme.sub-title: Tesla Coil Beam, Witches Brew, Bug Tumbler
programme.desc: Contestants will walk across a truss suspended above the ground wearing chain mail, shoot a flaming arrow at a scarecrow target, and be placed in a coffin filled with bugs.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Tram Cargo Net Climb, Rat Stew, Dual Suspended Heli Wall
programme.sub-title: Tram Cargo Net Climb, Rat Stew, Dual Suspended Heli Wall
programme.desc: Contestants will climb out of the moving tram and grab a net attached to the tram. Contestants will drink a shake consisting of rats. A plexi-glass wall with a lip hangs under the helicopter and they must traverse the wall releasing flags along the way.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Seperating Platform Transfer, Underwater Cage Escape, Siphon Dump Transfer, Jet Ski Launch
programme.sub-title: Seperating Platform Transfer, Underwater Cage Escape, Siphon Dump Transfer, Jet Ski Launch
programme.desc: Contestants will be standing on opposite platforms suspended in the air. Contestants will be locked in a cage and hung from a crane. Contestant will have to siphon fluid out of containers and into a funnel. A contestant will cross a beam above ground.

channel.desc: Imagine a world where your greatest fears become reality. In each pulse-racing "Fear Factor" episode, recruited contestants battle in extreme stunts. These stunts are designed to challenge the contestants both physically and mentally.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Special Delivery
programme.desc: Chief Pilot Arnie lands the DC-3 on a homemade sand strip at a remote lodge. Electra expert Chuck goes one-on-one with a stubborn power unit, and Rod's wife Sasha goes into labour with the newest member of the McBryan family.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Yukon
programme.desc: When thunderstorms and a shaking engine threaten a DC-3 charter to Whitehorse, Joe pulls out all the stops to get the passengers to their destination. Patient C-46 co-pilot Scott Blue finally gets his crack at the DC-4.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: British Invasion
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey head off to Coventry, England to navigate the potential purchase of an Electra turboprop to add to Buffalo's fleet of fire-fighting tanker planes. The father-son duo makes a great team.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Arnie Calls It
programme.desc: While training waterbomber captains for the upcoming fire-fighting season, Chief Pilot Arnie makes a surprising decision. AJ becomes a DC-4 captain and ponders whether to accept a promotion.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Under New Management
programme.desc: Joe hires outsider Duane Hicks to help Buffalo navigate the future and coach Mikey. Gord and Sean's DC-3 delivery mission to the High Arctic goes awry when blizzard conditions and a broken oil cooler force an emergency landing.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Dambusters
programme.desc: Buffalo gets into the stunt flying business when veteran pilot Arnie flies the DC-4 for the re- enactment scene of a famous WWII bombing raid. A routine C-46 flight becomes dangerous when a hole in the plane's aging exhaust system sets off the fire alarm.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Chuck Walks
programme.desc: Critical of the many stops and starts in the Electra program, and frustrated with the constant drama at Buffalo, Chuck quits. Joe clashes with the maintenance department when a series of delays puts the sale of an old Canso waterbomber in jeopardy.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Gear Up, Gear Down
programme.desc: Frustrated with her lack of flying and stuck in a rut as a courier driver, Audrey decides her time at Buffalo is over. Devan, Ian and Jimmy deal with a hydraulic fluid leak in the C-46 on the valley run.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Big Boost
programme.desc: When a ferry breakdown causes a gasoline shortage, Duane begs Chuck to return and prepare the Electra for a fuel haul. Cory leads a rescue mission to retrieve an abandoned C-46 and Mikey escapes to Ottawa for a birthday joyride in a fighter jet.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Power Struggle
programme.desc: Duane lands a huge contract for the Electra and puts enormous pressure on mechanic Adam to prep the plane without the help of his mentor Chuck. Kelly plans her Mexican wedding, but Jynelle's sudden resignation leaves her in the lurch.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Top of the World
programme.desc: The Electra flies to Alert, the northernmost settlement on Earth, forcing Adam and Duane to work things out. Hay River rampie Tyler is on the fast track to a co-pilot seat, but first has to prove his flying ability to Buffalo's new chief pilot, Justin.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Last Days
programme.desc: Sparks fly when Joe discovers Gord has taken a job with a rival airline after completing expensive training on one of the Buffalo planes. Larry, a rookie rampie, makes a near fatal error while training on the C-46.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Push Comes to Shove
programme.desc: Trying to make his mark at Buffalo, Duane lands two more Electra contracts. But his over- zealous efforts result in a clash with the crew and with Joe, and a down-to-the-wire midnight departure to meet a deadline.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: The Doghouse
programme.desc: Duane's decision to leave the Electra crew unsupervised while he spends time at home jeopardizes the completion of a major contract. Young DC-3 co-pilot Graeme sees his chance to move up to a bigger plane disappear when he falls out of favour with Joe.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Ice Strip
programme.desc: Mechanic Jimmy is sent to a northern mining camp to create an ice landing strip on a remote lake where AJ will have to land a DC-3 and the much bigger C-46. New co-pilot Tyler faces the ultimate test - flying the sked with Joe.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Expect the Unexpected
programme.desc: Engine troubles on the C-46 during the valley run force Devan to shut down an engine. High winds wreak havoc for Devan and his crew on another C-46 mission to help clean up an oil spill in the Northwest Territories.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Coming Home
programme.desc: Rookie waterbomber pilot Scott gets his first taste of action when Buffalo responds to an emergency callout to fight fires in Alberta. Mikey and Rod think they hit the jackpot when they buy a million dollar firefighting plane on eBay at a bargain price.

channel.desc: Ice Pilots is about an eccentric airline and its motley crew that fly vintage planes on impossible arctic missions. Buffalo Airways attracts young pilots seeking Arctic adventure and the chance to fly big, old, piston powered aircrafts from a bygone era.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Dawn of the Duel Board: Part II
programme.sub-title: Dawn of the Duel Board: Part II
programme.desc: As the Duel Board battle between Leo, Luna and the mystery duelist continues, Leo soon realizes that their mysterious opponent is actually an all-too-familiar friend.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Jack and Crow set out to find a restless Yusei - hoping to ease his mind and reinforce the friendship they share by Turbo Dueling down memory lane.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: The Super Genius
programme.desc: A mysterious amnesiac helps Yusei build a new engine program for his Runner, but before they can test it out, a make-up-wearing, noodle-eating crook runs off with the file.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Get With the Program: Part I
programme.sub-title: Get With the Program: Part I
programme.desc: Yusei and the gang trail Lazar to the local mall hoping to reacquire the engine design program that this window-shopping, noodle-eating crook stole from them.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Get With the Program: Part II
programme.sub-title: Get With the Program: Part II
programme.desc: Yusei and Lazar are trapped in a warehouse where their only chance of escaping is if Yusei can outduel a Guard Bot whose CPU has been uploaded with all of Yusei's battle techniques.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Will The Real Jack Atlas, Please Stand Up: Part I
programme.sub-title: Will The Real Jack Atlas, Please Stand Up: Part I
programme.desc: After being charged with crimes he didn't commit, Jack Atlas scrambles to uncover the truth before his friends and fans turn their back on him for good.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Will The Real Jack Atlas, Please Stand Up: Part II
programme.sub-title: Will The Real Jack Atlas, Please Stand Up: Part II
programme.desc: With Jack Atlas on the run, Yusei and Crow set out in search of their pal, hoping to clear his good name before bad turns to worse.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Mother Knows Best
programme.desc: When Zora's stubborn son Leon suddenly returns home, Crow picks a duel with him to help him realize that the ongoing quarrel he has with his mother is much ado about nothing.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Duelist For Hire
programme.desc: When Yusei heads to a tumbleweed town at the request of some locals, he quickly finds himself in the middle of two feuding families - with his old friend Kalin right there with him!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Showdown at Sundown: Part I
programme.desc: When Yusei challenges Kalin to a duel, he hopes to save his old acquaintance from a terrible fate. However, the dueling gets dicey when it becomes clear that Kalin doesn't necessarily want to be saved!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Showdown at Sundown: Part II
programme.desc: As Yusei continues to duel his best to save Kalin from a most unhappy ending, he suddenly finds himself double crossed by his supposed allies and in desperate need of some saving of his own!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: The Race to Escape: Part I
programme.sub-title: The Race to Escape: Part I
programme.desc: After being double crossed and sent to the mines by his supposed allies, Yusei hatches a plan to escape. Can Yusei find a way out, or will he and Kalin be forced to work the mines forever?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: The Race to Escape: Part II
programme.sub-title: The Race to Escape: Part II
programme.desc: It's a high-speed minecart chase as Kalin and Yusei scramble to rescue Sergio's family from the clutches of the Crash Town mine. When Lawton and his goons gain up on the fleeing family, things take a heartbreaking turn.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Clash at Crash Town: Part I
programme.sub-title: Clash at Crash Town: Part I
programme.desc: The sinister Lawton has captured West and Nico and gained control of Crash Town, but Yusei and Kalin have no intention of letting him get away with it. It's the ultimate showdown as the dueling duo confront Lawton in a winner-takes-all battle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Clash at Crash Town: Part II
programme.sub-title: Clash at Crash Town: Part II
programme.desc: As the clash between Lawton, Yusei and Kalin comes to a climactic close, Yusei and Kalin must figure out a way to defeat Lawton before his deck destroys their dreams of freeing everyone in the mines.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: The Question of the Card
programme.desc: When Sherry breaks into a city building in search of answers about a very special duel card, she finds a lot more than she bargained for.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Keeping a Promise: Part I
programme.desc: When Crow looks to avenge a missing colleague, he ends up finding an old friend who turns out not to be what he seems.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Keeping a Promise: Part II
programme.desc: Crow takes on an old friend in a duel to determine the truth about a colleague's mysterious disappearance.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Natural Instincts: Part I
programme.desc: A little fender bender turns into a friendly duel when Crow smashes into one of Team Unicorn's duelists on the tournament practice lanes only this was no accident and Team Unicorn's intentions are anything but friendly.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Natural Instincts: Part II
programme.desc: New threats are on the horizon and no one can be trusted. Sherry arrives to inform Yusei that she suspects the sinister forces of Iliaster have infiltrated the tournament.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Power Plays
programme.desc: Can Jack and his power-packed deck bring down his opponent or will Andre's secret plan place Jack and Team 5D's on the brink of elimination?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Trouble for Team 5D's
programme.desc: With Team Unicorn taking the early lead against Team 5D's, all eyes turn to Akiza as she takes to the track hoping to take down Andre and even up the score.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: The Edge of Elimination: Part I
programme.sub-title: The Edge of Elimination: Part I
programme.desc: With Jack and Akiza already defeated, Yusei finds himself having to defeat all three members of Team Unicorn on his own. Can Yusei come up with a comeback that will wrangle the win away from Team Unicorn?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: The Edge of Elimination: Part II
programme.sub-title: The Edge of Elimination: Part II
programme.desc: Yusei must figure out a way to defeat all three members of Team Unicorn before his deck is drained of all its duel cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: The Edge of Elimination: Part III
programme.sub-title: The Edge of Elimination: Part III
programme.desc: In the climactic conclusion to the first round of the World Racing Grand Prix, Yusei must figure out a way to defeat Team Catastrophe's captain before all the cards in his deck disappear.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Party Crashers
programme.desc: After snatching victory from the jaws of defeat in the first round of the World Racing Grand Prix, Team 5D's celebrates their win and prepares for their next opponent Team Catastrophe.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Knight Takes Pawn
programme.desc: In the second round of the World Racing Grand Prix, Crow of Team 5D's gets set to take on Team Catastrophe's Herman. Can Crow swoop in and swipe all of Herman's life points?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Rook Takes Knight
programme.desc: With his life points on the line, Crow of Team 5D's looks to give Herman's Hook the Hidden Knight the heave-ho before it ruins his Runner and catapults Team Catastrophe into the next round.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Primos Plan: Part IV
programme.desc: With the safety of New Domino City hanging in the balance and Primo in control of Stardust Dragon, Yusei must figure out a way to get his go-to card back before his life points hit zero.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Primos Plan: Part V
programme.desc: It's the climactic conclusion to the battle between Yusei and Primo! Can Yusei defeat this menace and save his City, or will Primo prevail and send New Domino spiraling into chaos?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Eyes on the Prize
programme.desc: Yusei and Team 5D's get set to take on Team Ragnarok and their powerful Nordic Gods  Thor, Loki and Odin!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Duel for Redemption
programme.desc: When Jack is informed by Team Ragnarok's Dragan that Director Goodwin fixed the match they had years earlier, Jack begins to doubt his Turbo Dueling talents. Can Jack kick things into overdrive?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Soul Solutions
programme.desc: Determined to defeat Dragan and his Nordic God, Jack summons a mighty new monster to the field that has enough fire power to send all of Dragan's life points up in smoke!

channel.desc: Giant monsters! Powerful magic! And ancient Egyptian legends! The Yu-Gi-Oh! Channel is your destination for action-packed adventure series that hold all the cards. It’s your move!

programme.title: Deconstructing Harry
programme.desc: Suffering from writer's block and eagerly awaiting his writing award, Harry Block remembers events from his past and scenes from his best-selling books as characters, real and fictional, come back to haunt him. Starring: Woody Allen, Judy Davis

programme.title: The Accidental Husband
programme.desc: Emma has made a career out of her sensible, and responsible approach to relationships. She has a radio talk show, and a loving relationship with her fiancé, Richard. Then Emma finds out that she is already married to a man she’s never met before

programme.title: Greenfingers: Greenfingers
programme.desc: Inmate Colin Briggs (Clive Owen) is introduced to gardening and when the thriving prison garden attracts the attention of flamboyant gardening expert, Georgina Woodhouse (Helen Mirren), she offers to sponsor the inmates in an upcoming flower show.

programme.title: Danny Collins
programme.desc: An old letter written to him by John Lennon and Yoko Ono inspires an aging musician to live life differently, and he sets out to reconnect with his biological son.

programme.title: The Winning Season: The Winning Season
programme.desc: The story of a washed up basketball coach who must learn to overcome his love of booze and his overdeveloped macho nature in order to re-invent himself as a real man and give a bunch of no-hopers a shot at a WINNING SEASON!

programme.title: Sweet Talker
programme.desc: A sweet-talking con man (Bryan Brown) starts to turn his life around when he falls in love in this family-oriented comedy.

programme.title: Baking Up Love
programme.desc: CEO of the Morton Pumpkin Company decides to commemorate the anniversary of the cutest town ever founded with a bake-off. The town sweetheart is expected to win. When her niece is left to stay, winning seems out of reach.

programme.title: You May Not Kiss the Bride
programme.desc: Bryan is a quiet, photographer but when he falls foul of local gangsters, he is forced to marry the boss's daughter, Masha, in order for her to get her green card. They are sent to a remote tropical island for a honeymoon that is far from idyllic.

channel.desc: For the most hilarious, most quotable, most excellent movies that will keep you in stitches 24/7, watch Pluto TV Comedy Movies. With a library of lunacy and a litany of ludicrousness, this is the place when you are looking to LOL.

programme.title: Kiss the Bride
programme.desc: Thomas and Robin are ready to spend the rest of their lives together, and nothing will stop their wedding from happening. Not even overprotective feuding mothers and a mischievous teenage sister.

programme.title: Joy & Hope
programme.desc: Joy and Hope run Two Sisters Ranch upstate New York. When a handsome stranger comes to town to find inspiration to get over writer's block, he learns how special Christmas on the ranch really is.

programme.title: Modern Persuasion
programme.desc: A sexy, modern telling of Jane Austen's "Persuasion." Wren (Alicia Witt: Orange is the New Black) is a happy, single and self-confessed workaholic who, after rising to the top of the corporate ladder, finds herself coming home to her cat every night.

programme.title: Accidentally Engaged
programme.desc: Famous actor Chas Hunter and aspiring actress Clarissa Byers agree to fake an engagement to improve both their reputations. However, playing pretend starts to feel all too real as the two start to fall for one another.

programme.title: Hearts & Vines
programme.desc: A builder and decorator on a home renovation show end up quarantined during the holidays in the home they are renovating.

programme.title: Onegin
programme.desc: Eugene Onegin is a jaded and disaffected young man who leaves St. Petersburg unexpectedly when he inherits an estate from a wealthy uncle. Starring: Ralph Fiennes, Liv Tyler, Toby Stephens, Lena Headey, Simon McBurney, Jason Watkins

programme.title: Dance-Off
programme.desc: "Dance-Off" tells the story of two rival dance studios whose star-crossed lovers, Brandon and Jasmine, must compete against each other for $25,000 and the top award, the Platinum Platinum.

programme.title: Cinderella Pact
programme.desc: Nola, Deb, and Nancy are best friends who create a Cinderella Pact—a weight loss agreement using advice from "fairy godmother" newspaper columnist Bel.

programme.title: 2 Years of Love
programme.desc: Samantha has a great marriage, until the pressure to have a baby comes up. Things get tricky when she starts falling for one of her clients, not realizing it is secretly her husband. Will they be able to make it through this rough patch?

channel.desc: Celebrate love with Pluto TV Romance, with wall to wall Rom Com's, tear jerkers, and epic love stories which will make you laugh, cry and feel all fuzzy inside.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: Loud Ghosts of The Hall
programme.desc: Ghost Dimension continue their investigation into Champness Hall and come face to face with paranormal activity that is caught on camera and seek out the paranormal entities haunting the location.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: Haunted Theme Park - Part 1
programme.desc: What could be haunting an abandoned theme park in Lancashire? Ghost Dimension seek out paranormal activity in Camelot and they are in for a ride!

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: Haunted Theme Park - Part 2
programme.desc: Ghost Dimension continue investigating Camelot Theme Park, the UK's most haunted and come face to face, with a powerful paranormal entity.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: The Barn
programme.desc: Something Strange is haunting the remains of a colliery in Cheshire and Ghost Dimension head in to uncover the truth behind the activity!

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: Evil Spirit in the Cave
programme.desc: Ghost Dimension face a dark sinister ghost inside haunted Caves. Crank caves based in St Helens are said to be the most haunted in the area. Strange paranormal spirits spooky anyone that ventures inside.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: Ghost in the Shower
programme.desc: Ghost Dimension investigate Waterloo Rugby Club and come into contact with a very mischievous spirit in the male showers! A ghost that scares away any female that dares to enter.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: The Streets
programme.desc: Hidden underground for years in Keighley West Yorkshire. Ghost Dimension investigate haunted Victorian Streets, used during the war as bombing shelters.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: The Crooked House
programme.desc: Deep in Cheshire Ghost Dimension explore a house full of ghostly activity and paranormal goings on. Used to house troops during WW2 as a medical unit.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: Secret Nuclear Bunker
programme.desc: Ghost Dimension investigate Hack Green Secret Nuclear Bunker in Nantwich. Something sinister and paranormal seems to be causing havoc inside of the building and tonight it unleashes powerful activity

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: Stranger in the Blitz
programme.desc: Damaged during the blitz, the location the team investigate was a former war hospital for the injured and wounded, based in Liverpool, UK.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: Prisoner of War
programme.desc: Barrow Green H17 Anti-Aircraft Battery build to protect the Liverpool Docks and general area and a former prisoner of war camp, holds some sinister secrets and Ghost Dimension uncover paranormal activity dating back to WW2. What will be caught tonight?

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: The Ammo Store Explosion
programme.desc: Simonswood Supply Depot was one of the main ammunition depots in Lancashire, England during World War II. Located at Simonswood, it was used as an ammunition depot delivered by ROF Kirkby.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: Washed Away Air Raid
programme.desc: This abandoned World War Two air raid shelter holds paranormal secrets that haunt anyone that ventures inside. A ghostly entity makes contacts they team uncover the whats behind the hauntings.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: Buried inside the Bombing Decoy
programme.desc: A Second World War bombing decoy site at Formby. It was commissioned in December 1940 as a 'Permanent Starfish' site to deflect enemy bombing from the city of Liverpool and it is now home to a whole host of paranormal activity.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: WW2 Hospital Haunting
programme.desc: Built in the early 1900’s and now used as offices, a former world war hospital has become the new home for something supernatural. Strange voices, eerie footsteps and the sounds of painful screams have all been reported. What will be uncovered tonight?

channel.desc: A 24/7 channel that takes Ghost investigations to a whole new level. Using the latest technical instruments to collect and record evidence as well as incorporating good old fashioned ghost hunting techniques.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy view a barn in Kent, a Victorian mansion Lancashire and an old chapel in Wales.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy view properties Gwent, West Sussex and Liverpool.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy view properties in West London, Staffordshire and Kent.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin Roberts and Lucy Alexander visit a mid-terrace in Dover.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit an art deco flat in South London, a terraced house on the Isle of Sheppy and a house in Devon.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 11
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit an abandoned property near Wigan, a grand semi detached house in Southampton and a three bedroom house with some odd features in Derby.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 13
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a former army house in Wiltshire that may leave you shellshocked, a three-bed end of terrace lot with a garage and a Staffordshire property with enough bedrooms for a rock band!

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 16
programme.desc: Lucy and Martin travel to Liverpool to see a mid terrace which isn't a blot on the landscape, although it does have one in its garden.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 15
programme.desc: Lucy Alexander and Martin Roberts travel to Dorset to a bungalow surrounded by the beautiful countryside. Then on to Tooting to see a 1st floor flat in urgent need of a face lift. Stoke-on-Trent offers a garage soon to be luxury studio flats.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit properties in Chelsea, Northumberland and London.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy view a terraced house in Burton-on-Trent, a flat in Wimbledon and a detached house in Stockton-on-Tees.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 16
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a property in Lincoln but watch out for the neighbourhood watch systems, a Dorset Cottage where the smell isn't coming from the farm and a two bedroomed house in Warrington.

channel.desc: This British daytime TV institution is now in it 22nd season on BBC1 and show's no sign of losing any of it's curb appeal.Wannabe property developers chance their arm in the auction room buying properties to let.

programme.title: The Devil's Plaything
programme.desc: A lesbian vampire's soul is kept on in the bodies of her descendants.

programme.title: La Grande Bouffe
programme.desc: A group of men go to a villa in the French countryside where they resolve to eat themselves to death.

programme.title: Horror Hospital
programme.desc: You don’t get this sort of treatment on the NHS! Dr Storm has developed a radical new treatment for your hang-ups. He’s going to give you a lobotomy! A Superb 1970s cast!

programme.title: Beneath the Valley of the Ultra-Vixens
programme.desc: Believe it or not even in Smalltown USA there are still people who are unfulfilled and unrelieved in the midst of plenty. Levonna and Lamar could have the perfect relationship if it were not Lamar's obsession with rear entry.

programme.title: I Bury The Living
programme.desc: Cemetery director Robert Kraft discovers that by arbitrarily changing the status of plots from empty to occupied on the planogram causes the death of the plots' owners.

programme.title: Banana Joe: Banana Joe
programme.desc: A man is living happily on an island with his family, growing bananas. When a local mobster with an eye on man's property tries to take it from him, he must go to the town for the first time to get some help.

programme.title: Knock on Wood
programme.desc: Discovering that a ventriloquist is travelling to Zurich, a spy ring hides secret plans in his dummies' heads. When a second spy ring learns of the plans, they descend upon the ventriloquist, causing city-wide pandemonium.

programme.title: Elvira's Haunted Hills
programme.desc: ELVIRA'S HAUNTED HILLS culls its outragousness from the classic Vincent Price/Roger Corman films of the early 60's along with a little Rocky Horror Picture Show and Fearless Vampire Killers.

channel.desc: From the “so bad it’s good” to the “so weird it’s great,” Pluto TV Cult Films is like having your own personal drive-in movie theater playing the wildest, funniest, and most-beloved cult classics ever made.

programme.title: Hunter: Lullably
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall work with a Scotland Yard Inspector whent the murder of two British prostitutes resembles a string of similar murders in the U.K.

programme.title: Hunter: Final Confession
programme.desc: After serving a 20-year prison term, a convicted murderer hunts down his accomplices who avoided prosecution. One of them has since become a priest.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: When a convicted murderer commits suicide, his vengeful brother holds McCall and the judge she's dating captive, forcing McCall to discover the truth of the case.

programme.title: Hunter: Sudden Withdrawl
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall search for a beautiful woman whose numerous liaisons are linked to a series of bank robberies.

programme.title: Hunter: Second Sight
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall investigate a psychic's deadly premonitions.

programme.title: Hunter: Street Wise - Part 1
programme.desc: As McCall rekindles an old romance, Hunter insinuates himself into a case involving the mysterious theft of a vagrant's Medal of Honor.

programme.title: Hunter: Street Wise - Part 2
programme.desc: As an investigation into a fencing operation leads Hunter to the killer of a fellow officer and friend, McCall weighs the decision to marry and quit the force.

programme.title: Hunter: Deadly Encounters Part 1
programme.desc: Hunter teams with two Metro officers, one of whom is a former adversary, to locate the missing profits of a murdered black-marketeer as Devane considers a post in Metro.

programme.title: Hunter: Deadly Encounters Part 2
programme.desc: Hunter teams with two Metro officers, one of whom is a former adversary, to locate the missing profits of a murdered black-marketeer as Devane considers a post in Metro.

programme.title: Hunter: Where Echoes End
programme.desc: Hunter attempts to clear the name of a fellow detective accused of a lucrative scheme.

programme.title: Hunter: Kill Zone
programme.desc: Hunter and new partner Molenski investigate a series of rape/murders that revive disturbing memories for Molenski.

programme.title: Hunter: The Incident
programme.desc: Hunter and Molenski battle a neighborhood watch group whose members are taking the law into their own hands.

programme.title: Hunter: A Snitch'll Break Your Heart
programme.desc: Molenski battles with the department to protect the identity of an informant as Hunter investigates the death of an adopted boy.

programme.title: Hunter: Oh, The Shark Bites
programme.desc: When a mobster's son is killed, Devane must defend himself from charges of corruption.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Hunter leads a massive police operation to find dozens of prisoners set free by a computer operator who wants one of them to kill her husband.

programme.title: Hunter: This is My Gun
programme.desc: While investigating a series of art thefts, Molenski's gun is stolen and used in a fatal robbery.

channel.desc: When Rick Hunter, a renegade cop who takes justice into his own hands, partners with the stunning and rebellious Sgt. McCall, they set out to crack down on L.A.'s slimiest criminals.

programme.title: Fifth Gear: Episode 1
programme.desc: Jason Plato and Tiff Needell hold a high octane track test of three brand new super glamorous convertibles from Audi, Maserati and Mercedes. Vicki Butler-Henderson races wheel to wheel with World Superbike hotshot Chaz Davies

programme.title: Fifth Gear: Episode 2
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson and Tiff Needell pit what could be the greatest drivers' car of the century – the Toyota GT86 – against its tough rival from Renault Sport. Jonny Smith is in Spain to put Jaguar's brand new F-Type through its paces

programme.title: Fifth Gear: Episode 3
programme.desc: Jonny Smith reveals the secrets of 21 st century car crash testing. He goes behind the scenes at a crash test performed by experts EuroNCAP, before conducting his own shocking crash test between a car and a van.

programme.title: Fifth Gear: Episode 4
programme.desc: Tiff Needell heads to LA to check out the latest car trend to take the USA – restomodding. It's the art of sympathetically restoring classic cars to modern standards, while retaining their original charm – and Tiff's behind the wheel of LA's best examples

programme.title: Fifth Gear: Episode 5
programme.desc: Jason Plato and Tiff Needell host a battle of the best cheap hot hatches on sale. The Ford Fiesta ST, RenaultSport Clio and Peugeot 208 GTI are all thrashed to the limit before Tiff and Jason reveal the champion.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell is joined by German petrolhead legend and Queen of the Nurburgring Sabine Schmitz. They're finding the ultimate machine for thrill seekers, pitting the latest Caterham 7 against its hardcore rivals from Morgan and Ariel.

programme.title: Fifth Gear: Episode 7
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and Jason Plato celebrate the 100th anniversary of Aston Martin. Jason drives James Bond's DB5 from Skyfall and learns from the the master craftsmen at the company's heritage centre, while Tiff tests the brand new Rapide S four door supercar

programme.title: Fifth Gear: Episode 8
programme.desc: Jonny Smith is in Sweden testing the brand new Volvo S60 Polestar super saloon against its racing car cousin – the competition car of double Swedish Touring Car Champion Fredrick Ekblom.

programme.title: Fifth Gear: Episode 9
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson enters the brutal world of professional truck racing. She drives a 1100bhp truck herself, before heading to the Nurburgring where she joins the pit crew of former champion, German Jochen Hahn.

programme.title: Fifth Gear: Episode 10
programme.desc: Jason Plato and Tiff Needell are joined by Ayrton Senna's nephew, Bruno Senna, to conduct their fastest ever track test. They hold a thrilling race between the brand new Porsche 911 Turbo S and two supercar rivals from Noble and Nissan.

programme.title: Fifth Gear: Episode 11
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson heads to the German HQ of the Dakar rally winning Mini X-Raid team, to experience the three toughest jobs in motorsport. She'll learn how to be a navigator, mechanic and driver before taking on Dakar rally legend Nani Roma

programme.title: Fifth Gear: Episode 12
programme.desc: Jonny Smith goes behind-the-scenes at America's biggest motor race, the Indy 500. He hears what makes the event so special from triple winner Dario Franchitti, reveals the technical differences between F1 cars and Indy cars

programme.title: Fifth Gear: Episode 13
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and Jason Plato hold a track battle between two executive cars with over 1000bhp between them. The brand new Audi RS6 and Mercedes E63 AMG are both designed to demolish autobahns

programme.title: Fifth Gear: Episode 14
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson learns the skills needed to drive in the Special Forces, from former Royal Marine sniper Aldo Kane.

programme.title: Fifth Gear: Episode 15
programme.desc: Tiff Needell heads to Le Mans, to race in the European version of legendary American race series NASCAR – the world's most popular motorsport.

programme.title: Fifth Gear: Episode 16
programme.desc: Jonny Smith is in France, experiencing the action packed world of Rallycross; a cross between rallying and circuit racing, where 650bhp machines battle door to door.

channel.desc: Resident presenters and most knowledgeable drivers on TV, Tiff Needell, Vicki Butler-Henderson and Johnny Smith, provide the inside track on all things motoring.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: Behind lace-curtained windows and beneath sensible haircuts lurked evil. Appearances were deceptive. We did not notice these female killers walking by. These women wore a mask of sanity.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: Some killers are so troubled that their actions are almost impossible to comprehend. Welcome to the shadow land of the insane and psychopathic as we enter the haunting world of the disturbed.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Sacrifice Their Blood
programme.desc: To the outside world these caring mothers present a face of love - a suburban Mom, a caring community member, a housewife - but when the doors close, these deadly women will do whatever it takes to have their own needs met, even destroy their family.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Love Sick
programme.desc: Young love can be a beautiful time, but when jealousy raises its ugly head it can also be deadly. These baby-faced schoolgirls looked pure and innocent, but don’t be deceived.

programme.title: Deadly Women: To Love and to Murder
programme.desc: Marriage is a lifelong commitment of love, and wedding vows. 'To have and to hold; for better, for worse; until death do us part'. But for these monstrous wives, it was only the vow of 'death do us part' they upheld.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: These deadly women were consumed by obsessions that overtook their minds and their lives. These women all had a fatal fixation.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Deadly Possessions
programme.desc: A grandmother caring for her grandchildren, a young girl in love with a boy, and a mother protecting her son are consumed with intense love. But when that love is threatened, they find it too much to bear and take measures into their own hands.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Breaking Point
programme.desc: Anger, fear and despair are basic human emotions. But when these emotions are coupled with a broken mind, a perfect storm is created. Teetering on the edge of unbalance, these women resort to murder when pushed to the breaking point.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Baby-Faced Killers
programme.desc: These baby-faced girls may look childish and innocent, but behind their little girl smiles lies a darkness most adults never experience. When their inner turmoil bubbles to the surface, they become unlikely criminals.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: Women are more often prey than predators, but the exceptions are deadly women indeed. In this episode, we’ll discover what drove these deadly women to prey on the unsuspecting.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: The mind of a female killer is shaped by a complex cocktail of influences. Do people become that way, driven by horrendous events in their lives? Or are some killers born bad?

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: No one doubts a woman’s capacity to love, but sometimes lust can turn lethal. In the ultimate fatal attraction, "Deadly Women" looks at cases of murder driven by obsessive love.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Hearts of Stone
programme.desc: Deadly Women are not always the ones you expect. They are not the strangers lurking in the dark, they are a young mother, a supportive wife and a grandmother - all killers. Behind their loving masquerade lies a wake of family horror and pain.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: These women never get their hands dirty: no blood touched them because they manipulate others to kill for them...but they didn't get away.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Obsession
programme.desc: Deciphering what causes minds to corkscrew out of control is the complex work of the criminal profiler. Obsessions can take many forms: beauty, devotion, ego and power.

channel.desc: Why do women kill? Deadly Women investigates true crime stories & reveals the horrific murders these women commit & the psyche behind their cold-blooded crimes, through revenge, fatal affairs, greed or just pure rage.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Deadly Obsession
programme.desc: Power is a responsibility as well as a privilege. But in the wrong hands, power can corrupt. For former Deputy Attorney General for the State of Delaware, losing sight of his sworn oath to uphold justice could prove lethal.

programme.title: The FBI Files: The Crazy Don
programme.desc: To the FBI, he was believed to be the boss of New York's most powerful mafia organization: the Genovese crime family. Was Gigante crazy or was his behavior a shrewd attempt to disguise his position as a ruthless mafia boss?

programme.title: The FBI Files: Killing Spree
programme.desc: In 1984, in South Florida, a rapist and murderer was on the loose. The killer was a ruthless and terrifying predator, the newest member of an infamous group known as serial killers.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: Despite what you see in the movies, most bank robbers come in quietly, pass a note, and slip away. They want cash, not bloodshed. But in Richmond, Virginia, a pair of gunmen entered a bank with their guns blazing.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Above the Law
programme.desc: California Highway Patrolman George Gwaltney discovered the body of 23-year-old Robin Bishop near her car on a remote desert highway.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Blood Brothers
programme.desc: When the small community of Noel, Missouri discovered their bank was robbed, they're shocked. When the bank president turned up missing, they're outraged. And when clues began to surface the facts were more terrible than anyone could have guessed.

programme.title: The FBI Files: No Remorse
programme.desc: A burning body in a dark alley shed light on a cold-blooded killer. His partners in crime would tell the story, if they lived. In the underworld of the drug trade, even a childhood friend can quickly become an enemy.

programme.title: The FBI Files: The World Trade Center Bombing
programme.desc: Terrorist bombings are what happen in other countries. Not here in the United States. And yet, in 1993, it happened in New York City.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Crime Spree
programme.desc: They swept through six states like a plague, thrill killers acting without rhyme or reason. They targeted adults and young girls, kidnapping, and murdering. And in their rampage, they left plenty of clues, but moving targets are the hardest to hit.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Family Secrets
programme.desc: A woman and her infant son vanish. The husband is frantic. The clues are scarce, but hopes linger, even as the hours and days tick by without a word. Was she on the run, or the victim of foul play?

programme.title: The FBI Files: Radical Agenda
programme.desc: In the 1970's a string of bank robberies and bombings spread fear and destruction along the east coast. The FBI faced a new breed of criminal, the domestic terrorist.

programme.title: Dark Waters of Crime: Winston's Secret

programme.title: Dark Waters of Crime: Bad Trip

channel.desc: From true-crime factual series to binge-worthy procedurals, this channel will bring together everything that makes crime so fascinating to viewers.

programme.title: Deadly Disasters: Mosquitoes
programme.desc: In 2014, Microsoft Founder Bill Gates described the mosquito as the “deadliest animal in the world.” It is estimated by the World Health Organisation that they kill roughly 750,000 people per year.

programme.title: Deadly Disasters: Landslides
programme.desc: Nothing can be done to prevent a landslide once it starts; they are among the most ferocious and devastating forces in nature.

programme.title: Deadly Disasters: Earthquakes
programme.desc: Deadly, highly destructive and impossible to predict the Earthquake is perhaps one of Mother Nature's most terrifying forces. They flatten entire cities, create mass homelessness, and take thousands of lives. Earthquakes are truly deadly disasters.

programme.title: Deadly Disasters: Cyclones
programme.desc: An intense area of low pressure that forms over warm tropical waters, tropical cyclones are responsible for some of the most catastrophic extreme weather events. Their deadly winds and torrential rain wreak destruction on an unprecedented scale.

programme.title: Naked Science: Great Lakes
programme.desc: The Great Lakes are sometimes referred to as inland seas; they are the largest freshwater system in the world. Naked Science examines the early history of these amazing bodies

programme.title: Naked Science: Venus
programme.desc: Earth has an evil twin. Venus. It is shrouded in a lethal atmosphere of carbon dioxide and acid rain. The surface temperature is hot enough to melt lead and the pressure high enough to crush a nuclear submarine.

programme.title: Naked Science: Anatomy Of Tornado
programme.desc: Tornados are one of the most destructive forces of the planets with winds at 300 miles an hour. They can destroy buildings and hurl cars hundreds of feet through the air.

programme.title: Naked Science: Saturn
programme.desc: Saturn is the second-largest planet in the solar system. Storms on this gas giant can cover an area bigger than the United States Clouds of the gas race around the planet at over 1000 miles per hour generating fierce electrical storms and lightning.

programme.title: Naked Science: Making Mountains
programme.desc: The Rockies. Magnificent and awe-inspiring mysterious, the Rockies are one of the longest mountain ranges in the world. Naked Science investigates the geological processes that build these massive mountains.

programme.title: Deadly Disasters: Tsunamis
programme.desc: In Japanese, Tsunami translates to “harbour wave.” They are unleashed when a major disturbance occurs underwater, creating a series of enormous, deadly swells.

programme.title: Deadly Disasters: Volcanoes
programme.desc: Volcanoes occupy a special place in our imagination. Stories of the destruction of the ancient Roman city of Pompeii continue to fascinate, while terrifying visions of exploding fire and molten rock play a key part in our nightmares.

programme.title: Deadly Disasters: Drought
programme.desc: Most parts of the world are liable to the horrors brought by lack of water. In the United States only hurricanes bring about more economic hardships. It is not only a lack of rain and high temperatures that causes drought.

programme.title: Deadly Disasters: Earthquakes
programme.desc: Many of our most densely populated cities are situated on the Earth’s most seismically active fault lines. Deadly, highly destructive, and impossible to predict, Earthquakes are truly one of Mother Nature’s most terrifying forces.

programme.title: Deadly Disasters: Tornadoes
programme.desc: The Tornado is one of Mother Nature’s most extraordinary phenomena. These intense, rapidly rotating columns of air can attain wind speeds of more than 480 kilometres per hour, and have been witnessed on every continent except Antarctica.

programme.title: Naked Science: The Great Flood
programme.desc: Almost every culture on Earth tells the story of an ancient flood – details vary but the basic plot is the same - An angry God wipes out an unrepentant population.

channel.desc: From the depths of the ocean to the distant cosmos, be inspired by crazy experiments, unbelievable science facts, and talks from famous scientists on Pluto TV Science.

programme.title: The Fabric of the Cosmos: Universe or Multiverse?

programme.title: Cosmic Vistas: Landsat

programme.title: Cosmic Vistas: The Hot Zone
programme.desc: Mercury is one Earth's closest neighbors, but for centuries it eluded astronomer's best efforts to learn its secrets. But that has changed thanks to missions like Mariner and most recently, Messenger.

programme.title: Cosmic Vistas: Hubble's Renaissance
programme.desc: Before we can reach space, we must first be able to see it. Hundreds of years ago, the simple telescope was used to give us a seemingly closer vantage. Today, we use the awe-inspiring, and super powerful, Hubble Space Telescope.

programme.title: Cosmic Vistas
programme.desc: See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Cosmic Vistas: Vesta Unveiled

programme.title: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rainbow
programme.desc: In the world of astronomy, how do we overcome the limits imposed by our own eyesight? The universe comes alive by viewing the cosmos in infrared light to gamma radiation.

programme.title: Cosmic Vistas: Superscopes

programme.title: The New Detectives: Elements Of Murder
programme.desc: There are several things that can suggest murder; jealousy, anger, poison. When everyday substances reveal hidden clues that break a homicide case, those substances become the elements of murder.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Grave Secrets
programme.desc: Killers often attempt to deflect attention away from their crimes by hiding the remains of their victims. Bodies may lay hidden for years before they are discovered.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Trial By Fire
programme.desc: At a crime scene, anything left behind or seemingly out of place is considered a clue. But a fire can extinguish everything in its path challenging forensic investigators at every turn and making each arson a trial by fire.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Mind Hunters
programme.desc: Psychological Profiling: Journey into the dark recesses and calculated madness present only in our worst nightmares, and in the minds of serial killers.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Fatal Error
programme.desc: Accidental deaths, suicides, disappearances, and fires; they're an everyday part of an insurance investigator's life. But cases shouldn't be taken at face value. Forensics has become a tool for exposing insurance fraud.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Double Helix
programme.desc: DNA Analysis: With the advent of DNA analysis, just a few microscopic cells found at a crime scene can be used to put a murder behind bars.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Out To Kill
programme.desc: An abandoned car outside Philadelphia brings heartbreak to a family and terror to a community. A young woman is dead, the killer gone. But the marks of his passage remain.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Lies and deceit can often throw investigators off the trail of justice. But when hard evidence contradicts a killer's story, police must use the clues to piece together the truth.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Deadly Aim
programme.desc: Ballistic analysis is the key to finding killers who turn guns on their victims. Each shot fired leaves its own fingerprint, allowing scientists to target murderers with deadly aim.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Shattered Vows
programme.desc: A woman is found dead at the bottom of the basement stairs. As detectives look into the accident, they begin to question the sequence of events.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Short Fuse
programme.desc: Explosives Investigations: The crime lab is the place where science meets murder. In New York State, Eleanor Fowler opened a small package, which was mailed to her home. When she lifted the lid, the box exploded, killing her instantly.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Toxic Death
programme.desc: Sometimes, the cause of death does not match the scene of the crime. When an untraceable poison is used to commit murder, homicide detectives turn to forensic toxicologists to follow a killer's tracks and expose a toxic death.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Hidden Obsessions
programme.desc: In San Diego, California, a killer has left behind pieces of evidence. Detectives must sort through these small clues to prove murder.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Deadly Target
programme.desc: Ballistics: A corpse is found with a gunshot wound to the head; the weapon lies next to the victim. It looks like suicide, but could it be murder? It's a question best solved by ballistics experts.

channel.desc: THE NEW DETECTIVES profiles the work of world-renowned forensics experts and criminal investigators and the techniques they use to solve murders and other crimes.
