programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Contract to Kill / The Mornington Monster
programme.sub-title: Contract to Kill / The Mornington Monster
programme.desc: Crime Investigation Australia has conducted a major investigation which reveals the inside story of the Megan Kalajzich murder and the extraordinary police investigation which will rock the Harbour City's elite to the core.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: No More Grannies / The Granny Killer
programme.sub-title: No More Grannies / The Granny Killer
programme.desc: We delve into the twisted mind of one of Australia's most prolific serial murderers. John Wayne Glover - The Granny Killer, was truly an evil man.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Gonzales Family Murders
programme.desc: On July 10, 2001, Sef Gonzales murdered his sister Clodine, 18, mother Mary Loiva Josephine, 43, and his father Teddy, 46, in their North Ryde home.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Night of Terror: The Bega Schoolgirls
programme.sub-title: Night of Terror: The Bega Schoolgirls
programme.desc: On the 6th October 1997, 14-year-old Lauren Barry and 16-year-old Nicole Collins disappeared while walking along a road near their home town of Bega, on the New South Wales south coast.

channel.desc: Crime Investigation Australia, the ultimate destination for true crime, uncovers its country’s most horrific crimes that shocked the nation. Watch chilling re-enactments & interviews and witness how police & forensic investigators solve the case.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole stop in Delaware, where they help their new host family with a space problem, while their internship is at a lively daycare center.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole continue their travels through Maryland, living with a host family who Paris offers to cook for, and working at a bakery.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: As their latest internship with a psychic is only a short distance away, Paris and Nicole remain at the Foot family home, where they attempt to match make.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Back in New Jersey, Paris and Nicole work at an elderly living center, where they give the seniors a day to remember, before teaching their host family about the cruelty of hunting.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole stay with a mother and son in Miami whose unusual pets prove useful for their ad agency internship, which involves creating a campaign for a new breakfast sandwich.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Havoc ensues when Paris and Nicole begin an internship with the Atlantic City Fire Department, while they task themselves with finding the daughter of their host family a new friend.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: The girls intern at a manufacturing firm where their work proves dull, however they manage to have fun with their host family.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole stay with a family in Tennessee, where they play matchmakers once more, while their internship is with a wedding planner.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Before they leave for New York, Paris and Nicole stay with the family of a former beauty queen, who convinces Paris to take part in a pageant, while their internship is at a dentist's office.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole take the place of a stay-at-home mom who has a young daughter, and also happens to be nine months pregnant!

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole trade in their designer dresses for traditional Pakistani attire when they take over the responsibilities of a Pakistani housewife.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole fill in for a housewife who feels her marriage is lacking a spark.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole spend the day tending to the needs and whims of four rambunctious kids.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole plan competing weddings for a lesbian couple.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole must take care of a toddler, as well as throw a party for his second birthday.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole take a break from household chores and go on a family vacation.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole are paired with a hard-to-please husband.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole visit an artistic family with varied talents.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris can’t stand to spend another day as a housewife and hires an impersonator to take her place, giving Nicole an opportunity to exact her revenge.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris Hilton and Nicole Richie say goodbye to their jet-setting lifestyle in Los Angeles, and move in with the Ledings, a family in Altus, Arkansas.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole are hired to work at a dairy farm operated by Albert’s no-nonsense friend, but after tiring of the hard work and smell, they head for a nearby hot tub… and end up getting fired.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole are hired to work at a fast-food restaurant, but they’re bored and frustrated by the demands of the job, and soon rebel by pulling pranks during each of their assignments; when the Ledings reprimand them, the girls just go out dancing.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole agree to be honorary co-chairs of the Springtime Gala, but instead of working at the gala, they engage in their usual shocking behavior; the Ledings are embarrassed, and everyone in town is gossiping about Paris and Nicole.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: The girls go to work for a cattle auctioneer, but when they’re sent to buy cattle feed, they charge several other items without permission; the auctioneer comes after them for the money, and the girl try to lie their way out of the debt.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole finally get a job they enjoy: working at a gas station, where there are plenty of guys to flirt with; but a confrontation erupts when Albert and Janet tell the girls to stay away from the small town boys, and the girls disobey them.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole reminisce about their month in Altus, make amends, and say goodbye to the people they’ve come to know before returning to Los Angeles.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Leeza Gibbons hosts a look back at Paris’ and Nicole’s stay in Altus, Arkansas, as the girls reunite with the Leding family in front of a studio audience.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole depart from Miami Beach toward their first destination, the Batten Family Ranch.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole get jobs at Weeki Wachee Springs in Florida and play a surprising game of hide-and-seek with their boss's daughter.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole work as maids at the Caliente Nudist Colony and learn the meaning of the word "termination."

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: While staying with a host family, Nicole butts heads with their oldest son and decides to give him a taste of his own medicine.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: In the swamplands of Louisiana, Paris and Nicole meet their next host family and make a big impression after taking their daughter on a shopping spree; the women get jobs trapping crawfish.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: A stop in Texas brings Paris and Nicole to their new host family; the women convince the Lutz-Carillos boys to sneak out with them to go tanning.

channel.desc: The challenge, whether surviving 30 days with a family on a farm, accepting various internships or travelling across country by bus, it’s no phones, no credit cards, no money. Paris Hilton & Nicole Richie give everything up for “The Simple Life.”

programme.title: Wipeout Canada: Hot Cop and The Fuzz
programme.desc: Buoys, Field Goal Swing, Big Donuts and Tippy Tables are some of the over-the-top obstacles in this week's episode.

programme.title: Wipeout Canada: Heroes
programme.desc: The Towers and Donuts, The Pole Vault, Dogeball, The Barrel Crossing and Double Beams are some of the over-the-top obstacles in this week's episode.

programme.title: Wipeout Canada: Food Fight
programme.desc: Beam and Jets, Field Goal Swing, The Toothbrush Bristles, Tippy Tables and Dock Maze are among some of the over-the-top obstacles in this week's episode.

programme.title: Wipeout Canada: Knitting Ninja
programme.desc: Dirty Balls, The Wall Swing, The Crusher, Crazy Beams and Big Donuts are among some of the over-the-top obstacles included in this week's episode.

programme.title: Wipeout Canada: Tight and Bright
programme.desc: Dirty Balls, The Wall Swing, The Crusher, Crazy Beams and Big Donuts are some of the over-the-top obstacles in this week's episode.

programme.title: Wipeout Canada: Family
programme.desc: Dirty Balls, The Donut Swing, The Toothbrush Bristles, Tippy Tables and Dock Maze are among some of the over-the-top obstacles included in this week's episode.

programme.title: Wipeout Canada: The Wipeys
programme.desc: Wipeout Canada brings you a countdown of the season's most memorable moments with never-before-seen footage, extended scenes and live interviews with some of the most popular contestants.

programme.title: Wipeout Australia: Grandpa in his Red Speedos and a Rainbow Bright Personal Ad
programme.sub-title: Grandpa in his Red Speedos and a Rainbow Bright Personal Ad
programme.desc: Fashion comes to Wipeout Australia as we meet Adam "God's Gift" Marshall, a self styled Ad man who conquers the Qualifier. Other Catwalk moments include the Grandpa in his Red Speedos and a Rainbow Bright Personal Ad.

programme.title: Wipeout Australia: Sweeper Writes Itself Into the History Books
programme.sub-title: Sweeper Writes Itself Into the History Books
programme.desc: It's no doubt that the 'Ball Crusher' Sweeper is the star of tonight's show. With a brother-sister team hanging by a thread and a three-way hurdle, this week's Sweeper writes itself into the history books.

programme.title: Wipeout Australia: Pro Wrestler Mikey Takes on Tom Cruise
programme.sub-title: Pro Wrestler Mikey Takes on Tom Cruise
programme.desc: Showdowns don't come more epic than this. Pro Wrestler Mikey takes on Wipeout Australias very own Tom Cruise. Its neck and neck through the qualifier which this week includes a real Mission Impossible, Dirty Balls.

programme.title: Wipeout Australia: Slippery Stairs and Wipeout Crash Cream
programme.sub-title: Slippery Stairs and Wipeout Crash Cream
programme.desc: This week contestants on Wipeout Australia are bought undone by a seemingly simple obstacle on the Qualifier, the Slippery Stairs. It's all in the name really, an innocent set of stairs, covered in Wipeout Crash cream.

programme.title: Wipeout Australia: World's Strongest Dwarf, David Clarke and Gentle Giant, Tim Watts
programme.sub-title: World's Strongest Dwarf, David Clarke and Gentle Giant, Tim Watts
programme.desc: It's Sitcom Central on Wipeout Australia with the Odd Couple, starring World's Strongest Dwarf, David Clarke and Gentle Giant, Tim Watts. The Big Balls deliver some spectacular moments with an Italian chef being sliced and diced.

programme.title: Wipeout Australia: Bon Bon's Belly Dancing
programme.desc: Mesmerized by Bon Bon's Belly Dancing, we catch up with our favourite Big Balls in the Qualifier. They dish out punishment to Australia's very own female Jim Carrey and send Big Cat tamer Robbie into the pond.

programme.title: Wipeout Australia: Demolition Dave and more
programme.desc: Wipeout Australia debunks the myth that only young, fit and funky people should go on game shows. This week we are forced to take notice of Demolition Dave, a 49 year old South Australia man who smashes the qualifier.

programme.title: Wipeout Australia: Inconceivable Field Goal Swing Attempts
programme.desc: From singing Pastors to Wookies, this week is jammed pack with Characters, who battle it out on the Qualifier with amusing attempts at the inconceivable Field Goal Swing.

programme.title: Wipeout Australia: 20 Greatest Hits
programme.desc: On this special episode, hosts James Brayshaw and Josh Lawson highlight the top 20 spills, face plants and wipeouts from the past season.

channel.desc: Crashes, smashes and hilarious mud splashes are on the cards as twenty contestants take on one of television's largest and most extreme obstacle courses.
