programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: PJ’s Pets is one of the nation’s oldest pet store chains, but the company has a new President in place, and she’s determined to rattle a few cages. Margaret Kordas steps out of her stilettos when she spends a week working in her own stores.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Toronto Transit Commission (TTC) City Councillor and TTC Chair Karen Stintz goes undercover inside the country's largest mass transit system to get her hands dirty with some of the toughest and grittiest jobs.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Tigner, the president of Kendall-Jackson Wine Estates, the second largest family owned wine company in the world, goes undercover posing as a grocery store employee who is pursuing his dream job in the wine industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dan Dizio is the CEO of the fastest growing pretzel bakery on the East Coast, Philly Pretzel Factory. Dan goes undercover as Michael Downs, a data entry processor who will be switching jobs with Philly Pretzel employees.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Bernt Bodal is the CEO of American Seafoods, one of the largest seafood companies in the United States. He is going undercover to look for ways for the company to grow.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Canlan Ice Sports Corp is the largest private owner of sports facilities in North America. CEO Joey St Aubin admits their prices are higher than local municipal rinks, but believes his company offers a premium service and better ice quality.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Chad Hallock, the co-founder of Budget Blinds, the largest window covering Franchise Company in the United States, is going undercover and posing as an out of work artist looking for a new career.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Kristen Flynn, the boss of Premiere Van Lines. She’s a woman with a formidable reputation. Her own staff call her “Frugal Flynn” because she watches the pennies to protect profit.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO John Tracogna goes undercover at Canada’s largest zoo to get up close and personal with endangered wildlife and the people that keep the organization running.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Mark King, the CEO of the world’s top golf equipment brand, Taylor Made, goes undercover as Al Bower, an unemployed golf enthusiast trying to land his dream job in the golf industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Michael Sneyd, CEO of mega resort business Skyline International Development, goes undercover to get creative with the employees at the foot of the chain and take their ideas to new heights.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Lynne Zappone, the Chief Talent Officer of Popeye’s Louisiana Kitchen, a restaurant chain that generates more than $2 billion in annual revenue, goes undercover posing as a participant in a reality show called Job Swap.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Stephen J. Cloobeck, the Chairman and CEO of Diamond Resorts International, is going undercover as a man pursuing his dream job in the hospitality industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Catherine Monson is the driving force behind Fastsigns which is America’s largest custom sign franchise company. During her journey, Catherine finds out it’s really the personal discoveries that make this experience a life-changing one.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: This episode nets an exclusive “behind the scenes” look at what it really takes to get fish on our dinner plates.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Jose Mas, the CEO of MasTec, one of the largest builders of telecommunication and energy systems in North America, poses as a recently laid off high school basketball coach, getting a second chance at starting a new career.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.

channel.desc: Undercover Boss takes real life big corporation CEOs out of their comfort zone, to work undercover within their own companies amongst their unsuspecting workforce. Will they be satisfied with what they uncover?

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Barrels of Boos
programme.desc: For Season 10's premiere episode, TAPS is heading back out on the American Whiskey Trail to investigate the Wild Turkey Distillery in Kentucky. It's believed that the spirits of founding family members are behind the activity there!

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Distillery of Spirits
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to Buffalo Trace Distillery in Frankfort, Kentucky to investigate hauntings at the oldest operating distillery in America.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Overdue For Death
programme.desc: Newly designated as a \\"Literary Landmark,\\" this library is consumed with ghostly visitors with a thirst for knowledge.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Houghton Hears A Who?
programme.desc: TAPS investigates Houghton Mansionin North Adams, Massachusetts where the repercussions of a deadly car accident could be behind unexplained phenomena on the property.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Prescription For Fear
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Bartonville, Illinois to investigate the Peoria Asylum.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Roller Ghoster
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters,TAPS heads to Ohio to investigate Kings Island, anamusement park that sits on land that was thesite of an awful accident.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Ghosts of Christmas Past
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS gets intothe Christmas spirit at New Hampshire's Christmas Farm Inn.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Something in the Water
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS is called to Excelsior Springs, Missouri to investigate The Elms Resort & Spa.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Curtain Call
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to Joliet, Illinois to investigate the Rialto Square Theater, which is becoming known for being more than just an entertainment venue.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Fear Factory
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Claremont, New Hampshire to investigate a former shoe and furniture factory, the Topstone Mill. What was once an abandoned space has now become a restaurant and bar...

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: TAPS Meets the Real Housewives of Atlanta
programme.sub-title: TAPS Meets the Real Housewives of Atlanta
programme.desc: The Ghost Hunters enlist the help of Bravo's The Real Housewives of Atlanta as they embark on this week's investigation.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Christmas Spirit
programme.desc: TAPS gets into the spirit with an investigation of Bethlehem, Pennsylvania.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

channel.desc: A team of real-life Ghost Hunters investigate paranormal encounters & try to help people confront whatever these possible supernatural phenomena could be.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz: Rallye the Troops
programme.desc: Mark leaves Will in charge of the shop while working on his super-secret SEMA 2019 build. This leaves George and Dougie to begin the final assembly to the 1970 B7 Challenger. In the body shop a 1970 'Cuda is prepped for its first-coat of Rallye Red.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz: This is Boring
programme.desc: With the shop already filled with restorations Mark takes a road-trip to Boring Oregon to look at a new restoration project. When it turns out to be an unusually well-preserved muscle-car Mark works outside his comfort zone to close the deal.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz: Allysa's Billboard Hit
programme.desc: Allysa and Dougie finish building out the 440 engine for the 1968 GTX currently in assembly. And Allysa and Mark begin one of the most difficult decal applications a White Billboard for the 1970 Cuda' Convertible.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz: Raise the Roof
programme.desc: Dougie does a deep dive when he completely builds out the rear end assembly for our 1969 GTX. Mark and George break out the hydraulics to reverse the damage done to Mark's newest acquisition. And a Graveyard favorite returns.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz: Hellafury
programme.desc: The Graveyard is covered in an unexpected blanket of snow prompting Mark to install its first mausoleum. Meanwhile the ghouls turn their focus on a 1969 GTX installing its ornamentation and chrome.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz: To Beep or Not to Beep
programme.sub-title: To Beep or Not to Beep
programme.desc: While the ghouls finish up the ornamentation and chrome moldings for the 1969 GTX Cousin Dougie enlists the Greenhorn's help to disassemble our first 1970 Road Runner - with careful precision to hopefully find the car's broadcast sheet.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz: Amentini Shaken Not Stirred
programme.desc: The 1970 Challenger in B7 Blue owned by the Amentinis is finished and ready to be revealed. See every moment of its restoration from dead to resurrected and detailed to the way it left the factory floor. This is what Graveyard Carz lives for.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz: Dougon'it
programme.desc: Whether it's building an engine restoring parts or hiding mannequins Mark's Cousin Dougie is on it. He's one of the most pivotal Ghouls working on a vast number of Mopar restoration projects or tasks that are essential to the success of the shop.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz: Baptism by Fire
programme.desc: The Pheonix 'Cuda the car that survived a deadly explosion is ready for its purification. Its rust and metal are seared away to expose its hidden sins. Thus begins the first stage of its monumental rebirth.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz: Parking In-Violetion
programme.desc: In our second to last episode of the season the ghouls shift into high gear to make progress on our In-Violet 1971 'Cuda Convertible. And work begins on our SEMA 2019 build!

programme.title: Graveyard Carz: The Reel Life of GYC
programme.desc: Since 2012 Graveyard Carz has become synonymous with high-quality Mopar Restoration. And the show continues to grow with new fans and new builds each and every year. We pull the curtain back to reveal some of the cast and crew's favorite moments.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz: Fake ID
programme.desc: The black 1971 Hemi 'Cuda tribute build is almost a roller!

programme.title: Graveyard Carz: "I'm a Ragtop Man!"
programme.desc: Mark assists Justin in buttoning up the rear end details of the 1970 roadrunner convertible.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz: Mark's Little Demon
programme.desc: The famous 1971 Mr. Norm's Dodge Demon 340 6-pack is cruising through the shop.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz: A Hunk of Burning Love
programme.desc: What do you get when you cross a bird with a fish? The one and only Phoenix 'Cuda!

programme.title: Graveyard Carz: Tiny Dancer Strikes Again!
programme.desc: Mark illuminates the ultra-rare option of Mopar sunroofs while the team tackles the task of restoring a real M51 power sunroof 1969 Charger R/T SE sunroof.

channel.desc: Pluto TV Motor has a need for speed! On this channel, we celebrate everything that moves fast and has power. From classic cars to renovating old planes. We will show you how it is done.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Hack Green Nuclear Bunker
programme.desc: Yvette and Glen: Built on ancient ground, Hack Green Nuclear Bunker is a hot spot for paranormal activity. Yvette and Glen go it alone and soon experience the bunkers reputation first-hand.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Gloucester Prison P1
programme.desc: HMP Gloucester is a houses a huge selection of buildings, Karl investigates one block where spirits are said to make themselves known on a regular basis.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Gloucester Prison P2
programme.desc: The education block of HMP Gloucester is an eerie set of corridors and empty rooms. Stuart enters for the first time and gradually realises that something is there with him.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Beaumanor Hall
programme.desc: Karl ventures, alone, to the upper floors of this large mansion and id stalked by something that wants to be heard.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Hack Green Bunker
programme.desc: Gregg enters the bunker for the first time and feels its energy. Has he caught the voice of the mysterious woman that some believe was murdered there?

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Eden Camp Museum
programme.desc: Once a prison camp during WWII, Eden Camp is now a museum housing many an artefact and many a ghost. Karl enters the cottage to face the spirits that are said to haunt this once family home.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Hickleton Hall
programme.desc: Once a grand mansion, this huge property is now very much passed it previous grandeur. Stuart investigates the long empty corridors alone and something seems to be following him.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Hack Green Nuclear Bunker
programme.desc: Karl and Stuart head to Hack Green Bunker and witness, first hand, the paranormal activity that regularly occurs there.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Charlton House
programme.desc: Karl investigates Carlton house library for the first time and quickly realises that he is not alone.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Borwick Hall P1
programme.desc: Karl enters Borwick Hall for the first time as he investigates the upper floors.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Borwick Hall P2
programme.desc: Our investigation into Borwick Hall continues as Stuart investigates the middle floors.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Pen-Y-Lan House P1
programme.desc: Karl investigates the outbuildings of this large estate, where many people have witnessed strange occurrences, some he is about to witness first-hand.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Pen-Y-Lan House P2
programme.desc: Stuart investigates the main house alone, although it isn’t long before he feels something is there with him.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Bishton Hall
programme.desc: Yvette takes Glen and Mary into the incredibly haunted Bishton Hall. They start in the upper floors and work their way down to the cellars, but is something following them.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Margam Castle P1
programme.desc: Karl investigates the ground floor back rooms of this landmark castle alone, but soon realises that something is lurking in the shadows.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Margam Castle P2
programme.desc: The upper floors of Margam Castle are said to be haunted by many different spirits, Stuart goes it alone to try and find them.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Dorchester Prison 2 P1
programme.desc: Said to be the Most Haunted prison in the UK, HMP Dorchester is a scary place to be with a group of people but alone it becomes terrifying. Karl investigates the upper cells and gets more than he bargained for.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Dorchester Prison 2 P2
programme.desc: Stuart enters the underbelly of this remarkable building and starts to witness some very strange occurrences.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Armely Mills Cottage
programme.desc: The cottage on the site of Armley Mills is said to be full of paranormal activity so Karl decides to enter, alone and witnesses something that is eager to grab his attention.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Shrewsbury Prison
programme.desc: Abandoned prisons are always a daunting prospect and the Most Haunted team love them. This time Karl takes on HMP Shrewsbury alone and experiences some of the unhappy phantoms that lurk in the shadows.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Samlesbury Hall P1
programme.desc: With a history dating back to 1185, Salmesbury Hall is of the UK’s most historic buildings and said to be one of the most haunted. With ghost stories and sightings all over the building, Stuart investigates the ground floor.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Samlesbury Hall P2
programme.desc: Karl investigates the upper floors of this historic building dating back to 1185, and realises he is not alone.

channel.desc: Pluto TV goes beyond the normal range of human experience in a 24/7 channel dedicated to all things Paranormal.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Leland has a full plate of fugitives in Kona, and the whole family heads to the Big Island to help.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mama's Boys
programme.desc: Dog visits his mother's grave for inspiration before heading out to find Frankie, a violent fugitive hiding in the jungle. The spirit of Ma Chapman seems to help when Dog finds an unusual ally; Frankie's mother.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Lost in Paradise
programme.desc: Dog lectures high school students about the dangers of drugs before going after Joseph, a dangerous fugitive who won't be easy to capture.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Coaching Day
programme.desc: Dog takes the day off to try his hand at coaching, and assigns Tim and Leland to track down a dangerous fugitive on their own. Can the boys prove they can handle it?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Women of Waikiki
programme.desc: The boys get distracted by the bikini-clad lovelies on Waikiki when they hunt for Lucy, a homeless, alcoholic fugitive. Beth is amused by the boys, but this is serious business: Tim will have to pay the bond if Lucy isn't caught.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: To Capture One's Own
programme.desc: Dog faces a tough personal and professional situation when he must hunt down his friend, Ili, who has helped him on many busts. But now Ili's on the other side of the law, and now Dog must bring her in.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Bags and Boxers
programme.desc: Dog is out to make two grabs on two islands in one day. Part of the team is goes to Kona to nab a woman who skipped her court date. Meanwhile, Dog and the others hunt Patrick, a fugitive who's fighting in an Extreme Boxing event on the Big Island.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: Dog has only a few days to catch a woman nicknamed Cats or forfeit Beth's $10,000 bond. But it won't be easy - Cats is eight months pregnant, so Dog will have to lure her in rather than risk a violent grab.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Destiny Love
programme.desc: Dog is in for a big surprise after he catches a fugitive named Jonaven in a sting operation.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: If You Knew Nunu
programme.desc: Dog and the team really have their hands full when they go after a tough guy named Nunu, who leads them on a chase through apartment complexes and a shopping mall before he's finally captured.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Double Trouble
programme.desc: Dog's feeling lucky, so he's going to try to capture two women in one day. The first, Moani, has "crazy" tattooed on her neck and is facing drug charges. The second fugitive, Jade, who turns out to be a tough catch, despite help from Jade's sister.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Island, Small Town
programme.desc: Dog has problems when he goes to a small town on the Big Island of Hawaii to track down a fugitive. In a small town, everyone knows everyone else's business, making it impossible for Dog to hunt in secret.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Jonah is Missing
programme.desc: Dog and the team search for Jonah, a violent and desperate criminal facing?20 years in jail. The trail goes stale when Dog runs into evasive family members and an angry girlfriend.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Suga On My Cuffs
programme.desc: Dog and the team go after Kandice, AKA Candy, AKA Suga, a stripper who didn't make her court appearance. They convince one of her friends to lure her to a supermarket parking lot, where Dog has an easy time fetching the fetching young thing. But then

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mothers and Daughters
programme.desc: Dog and Beth take on the heartbreaking case of Rachel. Rachel's mom bailed her out of jail on condition that she go to AA meetings and stick to a curfew. But Rachel hasn't kept up her end of the bargain, and now her mother wants her back to jail.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Dog Is Smokin'
programme.desc: Dog is trying to cut down on smoking, but it's not easy with his high-stress job. Today, he must track down Walter, a fugitive who believes that the Canadian military has planted a chip in his tooth that allows him to communicate with his van.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: You Snooze, You Lose
programme.desc: Beth designs a luxurious new office for the team and shows it off to Dog, but the bounty hunter is more interested in starting his hunt for Federico, who's been revoked for missing court dates and generally running amuck.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Judgment Day
programme.desc: Dog goes on his a case, which involves Bobby, who's been on parole for three months pending sentencing on an assault charge. Bobby's girlfriend wants him back in jail, and Dog agrees that the Bobby needs to be behind bars.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Moms & Dads
programme.desc: Dog pursues two people whose lives have been ruined by drugs. First, he tracks Mae, who traded a good home and loving family for an ice pipe. The next case involves Jude. His addiction has caused his pregnant wife to fear for her safety.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Do Unto Others
programme.desc: Dog is a rough, tough bounty hunter, but he's a softie at heart, as the two cases in this episode show.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A Helping Hand
programme.desc: Dog answers two very different calls for help from women. In the first case, he helps Leland protect Maria, who's being threatened by her violent husband. Then Dog visit a young woman who's dying and has asked to see Dog as one of her final wishes.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Take Your Daughter to Work Day
programme.sub-title: Take Your Daughter to Work Day
programme.desc: Baby Lyssa, who's just turned 18 and is studying to become a bondsman, gets to do some on-the-job training when she helps Dog hunt for Wayne, who's run out on a bond for second-degree assault.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: In Sickness and In Health
programme.desc: Dog is sick as a dog, but he still must lead the hunt for a fugitive named James. James' girlfriend tries to cover for him, but Dog surprises James in his bedroom and leads him away in cuffs.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: If the Shirt Fits...
programme.desc: Beth buys Dog a shirt with an embroidered chicken, but Dog explains he only wears shirts with pictures of either Jesus or a Harley-Davidson. When it's time to go to work, the team goes after Necia, a fugitive with felony charges pending.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Thief Who Stole Christmas
programme.desc: It's Christmas day, and Dog sets out to nab Raymond, who robs to support his ice habit, and give him a little Christmas gift - shiny new handcuffs.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rock-a-Bye Bounty
programme.desc: Dog and Beth must go after their former housekeeper, Lisa, who's jumped bond. They know this case will be tricky because Lisa knows everyone in the family. Luckily, Beth's nephew, Jason, is visiting and is quickly put to work as the bait.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Father-Hood
programme.desc: Before Tim heads out for a tough day of bounty hunting, he likes to get in a little quality time with his daughter, Summer Rain.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cops and Criminals
programme.desc: After giving a rousing speech to an audience of enthusiastic grade-schoolers, Dog catches up with an old friend, Sheriff Tommy Cayetano, to talk business. Dog's got a tough fugitive, named Mia, to catch and Tommy is happy to lend a hand.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cupid in Cuffs
programme.desc: It's the day before Valentine's Day and love is in the air at Da Kine Bail Bonds--but not for Tapi who has failed to appear in court on theft charges. Dog's plan is to have Leland knock on Tapi's door with a Valentine's gift to draw her out.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bonds of Love
programme.desc: Dog and Beth are finally getting married! They've been together for more than ten years but Dog is determined, as he puts it, to "marry his common law wife the Christian way."

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: To Love and to Cherish
programme.desc: Dog and Beth are off to the Big Island for their wedding. They hope to relax for a few days but it turns out Leland has a fugitive he needs to catch and despite the time limit, neither Dog nor Beth can resist the opportunity to catch a fugitive.

channel.desc: Go on the prowl with real-life bounty hunter Duane "Dog" Chapman, his wife Beth, and their family as they chase down fugitives in the Hawaiian islands. The hunt is on, and Dog always gets his man on this exclusive 24/7 channel.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Fowl Play
programme.desc: Willie finds his office in shambles and alerts the authorities that the warehouse has had a break in.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Sweatin' Bullets
programme.desc: When a heat wave envelops West Monroe the air conditioning unit at the Duck Commander warehouse goes down, turning the duck call assembly room into a boiling sweatshop.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Spring Pong Cleaning
programme.desc: After Korie decides the junk piles in the Duck Commander warehouse are beginning to reach critical mass, she calls on Willie and the guys to do a little company spring-cleaning.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Morning, West Monroe
programme.desc: After attending a local radio show as a guest, Willie sees an opportunity to host a show of his own.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Of Mattresses and Men
programme.desc: The Jase, Si and the guys from the duck call room take a field trip to a brand new local donut shop and quickly find out who amongst them can eat the most delicious treats.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Samurai Si
programme.desc: Willie receives a special gift from a Japanese business associate - a "priceless" samurai sword, which Willie keeps out of the hands of Jase and the guys.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck No, We Won't Go
programme.desc: Willie pushes his work force too far after implementing new "motivational work tactics," and the guys rise up against him and go on strike.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drag Me To Glory
programme.desc: When NASCAR sensation Clint Bowyer pays a visit to the Duck Commander warehouse, Willie and the guys are fired up to spend the day hanging out with the professional racecar driver.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Season Eve
programme.desc: Tomorrow is the opening day of Duck Season and the men are carrying on their tradition of camping on the Robertson Land the night before.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Can't Hardly Weight
programme.desc: Gearing up for his high school reunion, Willie realizes that he could stand to lose a few pounds. Jase and Korie set out to help him drop some weight and the strenuous battle of man-versus-waistline begins.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Shot Thru The Heart
programme.desc: The guys learn from Willie that John Luke is going through his first break up. In order to make him feel better the men decide to take John Luke hunting for nutria, and impart their relationship wisdom.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Here Lizard, Lizard
programme.desc: When the warehouse guys new office pet (a lizard) escapes, they try all they can in order to catch the wily reptile. Proving impossible, the guys finally decide to bring in the big guns to help trap it--Mr. Phil Robertson.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hallu-Si-Nations
programme.desc: With Willie out-of-town, the guys decide to flake off work and leave to brush up the duck blinds on the Robertson land. While out, Si believes he spots what he thinks is the infamous 'Black Panther'.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Let's Go Hunting, Deer
programme.desc: Willie and Jase invite Korie and Missy along on a deer hunt because they believe their wives have become too "city." At Phil and Kay's, Miss Kay decides she wants to frame Phil's original blueprints from the first duck call he created.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Tickets To The Fun Show
programme.desc: During Duck Commander's "Casino Night" party, Si Robertson wins the grand prize of $2000 and decides to buy a massage chair for the duck call room. The massage chair becomes a detriment to the workflow, so Willie takes Si around for a replacement prize.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Be a Lady
programme.desc: Sadie, has a homecoming dance coming up, but Willie doesn't approve of her dress selection. Willie decides to take Sadie out to find her a new "appropriate" dress.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ring Around the Redneck
programme.desc: Though Jase lost his wedding ring long ago, Missy decides it's time for Jase to replace it with a new one. When Jase is duck hunting, once again, he loses the ring.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bass Man Standing
programme.desc: The Duck Commander team is invited to unveil a wing of the local Bass Pro shop that will feature their products.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Battle of the Brothers
programme.desc: Willie's suspicious behavior from dyeing his beard to buying a new motorcycle, makes Jase come to the conclusion that Willie is having a mid-life crisis.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Aloha, Robertsons!
programme.desc: After all their hard work, Willie decides to take the entire Robertson clan on a family vacation to Hawaii. But Willie's daily itinerary for the trip gets constantly undermined by the family's desire to participate in their own island activities.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Till Duck Do Us Part
programme.desc: Everyone comes together to plan a surprise wedding for Phil and Kay, setting up a special ceremony on their land, which the whole family attends. Si distracts Phil and Kay by taking them on a "trip down memory lane".

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: So You Think You Can Date?
programme.sub-title: So You Think You Can Date?
programme.desc: After discovering that Martin has to miss a Friday night poker game for a date, the guys (as well as their wives) take turns figuring out the best way to coach him for romance. When babysitting for Jep and Jessica turns into a rocky road.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hot Tub Grime Machine
programme.desc: The guys realize that Godwin has never really asked them for a favor, even though they are all always helping each other out. Godwin asks them to help him get a hot tub, so they set out to help him pick one up.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A-Jase-ent Living
programme.desc: Due to construction at Jase and Missy's house, Willie and Korie invite Jase and the kids to live with them while Missy is out of town visiting friends. Then, what begins in the duck call room as a series of "Gentlemen's Bets".

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Termite Be a Problem
programme.desc: Because of a termite problem at Duck Commander, the guys are forced to find a different location to work from - Godwin's House. But while at Godwin's house, Godwin gets a taxidermied gift from a past relative.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: John Luke After Dentist
programme.desc: John Luke and Sadie are getting some dental work done, complete with sedation, and it's up to Willie and Korie to take care of them through the process - including getting them back home safely.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Scoot Along Si
programme.desc: Si shows up to work on a mobility scooter, claiming to have an invisible injury from a fender bender with Willie. After losing her beloved turtle "Mr. T", Ms. Kay enlists Phil on a mission to find a new pet turtle.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Jerky Boys
programme.desc: A decision to try and make some duck jerky leads the boys to Godwin's garage and a minibike race. Phil and Kay have made Willie the executor of their will, and Phil wants to show Willie what he and his brothers will inherit when he and Kay pass away.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Going Si-ral
programme.desc: Si discovers Youtube, and, after watching a series of instructional videos, decides he can make something better. John Luke totals Willie's truck, and Willie realizes he may be raising the two worst drivers in all of Louisiana.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack-O-Lantern
programme.desc: The Robertsons host a Halloween event at Duck Commander, where they all come together to transform the warehouse into a "scarehouse." Everyone dresses up and Willie desperately tries to be the scariest, but none of the kids are afraid of him.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: O Little Town of West Monroe
programme.sub-title: O Little Town of West Monroe
programme.desc: The Robertsons perform a live nativity for their Church for Christmas, so the wives organize rehearsals to ensure that they pull off a great event. However, rehearsals get off to a bumpy start as the guys can't stop sharing their opinions.

channel.desc: Duck Dynasty has its very own 24/7 channel! Expect plenty of outlandish behaviour, feuds, comedy & of course…ducks, all in this rags-to-riches reality series.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Warzone at the Worksite
programme.desc: Ronnie's gotten a raise and a promotion, and Carlos's jealousy sends him looking for more appreciation. But when his quest for glory goes wrong, will it turn the entire team against him? Matt and Sonia wrangle with a small business owner.

programme.title: Operation Repo: A Vengeful Streak
programme.desc: Matt and Ronnie repo a Porsche from a maniac; Carlos and Ronnie come face to face during their repo of a cable van.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Roll the Dice
programme.desc: When Ronnie takes the fall for losing their previous repo, Carlos tries to make amends.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Lou's Big Gamble
programme.desc: It's a brand new start for the Operation Repo team when Lou bets big on a high-risk opportunity and sets up shop in Las Vegas! But first, Ronnie and Froy must wrangle a wrestling ring from a Lucha Libre school.

programme.title: Operation Repo: All In
programme.desc: The team is ahead of schedule on their Vegas mission, but will it all be derailed when Froy brings unwanted trouble back to the office? Also, Ronnie and Froy run into an unexpected dilemma when a husband's better halves take the reins.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Viva Las Vegas!
programme.desc: An Elvis impersonator gets Matt and Ronnie all shook up, and a ventriloquist's dummy has a nasty attitude that gets on Sonia's bad side. When Froy goes missing, Lou has to pick up the slack in a repo that goes terribly wrong.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Go Big or Go Home
programme.desc: Fuming over Froy's departure, Matt loses his temper on a dominatrix and her client and packs his bags to return to LA.? Down two repo men, the pressure is on Ronnie and Carlos, who interrupts a couple in the middle of their less-than-holy matrimony.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Bouquets and Blowtorches
programme.desc: The team returns from a successful mission in Vegas, but there's trouble brewing within the crew's ranks. Ronnie and Carlos repo from a self-defense instructor who lets his students do his dirty work.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Doomsday Prep
programme.desc: Matt and Froy struggle with language barriers when an Italian photographer and his assistant resort to violence because they can't comprehend. Will Sonia finally reveal what's happening, or will carrying her brother's burden get the best of her?

programme.title: Operation Repo: Sugardaddy Shakedown
programme.desc: The team wonders what's up with Sonia as she wrestles with Lou's big secret. Ronnie goes undercover and takes a gold-digging RO out on a date, but when Carlos lets the cat out of the bag all hell breaks loose.

programme.title: Operation Repo: The New Boss
programme.desc: Lou has retired, making Sonia the new boss, but will she be able to keep the company going without her big brother? Matt and Ronnie try to take a car away from a yuppie with an unusual taste for red meat.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Hayseed Inferno
programme.desc: Sonia pushes the company to repossess more than just cars, and the backlash from the team threatens to end her time in charge before it's even begun. Ronnie and Matt attempt to repo from a reckless motocross daredevil.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Bullseye!
programme.desc: Sonia, the new boss, is still struggling to keep the team in line, but when tragedy strikes on a routine repossession, her reign at the top faces its biggest challenge yet. Matt and Froy hit the club to take a sports car away from a deadbeat DJ.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Phi Alpha Fail
programme.desc: Carlos goes undercover at a frat house, but when the party gets the best of him Sonia has to step in and fight the drunken mob. Matt and Ronnie go after some wanna-be internet sensations.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Boys with Toys
programme.desc: Matt is eager to work his way onto Sonia's coveted airplane repo, despite her adamancy against him.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Mile High Mayhem
programme.desc: On this special season finale of Operation Repo, the team gears up for a mile-high repo of a lifetime! Froy and Sonia repo a water blob from a lake house, but the RO and his friends refuse to let this deflate their party.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Reclaim the Plane
programme.desc: In the premiere of the final season of Operation Repo, the team must recover an airplane and return one hundred thousand dollars. But two members of the team bail when it's time to save the company.

programme.title: Operation Repo: First Rule of Repo
programme.desc: Froy and Sonia encounter a city employee who tries to give them the boot, and a mechanic's shady scheme comes crashing down on Matt and Ronnie. With Froy still in debt to Sonia, an RO's offer to make a quick buck convinces Froy to break the first rule.

programme.title: American Hoggers: Calf Killer
programme.desc: At the Y5 Ranch, wild hogs are killing cattle and eating calves. With their usual hand, Lea, unavailable, Robert hires a young hand to help out the family, but Krystal and Jerry aren't sure the new kid has what it takes to make it as a hog hunter.

programme.title: American Hoggers: Sour Grapes
programme.desc: Working close to the delicate grape vines forces the family to replace Jerry's traditional hunting methods with Robert's new strategy. Never happy to take a backseat, Jerry looks for hunting work in the farming community of Haskell, Texas.

programme.title: American Hoggers: Boar Wars
programme.desc: The Campbells tackle their biggest job yet: a ranch so overrun with hogs, the owners are on the verge of selling the property. But the size of the ranch has Jerry worried about the safety of taking the job.

programme.title: American Hoggers: Apocalypse Hog
programme.desc: After nearly facing defeat on the 4R Ranch, the Campbells gear up for one last stand. Scouting from a helicopter, Jerry thinks he may have found where the hogs are hiding. But on the ground, a pack of hogs takes Robert, Krystal, and Lea by surprise.

programme.title: American Hoggers: Over the Hill
programme.desc: After rolling his jeep during a hunt, Jerry decides it might be time to 'hang up his spurs,' but when he puts his son Robert in charge of the family business, the news upsets his daughter, Krystal, more than his homemade wild hog sausage.

programme.title: American Hoggers: When Push Comes to Shove
programme.desc: Still smoking after being overlooked to run the family business, Krystal tries to prove she's more qualified than her brother but Robert doesn't take well to having his newfound authority challenged.

programme.title: Ax Men: The Log and Winding Road
programme.desc: In Louisiana, Shelby and his assistant Bob head out looking for logs on his newly repaired two-ton swamp buggy. In Central Florida, the Chapman crew goes to battle against the legendary "Gump" log - the biggest challenge of their career.

programme.title: Ax Men: Swamp Man Boogie
programme.desc: Deep in the Bayou, Shelby hits Lake Ponchartrain with Belinda and Bob to retrieve a massive log he marked years ago. In Florida, it's round two between Chapman and the legendary Gump log.

programme.title: Ax Men: Teepee of Death
programme.desc: In Washington, Rygaard's remaining veterans go old school to keep the team on track. Deep in the Bayou, Shelby and Bob discover a valuable sinker cypress, but reeling it in is easier said then done.

programme.title: Ax Men: Old Log New Tricks
programme.desc: In the Louisiana Bayou, Shelby Stanga's jet boat is in desperate need of repair and he needs to find logs to buy a new engine.

channel.desc: From keeping law and order in Alaska to travelling some of the deadliest routes in the world, follow some extraordinary people as they take on the toughest jobs in the world, so you don’t have to. Pluto TV Tough Jobs - home of the extreme workday!

programme.title: Divorce Court: House Car
programme.desc: Latoya Ward and Davarius Greaves are back for round two! Latoya wants Davarius to become a stay at home dad because he can’t keep a job. Davarius says Latoya sabotages any work he can get and goes out of her way to create hostile environments.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Enough Is Enough
programme.desc: Dwight has had it with Roxy's mental abuse. Dwight says Roxy has cost him multiple jobs because she's constantly harassing him at work, but she says he needs to give her the attention she deserves! Can Judge Toler help them see eye to eye?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Tardy for the Party
programme.desc: Dashia says William is a cheater and spends most of his money on alcohol instead of paying the bills. William says Dashia is sneaky, belittles him, has trust issues and allows her family to interfere in their relationship.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Love on Top
programme.desc: Darnesha still madly loves Pedro even though he recently had a baby with another woman and began a new relationship with a completely different woman. She wants to make it work, but Pedro is happy with his new beau. Is a divorce inevitable?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Super Freak
programme.desc: Khasha says Jermaine is always too busy for her and doesn't respect her. Jermaine says his young girlfriend wants sex all the time and is extremely messy! Can Judge Toler help them find a middle ground?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Heart Break Hotel
programme.desc: Brianna says Steven constantly looks at other women behind her back which has taken a toll on her confidence. He says her overprotectiveness leads to arguments that end up with her accusing him of cheating.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Family Guy
programme.desc: Jazmin's final straw was when Darren brought another woman over and lied about Jazmin being his sister and his daughter being his niece. Darren feels he's a good father who pays the bills and doesn't need to answer to anyone if he's not married.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Lesbihonest
programme.desc: Porcha has had enough of Ivory's promiscuous behavior. He claims Porcha has more tricks and secrets than Houdini and her lying has taken its toll. Can Judge Lynn Toler help this couple or is it time for Cupid to take better aiming lessons?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Hot Girl Summer
programme.desc: Shortly after tying the knot Diana gave Robert an ultimatum: they'd either have an open relationship or she was gone. He wants to save the marriage, but she isn't ready to compromise. Can Diana finally settle with one man, or is this really the end?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Johnny on the Spot
programme.desc: Cornisha says Jawaun leaves for weeks at a time and returns broke and jobless. He says Cornisha is too bossy and picks fights causing him to blow up and take days away to cool down. Will they find a cooling point before their relationship melts down?

programme.title: Divorce Court: I Scream U Scream
programme.desc: Sharee moved in with Brandon shortly after they met, had a child and still no marriage. Brandon wants her to get a full-time job and not work part-time in their business before they get married.

programme.title: Divorce Court: King of Kings
programme.desc: Joel claims he is a king looking for his queen. He says that him and Jerrica would succeed if she would just fall in line in his kingdom. Jerrica says she can no longer accept Joel’s list of rules and take his verbal abuse. She is ready to walk away.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Track Me Down
programme.desc: Briana is suspicious of Geovani because she claims he is way too sexual and can’t keep his hands off her. She thinks that if he has that much drive for her, how could he not have it for other women.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Out for Delivery
programme.desc: Jeanine says Marvin is cheating with co-workers and often meets up with his exes when they visit family in their hometown. He asserts she’s the one who cheated, not him, and she is so insecure she won’t stop bugging him about it.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Drunk in Love
programme.desc: Cheryl Kaplan is fed up with Cody Green’s drinking. She says Cody is unaffectionate and believes he’s cheating. The final straw was when they lost their home and he pressured her to leave behind her daughter in Ohio to live with his family.

programme.title: Divorce Court: The Punisher
programme.desc: Shea says Jessica constantly punishes him due her history of cheating exes. She must know where Shea is every second forcing his friends to cut ties. Jessica has caught Shea lying to her in the past. Can Judge Lynn Toler get them on track?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Down in the DM
programme.desc: Clifford feels that Asia is always searching for things that aren’t there. Asia says she is done with Clifford and the way he uses social media to flirt and cheat with women. Can Judge Lynn Toler help put a stop to the arguing?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Angry Man
programme.desc: Kadaveion and Justice’s anger issues are tearing them apart. Kadaveion doubts he fathered their baby, but Justice says he’s a liar who gave her a STD and is ready to leave him. Can Judge Toler find a solution or have they already made up their minds?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Player of the Year
programme.desc: Jordan says that Taurean is the biggest player with the ladies and still decides to lie about it even after she gave him a chance to have an open relationship. He says he talks to other women because Jordan is unaffectionate and verbally abusive.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Grumpy Old Man
programme.desc: Michaela and Richard’s 30-year age difference has finally taken a toll on their relationship. Richard says he just wants to settle down and enjoy the rest of his life and says that Michaela’s constant nagging is making him rethink marrying her.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Not Man Enough
programme.desc: No matter how hard Demont tries, he's always looking up at the bar Reasha keeps raising. Demont got a promotion and relocated for work, which raised her suspicions of him cheating. Can this couple ignite the spark or is this relationship totaled?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Brexit
programme.desc: Over 17 years of marriage Leon has had countless affairs with other women and Siobhan has had it. She claims all he wants is for her to keep his house clean and pick up after him. Leon argues that the problems stem from Siobhan’s bad drinking habits.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Angry Woman
programme.desc: Rechene Hall and Itarous Parker have been together for over 4 years and are engaged, but Rechene doesn’t trust Itarous because of his lying. Itarous claims Rechene is too immature for a relationship. Is this couple headed down the break-up aisle?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Crazy Sexy Cool
programme.desc: Stephen says Kisha is crazy and can snap in a split second, especially with his mom. He claims she accuses him of cheating, but Kisha is the one bit obsessed with one of her exes still.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Back Seat of My Jeep
programme.desc: Bumping in the night in the back seat of his jeep has caused all our problems! Kelsey says Justin cheats, doesn’t pay bills and is always angry. Justin argues that she’s a liar and doesn’t help around the house ever.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Irreplaceable
programme.desc: Quanasia can no longer deal with Chandler's lying just so he can have his affairs. Chandler says she lost her drive after having his kids. Can Judge Toler wake her up from Chandler's hypnotizing charm or is this couple a lost cause?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Blame It on the Alcohol
programme.desc: Nikkinba says Muriel is controlling and constantly breaking his phones. He wouldn't return Muriel's calls for days until he quit his job and said that he's leaving her to live in North Carolina. Can they settle down or will he buy a one-way ticket?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Computer Love
programme.desc: As soon as this couple got engaged their romance hit the rocks. Brandi says that Brittanie can’t tell the truth if her life depended on it. Brittanie says Brandi’s insecurities and lack of trust has had a severe effect on their relationship.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Hot Tamale
programme.desc: Madeline says Edward is more of a detective than a husband. Edward says anytime Madeline is upset, she takes it out by destroying property in the house. She has destroyed an entire apartment and he can’t take it anymore.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Thin Line Between Love and Hate
programme.sub-title: Thin Line Between Love and Hate
programme.desc: When the going got tough, Dermartess left his children and Rofiesha. Dermartess says Rofiesha forced him to leave 7 years ago. He still loves her and wants to see his children but believes she was too toxic. Can Judge Lynn Toler save this couple?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stir Crazy
programme.desc: America says that Nathaniel’s controlling ways has taken the relationship to the point of no return. Nathaniel says she’s always flirting with other men and even coming home with a hickies.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Secret Lies
programme.desc: Billy wants Marylu to quit pole dancing and stripping, while she wants Billy to confess if he’s straight or not. Billy has a fetish for wearing women’s underwear and he needs to fess up if he likes women, men or both.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stay with Me Part 1
programme.desc: Johnnie says she suspects Henri of cheating now because he acts indifferent and doesn’t come home most nights. Henri points the finger back claiming Johnnie's not only a cheater, but also enables her family members and has developed a gambling habit.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stay with Me Part 2
programme.desc: Johnnie says she suspects Henri of cheating now because he acts indifferent and doesn’t come home most nights. Henri points the finger back claiming Johnnie's not only a cheater, but also enables her family members and has developed a gambling habit.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Dead Weight
programme.desc: They say opposites attract, but Betty is starting to feel weighed down by David. David is lazy and disrespectful for how broke he is all the time. Betty no longer wants to be tied down by being with someone who is always unemployed and lies about it.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Fantasy Fail
programme.desc: Victoria is sick of Casey neglecting his responsibilities. Casey feels like a slave for taking care of the kids while she flies around the world for modeling gigs. Can Casey break out of the Mr. Mom role and start helping with the bills?

channel.desc: Divorced! Wronged! Hunted! On Judge Nosey, find the most intense real-life courtroom drama on TV with the likes of Divorce Court and Eye for An Eye, all here 24/7.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Fight Party Episode
programme.desc: Suzanne's book group and Nick's boxing-match party collide in the family room on the same night, resulting in knock-out clashing.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Nick's Kid Episode
programme.desc: Suzanne suspects that Nick may have fathered his ex-flame's son. Ice Cube and Kandi Burruss guest star.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Kevin Gets a Commercial Episode
programme.sub-title: The Kevin Gets a Commercial Episode
programme.desc: Kevin's burgeoning career as a child actor has a negative fallout when a potential big break goes to his head. Ted Lange guest stars.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Suzanne's Surprise Party Episode
programme.desc: Nick secretly plans a surprise for Suzanne to help her overcome a traumatic childhood experience.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Mother's Day Episode
programme.desc: Suzanne and Marilyn convene for a spa weekend for Mother's Day, but friction soon mounts between the two.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Lindsey Goes Vegan Episode
programme.desc: Lindsey decides to take on a vegan diet and lifestyle, but she may have ulterior motives in doing so.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Staycation Episode
programme.desc: Nick tries to give his family the best vacation ever but things do not go well at all.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Thief Episode
programme.desc: Lindsey steals sixty dollars from Gigi's wallet and turns back around and blames Kevin for it.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's The Oval: It's Over
programme.desc: Allan decides to take matters into his own hands and catches Kyle off guard in the process (S4, ep8)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's The Oval: Out Of Line
programme.desc: David gets serious with Jason and questions him about his suicide attempt. (S4, ep9)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's The Oval: Truth Be Told
programme.desc: The President and the First Lady are confronted by Eli and Simone about their ugly secrets. (S4, ep10)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's The Oval: What's Done In The Dark
programme.desc: After willingly going to the compound, Nancy is put in a troubling situation. (S4, ep11)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's The Oval: The Stories We Tell
programme.desc: The First Lady becomes skeptical of Donald after finding that Jason is still alive. (S4, ep12)

programme.title: Run's House: Tapper's Delight
programme.desc: Vanessa and Angela nurture Russy's new passion: tap dancing. Diggy plays his sisters into getting him a mini-fridge for his bedroom. Rev tries to babyproof the house.

programme.title: Run's House: An Office He Can't Refuse
programme.desc: Rev tries to become an office worker at the remarkable Global Grind. Diggy's clean freak behavior borders on germaphobia.

programme.title: Run's House: Mother Smother
programme.desc: Diggy and Russy get annoyed by their Mom getting in their business while older siblings Angela and Vanessa don't mind Justine's ways. JoJo helps Rev find a new wardrobe.

programme.title: Run's House: The Puppy Whisperer
programme.desc: Justine and the boys try to train their dog Pal to convince Rev they're worthy of another dog. JoJo cooks healthy fried chicken for his parents.

programme.title: Run's House: Hall of Fame
programme.desc: Rev tries to figure out what Run DMC getting inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame is all about. Angela and Vanessa celebrate the 2-year anniversary for Pastry.

programme.title: Run's House: Series Premiere
programme.desc: Daughter Angela is graduating from high school, and Run plans to reward her for being a straight-A student and the family's "role model" by throwing her a party.

programme.title: Run's House: The Birds and the Bees
programme.desc: Run invites an emerging hip-hop band, Union Turnpike, to the house to strategize their pitch to Russell Simmons' new music label.

programme.title: Run's House: Chicks Fly the Coop
programme.desc: Run's blood boils upon finding that his backyard pool house has become filled with family junk. He vows to clean it out, which unleashes conflict with every family member who wants to hang onto some possession.

programme.title: Run's House: Go for the Gold
programme.desc: Run often talks about how much he loves to win, but it's not until we see his family compete against one another that we understand that the drive to dominate runs thick in the Simmons blood.

programme.title: Run's House: JoJo Wins and Justine Loses
programme.desc: After overindulging at Russell Simmons' remarkable star-studded charity bash in the Hamptons, Justine decides to go on a diet. Determined to make it work, she enlists the help of a personal trainer.

programme.title: Run's House: Run's Family Vacation
programme.desc: When Vanessa gets a call from her Ford modeling agent to do a fashion shoot in Colorado, Run decides that bringing the family along for a summer vacation would be the perfect adventure to share before school starts.

programme.title: Run's House: Baby Fever
programme.desc: Looking at baby photos sparks Justine's desire to have another baby. Rev Run tries to convince Justine otherwise, but she is certain about what she wants.

programme.title: Sister, Sister: The Tutor
programme.desc: When a high school football star needs a tutor, Tamera pretends to be Tia so she can teach him a special lesson in "chemistry"!

programme.title: Sister, Sister: History A La Cart
programme.desc: An embarrassing arrest from his college days comes back to haunt Ray, and Lisa turns an inheritance into a shopping spree

programme.title: Sister, Sister: Grandpa Campbell
programme.desc: When Ray's ne'er-do-well father comes for a visit, he turns the household upside-down -- and turns Tamera into a ruthless businesswoman!

channel.desc: Kick back and enjoy the best of Black Hollywood through all your favorite urban series! Featuring reality shows and box office hit dramas, this channel is guaranteed to have everything you’ve been waiting for in one place.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Paranormal Intervention
programme.desc: Carol Ann stays awake every night taping the voices of the dead. PRS cuts their winter break short to help her curtail her obsession and close this doorway to the dead--for good.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Pet Cemetery
programme.desc: Ryan and his team investigate the bizarre haunting of a woman and her dog in Waterboro, Maine. The Labrador was chewing at her own fur and standing on guard on the bed, growling at unseen figures.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dwelling of the Dead
programme.desc: A single mom claims she is being physically assaulted by a spirit in her Kentucky home. Ryan first explores a natural explanation for the alleged phenomena. But the client's five-year-old son also sees spirits, and his sightings appear to line up.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Sickness
programme.desc: Something is making Lisa and her family sick. Is it natural or paranormal? Ryan and the team uncover the tragic history surrounding Lisa's home--with shocking connections to respiratory illness.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Room & Board
programme.desc: The owners of a vacation lodge in the remote town of North Hudson, NY, feel their woodsy getaway is plagued by negative spirits.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Haunted Connection
programme.desc: P.R.S. is called in to help a young mother tormented by an otherworldly connection to a teenage girl murdered in her neighborhood years ago. Could she have psychic ability or is there a more sinister force at work?

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Devil in Syracuse
programme.desc: The clients are new, but the spirit is all too familiar as Ryan Buell prepares himself to battle the taunting demon that has been following him.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Firehouse
programme.desc: Everyone from the chief to the trainees at the Clementon Fire Department is convinced that the ghost of a former member is haunting their firehouse.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Vendetta
programme.desc: P.R.S. investigates claims of supernatural revenge in the Pennsylvania Poconos. When a client's new boyfriend moves in, does the paranormal move in with him? Or did her ex put a hex on her house and the entire family?

programme.title: Paranormal State: Hostage to Fear
programme.desc: P.R.S. is summoned to help a family who has been haunted for years by spirits lurking in the house. Upon arrival the team finds a family that has become prisoners in their own home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Messenger
programme.desc: Kelli and her husband Riley are frightened in their coastal Oregon home. They are plagued by a headless apparition and often hear mysterious noises that resemble cries for help from the dark corners of their house.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Cemetery
programme.desc: PRS visits a gothic graveyard, where a jealous spirit seems to be preying on the newlywed wife of the cemetery's caretaker. Ryan traces the haunting to a mysterious, unclaimed cremation urn on the grounds.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Family Ties
programme.desc: Jimmie is haunted by the apparition of a mysterious old woman who peers at him in the bathroom of his family's Petersburg, VA home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Darkness Falls
programme.desc: Ryan leads his team to one of the most haunted places in the US to confront their fears and solve a paranormal mystery. Aside from the alleged spirits of dead prisoners, something even darker may be lurking inside West Virginia State Penitentiary.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Satan's Soldier
programme.desc: Mark and Kim can't sleep through the racket caused by unseen forces in their central Indiana home. When PRS and Psychic/Medium Michelle Belanger discover what appears to be blood in the basement, they investigate a history of violence in the home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Do Bad Things
programme.desc: After receiving a letter requesting PRS' help, Ryan and the team head to Ohio to help a grieving family and determine if the family's house contributed to the untimely death of a daughter.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Supernatural Seduction
programme.desc: PRS investigates the Campbell House, where the Innkeeper and guests claim to have sexual encounters with a spirit who has deep ties to a family tragedy.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Drowned
programme.desc: Kim and her family have been frightened out of their seaside Maryland home. Multiple family members have reported sightings of children with purple lips and strange noises emanating from the nearby creek.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Anniversary
programme.desc: Ever since a close-knit Kentucky family moved into their new home, they've been visited by the spirit of a young girl.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Desperate Households
programme.desc: When Julie and her family moved into their dream home in suburban New Jersey they quickly realized they were not alone.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Suicide Possession
programme.desc: Joan and her boyfriend Tony are seeing apparitions in their New Jersey home. Both are concerned that the spirits are influencing their behavior: a non-drinker, Tony has turned to the bottle while Joan has thoughts of harming herself.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Basement
programme.desc: A history of violence may connect the spiritual activity in Heidi's Ohio home to a long run of misery and cruelty.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dark Practice
programme.desc: Brenda is terrified by a dark hooded figure spotted in her West Virginia home. The same entity allegedly tormented her late husband. PRS and Psychic/Medium Michelle Belanger help Brenda before she slips into the same abyss as her late husband.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Death Room
programme.desc: PRS arrives in Ryan's hometown to help the new owner of an old southern plantation unearth its dark history.?A painful family secret reveals a tale of greed and neglect, and the team must help free its unwilling victim from her spiritual prison.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Haunted Homecoming
programme.desc: Ryan brings PRS to his hometown of Sumter, SC to investigate a chilling case where a young boy was tragically shot and killed on a front doorstep while trick-or-treating on Halloween.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Shape Shifter
programme.desc: PRS travels to Shapleigh, Maine where a woman and her daughter are reporting attacks from a winged creature with sharp teeth. Psychic Chip Coffey arrives and senses a half-human, half animal presence.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Who Is the Lurking Man?
programme.desc: PRS travels to Newcastle, CA to investigate a house with paranormal forces so strong, the family has cleared out. Ryan believes the Native American land may hold the key to the mystery and leads the team in a fight to reclaim a scared family's house.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Invitation to Evil
programme.desc: Paula and her husband Mike are under siege by a purported shadow demon in their North Carolina home. Paula has witnessed a toddler bed levitating and heard deep growls. Michelle, Ryan and the team uncover the shocking truth behind the haunting.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Knickerbocker
programme.desc: PRS checks into the Knickerbocker Hotel in Linesville, Pennsylvania where the owners are reporting strange noises and the appearance of phantom children in some of the rooms.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Get Out of This House
programme.desc: When an aggressive spirit stalks a young family, PRS is called in to investigate. When it is determined that the source of the haunting may have been unknowingly invited in, Ryan races to identify and hopefully defeat the entity before it's too late.

channel.desc: Watch as Ryan and his team investigate disturbances and try to work out what these alleged paranormal phenomena really could be!

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Dorchester Shire Hall P1
programme.desc: Karl investigates the courtroom of one of Dorchester’s most historical buildings and is suddenly surrounded by unexplained occurrences.

programme.title: Most Haunted: 30 East Drive_PT2
programme.desc: The team continue their most threatening investigation yet and for some they will be scared for life mentally and physically. The most violent poltergeist in the world is ready for a fight...but who wins?

programme.title: Most Haunted: Tatton Hall
programme.desc: Something about Tatton Old Hall keeps bringing the Most Haunted team back. Something happens that stops two of the team entering, a poltergeist causes confusion and the team get a clear voice from beyond the veil.

programme.title: EXCLUSIVE TO PLUTO TV Most Haunted S25: GLOUCESTER PRISON Pt1
programme.desc: Yvette Fielding leads her team in a two-part investigation at the foreboding Gloucester Prison, one of Britain's most haunted places, known for its history of death, fear, pain, suicide, and incarceration

programme.title: Most Haunted: Halsham House
programme.desc: Nestled into the British countryside is Halsham house where a poltergeist hides in wait for the team with frightening effect. With bones found in the attic have the team pushed it too far.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Margam Castle P1
programme.desc: Karl investigates the ground floor back rooms of this landmark castle alone, but soon realises that something is lurking in the shadows.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Shrewsbury Prison Pt2
programme.desc: With Yvette and Mary investigating A-Wing, Karl & Stuart take on the formidable C-Wing where the unhappy spirits of past residents are said to roam.

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Galleries of Justice
programme.desc: The legendary ghost hunters continue in Nottingham and a place where people could be jailed, sentenced and executed without even leaving the building.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Oakwell House
programme.desc: The team investigate Oakwell House near Leeds, which was built by ancestors of Fred Batt. In 1684, William Batt returned unexpectedly from a trip to London but vanished leaving a bloody footprint. A demon dog has been seen in the grounds.

programme.title: EXCLUSIVE TO PLUTO TV Most Haunted S25: GLOUCESTER PRISON Pt3
programme.desc: The third part of Yvette Fielding and the team's investigation into the very haunted and abandoned Gloucester Prison. With the team splitting up the activity rises and something is trying to stop Yvette and Glen.

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Moat House Part 2
programme.desc: Yvette heads to Tamworth and a beautiful manor house that is said to be filled with paranormal occurrences. Almost as soon as the team get there something seems to want to make itself known with dramatic effect

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Pen-Y-Lan House P2
programme.desc: Stuart investigates the main house alone, although it isn’t long before he feels something is there with him.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Wentworth Woodhouse Part 1
programme.desc: Part 1. The upper floors of Wentworth House are a maze of corridors and rooms and the team have one night to investigate as many as possible. With one whistling spirit, groans and loud noises the team are shaken to their core.

programme.title: Most Haunted: 30 East Drive_PT1
programme.desc: 30 East Drive is said to house the most violent poltergeist in the world. The team go head first into what becomes their toughest challenge yet. As soon as they enter the property something is waiting and wants to be known.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Dorchester Prison 2 P2
programme.desc: Stuart enters the underbelly of this remarkable building and starts to witness some very strange occurrences.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Nunnington Hall Pt1
programme.desc: Karl investigates the upper floors of this large manor house that is said to be swarming with paranormal activity of every kind, and gets more than he bargained for.

channel.desc: Join Yvette Fielding and the team investigate paranormal happenings at some of the world's most haunted locations, all on their very own 24/7 Most Haunted channel!

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Parents' Day
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark work as police detectives in a school. Their assignment: to investigate drug selling.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Father's Faith
programme.desc: A fisherman's livelihood is in jeopardy because of the amount of time he devotes to his comatose son.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Heavy Date
programme.desc: A young man learns that the girl he's in love with is pregnant.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: A lonely spy-story writer buys her murdered hero's sports car, which comes complete with his ghost.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Gift of Life
programme.desc: A cold-hearted businessman is given the opportunity to relive the last week of his life. And he tries to do the right thing this time.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Man's Best Friend - Part 1
programme.desc: A runaway dog unites a boy in an orphanage with its human family.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Man's Best Friend - Part 2
programme.desc: The orphan boy has formed an attachment to the dog, although he is going away to living with a new foster family.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: A trainer is reminded of his own shady past when a fighter he's been mentoring is asked to take a fall.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The People Next Door
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark must help a doctor confront a secret he's kept from everyone, including his own family.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: I Was a Middle Aged Werewolf
programme.sub-title: I Was a Middle Aged Werewolf
programme.desc: On Halloween night, Jonathan helps a little boy get over his fears, and in the process, get even with his older sister!

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Playing for Keeps
programme.desc: Jonathan casts a retired comic and his movie-star son in a play about a father and son who never got to know each other.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Amazing Man
programme.desc: A youngster turns to a fantasy world and a comic-book superhero to cope with the pain of his father's death.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: All the Colors of the Heart
programme.sub-title: All the Colors of the Heart
programme.desc: An athlete who expects to gain his sight must counsel another man who is certain to lose his.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Why Punish the Children?
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark take on a system that keeps inmate mothers and their children apart.

channel.desc: Binge watch Highway To Heaven, the classic 80s fantasy drama, starring Michael Landon, an angel sent back to Earth to help people in need, right here on it’s very own channel!

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 2
programme.desc: Leopard's Den is helping to build a new school in the township but when Danny hurts his back he begins to have a crisis about his age. Danny and Alice are surprised when Vanessa comes to them for advice.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 3
programme.desc: Mara is hosting a beauty pageant and Rowan realises he needs all the publicity he can get. He buys a tiger from a zoo and convinces Alice he plans to rehabilitate it. Alice is enjoying working with her brother and even defends him to Danny.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 4
programme.desc: Danny and Alice have been preparing a cheetah for release in the wild but for some reason Danny's mind isn't on the job. He's been pre-occupied because he plans to buy a ring and propose to Alice!

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 5
programme.desc: Danny and Alice are taking a well deserved holiday but Olivia's upset to learn they're leaving that day. Angry at missing out on a driving lesson, she decides to take the jeep out on her own.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 6
programme.desc: Alice is enjoying her new job at Mara even though her animal census has revealed they have a lone male hyena that needs a pack. Du Plessis isn't happy about Alice working for next door.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 7
programme.desc: Danny's continued estrangement from Alice is really starting to take its toll. Over at Mara, Alice puts on a brave face as she meets Tom Cox, the owner of a rare male black leopard.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 8
programme.desc: Caroline returns to find that all is not well at Leopard's Den. Danny has been putting a brave face on his ban but his attempts at helping out around the house are getting on everyone's nerves and Alice is finding his back-seat vetting especially hard.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 9
programme.desc: Danny is delighted to have his veterinary license back again and being back at work is helping to distract him from the impending anniversary of Sarah's death.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 10
programme.desc: Du Plessis is restless after his heart surgery but the family insist he needs to relax. Meanwhile Danny and Alice are happy to have closed down a zoo down that has been mistreating animals.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 1
programme.desc: While on honeymoon in London, Alice discovers that Danny has some final business to do before they can return home to Africa. He's reluctantly arranged to meet his estranged father, Robert, who has recently got back in touch.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 2
programme.desc: Danny is throwing himself into his work after the death of his father, and has applied for the role of State Vet. However, Danny's attempts to involve Thabo in the first phase of the Lion Breeding Project lead to Du Plessis feeling like an outsider.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 3
programme.desc: It is Danny's first day as State Vet and when he helps rescue some smuggled animals he feels he's making a difference. However, he discovers the role isn't going to be all plain sailing.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 4
programme.desc: Danny's first big project as State Vet is a major animal translocation, and he is desperate to impress. Meanwhile, whilst Alice is out in the bush treating an injured zebra, she is stalked by lions. She makes it back to her jeep in time but is shaken up.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 5
programme.desc: Alice is still suffering from a loss of nerve after her close shave with the lions and so Danny tries to help her overcome her problems – the Leopard's Den lions have produced their first cub and he needs Alice back in the saddle.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 6
programme.desc: In his role as State Vet, Danny works with wealthy conservationist, Anton Ziegler, to catch a group of leopard hunters. Ziegler is also buying a tiger from Vanessa, who struggling with her finances, desperately needs the money to ensure Mara's future.

channel.desc: Wild at Heart, the feel good British family drama series, which sees Bristol Vet (Stephen Tompkinson) and his family emigrating to start a game park in South Africa. Watch it now 24/7!

programme.title: Bridezillas
programme.desc: Binge on the international pop culture phenomenon Bridezillas and satisfy your inner beauty monster. Follow brides on their tumultuous journeys leading up to the big day.
