programme.title: Homicide Hunter: John 3:16
programme.desc: A man rushes his friend to the hospital with serious gunshot wounds, reporting they were robbed by strangers. When the facts don’t add up, Lt. Joe Kenda and his team go on the hunt.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Justified
programme.desc: A young man is found gunned down, leading Lt. Joe Kenda to delve into his troubled past and his connection to the world of rare coins.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Trust No One
programme.desc: When martial arts enthusiast Carl Hunt suffers a fatal knife wound to the gut, his friends and neighbors offer few viable leads. But Kenda discovers blood evidence that proves he’s being lied to.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: The Case That Haunts Me
programme.desc: As Det. Joe Kenda digs into another murder, he uncovers a world of violence and sexual fetishes, culminating in perhaps the most intense interrogation of his career.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Chance Encounter
programme.desc: When firefighters find Victor Woods stabbed to death in his burning apartment, homicide detective Joe Kenda tracks Colorado's most notorious serial killer.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: .357 Magnum
programme.desc: The murder of a popular teen at a crowded house party sends Kenda down a winding road paved with lies, misdirection and innuendo.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: The Uninvited Guest
programme.desc: A soldier is stabbed to death at a drive-thru. Kenda’s only clue is that this is somehow tied to a breakdancing competition.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Mr. LA
programme.desc: A young man tries to flee a violent scene, but is shot dead behind the wheel of his car. A peculiar clue puts Kenda hot on the heels of a self-styled gangster with revenge on his mind.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: A Prayer for the Dying
programme.desc: A mother of two is found dead in the most expensive part of Colorado Springs, leaving Lt. Joe Kenda stumped—until he looks into her personal life.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Poker Face
programme.desc: A group of friends discover the corpse of entrepreneur Jamie Foster hidden under a blanket. Kenda e discovers that Foster’s business put him in close quarters with a host of unsavory characters.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Knock Knock
programme.desc: A gathering of friends turns deadly when two gunmen shoot William Davis in the head. Kenda and his team dig into his past and start to suspect someone in William’s circle is lying.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Death Rains Down
programme.desc: Restaurant worker Sharon Coleman is murdered in a hail of large caliber gunfire. Kenda must break through a web of lies to hunt down one of the most dangerous criminal masterminds he’s ever faced.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: My, My, Merry Christmas
programme.desc: Donald Ott is found shot to death, friends tell police he didn’t have an enemy in the world. But when Lt. Joe Kenda speaks with family, he learns of a relative who might hold the key to the mystery.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Snitch
programme.desc: When officers respond to a shooting , they discover the body of a young man they know all to well -- police informant Jimmie Stevenson. it’s up to Lt. Joe Kenda to determine who pulled the trigger.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Time Bomb
programme.desc: In 1978, Lt. Joe Kenda is new to the CSPD, and gets more than he bargains for when a local bank is the target of a massive explosion.

channel.desc: Joe Kenda has solved 387 homicide investigations, with a 92% solve rate. Each episode of Homicide Hunter uses Kenda’s first person narrative along with dramatic re-creations to retell the stores of his most disturbing and challenging murder cases.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Buddy: Red Alert
programme.desc: Pit Bull Buddy, was found chained and starving to death and was very aggressive. Rufus, a Rottweiler/Shar Pei mix, has bitten five people. Both need to get their aggression under control.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Chloe, Gotti and Madison
programme.desc: A Border Collie/Greyhound mix develops dog aggression; an inherited pooch who was raised "Cesar's Way" loses his confidence; and 150 pound Leonberger, Madison, is like a bull in a china shop.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Anger Management
programme.desc: Cesar helps the lead singer of Rooney with his aggressive pit bull, while writer and producer Paul needs help with his two Boston terriers.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Ava & Gus
programme.desc: Ava, a Pug/Pekingese swiftly twirls for all occasions, possibly a neurological condition Cesar cannot treat. Gus the Bouvier greets people by throwing his 100 pound body at them.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Seven, Sara, and Madeliene
programme.desc: Jillian Michael’s Greyhound mix barks and nips at her horse. A German Shorthaired Pointer is an escape artist. A Yorkie demonstrates fear aggression of brooms and car windshield wipers.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: The Dog Whisperer: Cesar Down Under
programme.sub-title: The Dog Whisperer: Cesar Down Under
programme.desc: Paul Watson can't stop his great Dane, from biting at him. Andrea and Adrian avoid taking their Bearded Collie to the dog park because of her. Cesar travels down under to tame them.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Sooner & Trace, and Casanova
programme.desc: Not a lover, but a fighter, a young dog attacks other dogs while on leash. Two formerly friendly sibling dogs are now at each others’ throats. Can Cesar keep these dogs in line?

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Viper and Diesel
programme.desc: Viper, a trained K9 detection dog is unable to enter a prison because of his fear of strangers. Family dog, Diesel, took a turn for the worse when his canine companion, Chopper, passed away.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Special: 100th Episode Celebration
programme.desc: Participants from more than 200 stories featured on Dog Whisperer parade down the red carpet to celebrate the 100th Episode of Dog Whisperer with Cesar Millan.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Mascot Mayhem
programme.desc: A German shepherd might be evicted because of his barking, and a bulldog with behavior issues isn't welcome at her owner's café. Can Cesar help?

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Boyfriend & Alfie
programme.desc: “Boyfriend” is a Shephard mix that has repeatedly bitten his owner’s boyfriend. Alfie is the aggressive English Bulldog of popular actress/television host Daisy Fuentes.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Wolf-Dogs: Out of the Wild
programme.desc: The crossing of wolves and domestic dogs has led to a whole new set of problems with the wolf-dog hybrid. Cesar brings in wolf-dog expert Jennifer McCarthy to aid him in this special episode.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Jake & King
programme.desc: Jake tends to mind his owner Bob but goes crazy to protect Bob’s wife Linda. At the same time, all of 10 year old Chantel’s might is hardly enough for 150 pound King to even take notice.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Josh & Boomer
programme.desc: Josh, a Maltese, will not let anyone with a brush or pair of scissors near him without putting up a fight. Boomer, a Chesapeake Bay Retriever, barks incessantly and refuses to come out of the pool.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Playboy Playmates
programme.desc: The Playboy Mansion in sunny Los Angeles is famous for raucous parties but it’s also home to Playboy founder, Hugh Hefner, some of his Playmates, and their dogs.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Cujo and Molly
programme.desc: Both Mary Jane and her lab-mastiff mix, Cujo, get help tackling their challenges. And Jack Russell mix Molly learns to adapt to her working environment.

channel.desc: Cesar Millan is one of the most renowned and sought-after experts working in the field of dog training. This is not just a series about dog training, it’s people training for dogs. Each episode tackles real-life problems faced by dog owners everywhere.

programme.title: Baywatch: Dolphin Quest
programme.desc: Cody accompanies Alex on a vacation to Hawaii where she wants to take her autistic 10-year-old nephew, Timmy, to swim with dolphin in the local lagoon. Cody spends quality time with Lani's sister, Callie, a local Hawaiian lifeguard.

programme.title: Baywatch: The Natural
programme.desc: A mysterious lifeguard makes rescues around Baywatch, then vanishes. After going over Mitch's head one too many times, Alex gets an annoying new partner.

programme.title: Baywatch: Drop Zone
programme.desc: April suffers PTSD after losing a rescue victim. Mitch and the victim's widow refuse to give up searching for his body. Jessie runs into an old beau who could undermine her future at Baywatch.

programme.title: Baywatch: Hot Summer Night
programme.desc: Hobie struggles with his irresponsible actions leading to a boating accident that leaves a girl in a coma. Jessie is gripped with fear after April tells her of a recent, job-related tragedy.

programme.title: Baywatch: Swept Away
programme.desc: Mitch befriends a boy who joins junior lifeguards in hopes of escaping a brutal home life. Jessie makes a passionate play for JD. Alex auditions for “Jeopardy!”

programme.title: Baywatch: The Swimmer
programme.desc: Upset about his failed marriage to Neely, Mitch goes for a day-long tower swim along the beach and encounters problems that distract from his own, including April and Craig's May/December romance, and reluctant heroes Cody and JD.

programme.title: Baywatch: Friends Forever
programme.desc: A young, hearing-impaired girl learns a lesson in friendship when she, Mitch and Alex protect an orangutan, while Cody and Jessie deal with its abusive owner.

programme.title: Baywatch: The Edge
programme.desc: Cody puts his career, and his life, on the line when he uses a performance-enhancing supplement in hopes of making the Olympic swim team. Alex becomes the object of Mitch's rejection, and Newmie's affection.

programme.title: Baywatch: The Big Blue
programme.desc: Mitch tries to reunite an Army parachutist with her estranged Naval-officer father, while Cody helps a beautiful woman try to reach record-setting depths at a national free-diving competition.

programme.title: Baywatch: Come Fly with Me
programme.desc: After he tries to save Tanner from his abusive father, Mitch ends up on the wrong side of the law. Meanwhile, Jessie's irresistible charm makes a stunt pilot's heart take flight.

programme.title: Baywatch: Boys will be Boys
programme.desc: When caught up in a high-risk adventure at sea, Craig tells Mitch a shocking secret. Meanwhile, Jessie works to creatively end JD and Cody's rivalry during a beachside triathlon, and April comes clean with Manny.

programme.title: Baywatch: Baywatch Grand Prix
programme.desc: Mitch feels the need for speed when Tanner's cousin, Damon Lusk, a race car driver in town for a major competition, visits Baywatch. Meanwhile, Newmie and the gang develop a TV show about lifeguards that they try to sell it into syndication.

programme.title: Baywatch: Baywatch Down Under, Part 1
programme.desc: After Mitch's lifeguard buddy's ex-wife dies in Australia, Mitch and the team accompany him on a trip down under to meet the son he's never known.

programme.title: Baywatch: Baywatch Down Under, Part 2
programme.desc: While team Baywatch prepares to compete against the Australian guards, Jake must choose between staying down under with his son or returning home. The competing lifeguards must put their intense rivalry aside to save a life.

programme.title: Baywatch: Water Dance
programme.desc: Cody learns a lesson in love when he and Mitch help a troubled violinist escape her dangerously overbearing mentor with a secret agenda. Meanwhile, Alex sets out to prove her worth at Baywatch by retaking the grueling rookie test with Jessie.

programme.title: Baywatch: Double Jeopardy
programme.desc: Alex tries to save a diamond smuggler whose partners want him to "sleep with the fishes." Neely makes Hobie a tempting offer that divides the Buchannon household.

channel.desc: On a Los Angeles beach, a team of lifeguards led by Lieutenant Mitch Buchannon saves lives, deals with personal tragedies, fights crime, and participates in extraordinary adventures every day.

channel.desc: This cult anthology series presents stories that appear to defy logic, ghosts, the supernatural and the divine, and offers the viewer a chance to decide what is fact and what is fiction.

programme.title: The Burning
programme.desc: A mysterious man emerges from the Argentinean rainforest to help a poor farmer and his daughter, who are threatened by a band of mercenaries hired to force them to sell their land.

programme.title: Bloodsucking Bastards
programme.desc: Evan is a low-level, dutiful employee stuck in a boring job at a soul-killing evil corporation but at least he gets to spend his days with his beautiful co-worker and girlfriend Amanda and his slacker best friend Tim.

programme.title: The Haunting
programme.desc: A lawyer who doesn't believe in ghosts is haunted after moving into a family mansion. Starring: Tim Daly, Tom Arnold, Zoe Saldana

programme.title: I Still See You
programme.desc: Bella Thorne stars in this enthralling and tense supernatural thriller. Ten years after an apocalyptic event left the world haunted by ghosts, Roni (Thorne: Midnight Sun) receives a threatening message from beyond the grave.

programme.title: Attack of the Killer Tomatoes
programme.desc: A group of scientists band together to save the world from mutated tomatoes that KILL! (1978)

programme.title: Dark Oracle
programme.desc: When the Dark Oracle predicts Blaze will end his life at midnight, Lance and Cally attempt to make sure it doesn't happen. However, changes in Sage and Lance’s relationship complicate matters.

programme.title: Dark Oracle
programme.desc: Lance is upset when Cally falls for Omen, the new boy in school, who Lance suspects is not what he seems.

programme.title: Dark Oracle
programme.desc: When Cally destroys the comic book it has disastrous and unforeseen results.

programme.title: Dark Oracle
programme.desc: Cally and Lance discover how “Dark Oracle” came into their lives and attempt to get rid of it once and for all.

programme.title: Dark Oracle
programme.desc: The Dark Oracle comic returns with a vengeance and the Stone twins, Cally and Lance are more at risk than ever.

programme.title: Dark Oracle
programme.desc: The comic predicts that a red sports car will get into a terrible accident and when Cally's new crush, Emmett shows up at school with the very same car, Cally is horrified.

programme.title: Dark Oracle
programme.desc: Evil Sage has taken real Sage's place and Lance and Cally are shocked when this new, uncensored Sage devastates Lance by hooking up with Vern.

programme.title: Dark Oracle
programme.desc: Lance is playing an online role-playing game 24/7 and even Dizzy thinks he's out of control. A staged intervention fails utterly and Lance is back at the keyboard.

programme.title: Dark Oracle
programme.desc: Lance and Cally find themselves the unwitting hosts of a house party that goes completely out of control.

programme.title: Dark Oracle
programme.desc: When the comic predicts that Dizzy will become a rock star, the "Dister" surprises everyone by entering a local "Canadian Idol" type contest.

programme.title: Colonel March of Scotland Yard: The Sorcerer
programme.desc: A psychologist is stabbed to death in a seemingly sealed room. Inspector March must find who killed him and how did they accomplish the task.

channel.desc: Horror fans rejoice, your channel is alive. It’s a never ending fright-fest on Pluto TV Horror. Don’t turn on the lights, don’t answer the door, and don’t change that channel.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Jury Duty
programme.desc: Margaret gets called to Jury Duty but Bob has planned a holiday for them and begs her to get herself excused.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Wedding
programme.desc: Cookie and Melvin invite Bob and Margaret to the wedding of their goddaughter, Tiffany.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Age Before Beauty
programme.desc: Margaret gets a new hairstyle but Bob doesn't even notice.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: No Trouble
programme.desc: This charming, witty animated series focuses on the ordinary lives of a middle class dentist and his foot doctor wife. Together, they tackle traumas as being burgled, going on a holiday and deciding whether or not having a child will ruin their lives.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Over-Exposed
programme.desc: Margaret accidentally picks up her neighbour's photos at the pharmacy.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: A New Life
programme.desc: At a creepy chiropodist social night, Bob and Margaret encounter a couple who are rapturous about the new planned community where they now live.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Til Death Do Us
programme.desc: Bob gets conned into buying a cemetery plot for Margaret as a surprise 15th wedding anniversary gift.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Friends for Dinner
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret have been invited to Neil and Moira's for dinner, or so they think.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Strangers in a Strange Land
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret are mortified to discover that while they have been cooped up at Cookie and Melvin's house in Mississauga Ontario, their dogs have been left unattended by Penny, Bob's unreliable receptionist.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Problems
programme.desc: At her clinic one-day, Margaret sees an old school chum, and invites her and her husband Matt to dinner.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Mummy's Boy
programme.desc: Bobs mother is coming all the way from England to visit him.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Book Club
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret join a book club in the hopes of expanding their tiny social horizon.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Fly on the Wall
programme.desc: Feeling belittled by his family, Bob jumps at the chance to be the subject of a fly on the wall documentary.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Neighbours
programme.desc: In this story of neighbourhood social angst, Bob is having a complex burglar alarm installed by Graham, a sad, lonely man whose confidence is lifted immeasurably by this rare sale to Bob.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Party Politics
programme.desc: Margaret runs into a distant friend who asks her to have an Ann Summers-type party in her home.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Bob's Burglary
programme.desc: While Bob and Margaret are sleeping, the local criminals, Beany and Boney clear their house - TV, video, microwave and electric toothbrush all go.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Driving Bob
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret have put it off for too long. They need to get their Canadian drivers' licenses.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Dental Convention
programme.desc: The time for the annual dental convention has come. Bob is not keen on going when he sees that a colleague from his student days, Bernard Wiggins, a "loud mouthed big shot", is a featured speaker.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: A Patient Dies in Bob's Chair
programme.sub-title: A Patient Dies in Bob's Chair
programme.desc: When a patient dies of natural causes while in Bob's surgery, the local papers pick up the story?

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: My Foot Hurts
programme.desc: Margaret gets her own local call-in radio show entitled My Foot Hurts. On the first day, nervous and short on callers, she mentions her favourite curry house on the air?

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Candidate
programme.desc: Margaret finds herself inadvertently running for City Council when the candidate she is supporting drops out of the race.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Stranded in Toronto
programme.desc: When Bob and Margaret take a trip to New York, their flight is re-routed to Toronto due to a storm.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Player
programme.desc: Bob attends a personal finance seminar to help him get his hopeless financial house in order.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Getaway
programme.desc: Margaret is nominated for the Golden Arch Support award for outstanding service in the field of footcare.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: On Location
programme.desc: A film crew sets up shop on Bob and Margaret's street, giving them a small and unsavory taste of fame and fortune.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Outward Bound
programme.desc: Bob joins his male colleagues on a canoe trip to a provincial park.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: A Bob or Two
programme.desc: Bob buys an inexpensive painting from the neighbours at a junk sale (mostly motivated by pity since these neighbours have fallen on hard times) and hangs it in his surgery to brighten things up?

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: I, Bob
programme.desc: When an efficiency expert comes to assess the Inner City Dental Clinic, Bob gets side shifted out of a job.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: A Very Fishy Christmas
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret experience a truly Canadian Christmas.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Mastermind
programme.desc: When Bob and Margaret have a fender-bender with a local mobster, they accidentally turn him into the police.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Love's Labours Lost
programme.desc: While listening to the radio, Bob observes his charmless young assistant Penny, inspiring him to recite odes about youth and innocence.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Undefined Border
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret go cross-border shopping in the United States.

channel.desc: Pluto TV Animation, full of fun, weird, action-packed and classic cartoons that everyone can enjoy!

programme.title: On the Case: Deadly Silence
programme.desc: An 18-year-old woman never returns home after a night out with friends, and the police come up against a wall of silence that keeps them from uncovering the truth.

programme.title: On the Case: One of Us
programme.desc: A young records clerk at the Seattle police department is murdered on her way to work her overnight shift. Can police find the evidence to catch the killer of one of their own?

programme.title: On the Case: Cry on My Shoulder
programme.desc: When a young woman disappears, police zero in on her violent ex-boyfriend. But the secret to solving the case is buried in a cold case file.

programme.title: On the Case: Twisted Lies
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, 41-year-old Nancy Menke, a mother of four, is found handcuffed and murdered in the passenger seat of her car; a records clerk in the insurance fraud unit stumbles upon a strange report that blows open Menke's murder case.

programme.title: On the Case: Unanswered Questions
programme.desc: Patti Berry disappears on the way to pick up her child at the babysitter's, then her body is found in a secluded wooded area not far from her abandoned blood-soaked car.

programme.title: On the Case: Deadly Deception
programme.desc: Officers investigate the death of a father of four who was gunned down, however nothing about the crime is what it appears to be.

programme.title: On the Case: Follow the Footprints
programme.desc: When a young girl's lifeless body turns up on the shore of the Feather River, police hope that following a trail of footsteps and discarded articles of clothing will lead them to her killer.

programme.title: On the Case: Nine Days of Terror
programme.desc: When a young college student disappears out of a mall parking lot, police find themselves in a race against time to find her before it is too late.

programme.title: On the Case: A Killer Among Friends
programme.desc: When a teenager is found savagely murdered, police must retrace her last steps alive to identify her killer.

programme.title: On the Case: Same Crime Next Year
programme.desc: A teenager is found murdered on the weekend of the Daytona 500 motor race in Daytona Beach, Florida. Then, one year later, police are called to the scene of a nearly identical crime.

programme.title: On the Case: Last Dance
programme.desc: A woman's walk home from a night out at a dance club ends in a brutal murder.

programme.title: On the Case: Twisted Justice
programme.desc: Nearly four decades after the brutal murder of Elaine Fogle, a detective is asked to investigate the unsolved case once again. He enlists the help of a retired investigator who had stored away an important clue in a rusty filing cabinet decades ago.

programme.title: On the Case: Evidence Lost, Justice Found
programme.desc: A young woman riding her bicycle is forced off the road and savagely murdered. Police chase her killer for decades until an overlooked clue ultimately leads to justice.

programme.title: On the Case: In Plain Sight
programme.desc: When a beautiful young woman is murdered the evidence points detectives to a killer hiding in plain sight.

programme.title: On the Case: Signed In Blood
programme.desc: In order to solve the vicious double murder of a beloved couple, police must uncover a cold blooded killer's carefully calculated plot.

programme.title: On the Case: Last Rites
programme.desc: When a nun is found strangled and stabbed to death on the day before Easter, investigators are forced to look behind church walls in search of a killer.

channel.desc: On The Case explores intriguing murder mysteries through in-depth interviews with those closest to the case and examines the forensic evidence that helped unravel the mysteries.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S4 E12 - Kansas
programme.desc: After accidentally returning to Earth, Crichton discovers he is in 1985 and he has altered the timeline.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S4 E13 - Terra Firma
programme.desc: Crichton has arrived on Earth. Even though the Moya crew relaxes on Earth and are treated as VIPs, Crichton can't seem to adjust to life on Earth.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S4 E14 - Twice Shy
programme.desc: Moya takes on a new passenger, Talikaa. However, Talikaa turns out to be an alien in disguise and is intent on harvesting the crew's neural energy.

programme.title: The Dead Zone: Grains of Sand
programme.desc: Johnny (Anthony Michael Hall) faces a difficult decision after saving an infant from a dangerous ring of human traffickers.

programme.title: The Dead Zone: Vanguard
programme.desc: Johnny (Anthony Michael Hall) must discover why his reunion with a former student (Danny Masterson), who is now a top biomedical researcher, triggers his visions of Stillson (Sean Patrick Flanery) and a future Armageddon.

programme.title: The Dead Zone: Babble On
programme.desc: A string of horrific nightmares prompts Johnny (Anthony Michael Hall) to dig into his late father's mysterious past to try to prevent a present day catastrophe.

programme.title: The Dead Zone: Coming Home
programme.desc: When Sarah's (Nicole deBoer) father, Marty (Ed Asner), moves into a local retirement home, Johnny (Anthony Michael Hall) begins having morbid visions about the fate of its residents and is driven to investigate.

programme.title: The Dead Zone: Saved
programme.desc: In a bizarre turn of events, Stillson (Sean Patrick Flanery) begs Johnny (Anthony Michael Hall) to help him investigate the disappearance of his girlfriend, Miranda (Laura Harris).

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: The Most Wanted Man (REDUX)
programme.desc: The crew hunt a man whom everyone wants to capture, a man with the longest criminal record they've ever seen, and special powers that allow him to escape again and again.

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: The Half dense Players (REDUX)
programme.desc: Dante is assigned to take custody of an unusual murder suspect, a beautiful artist plagued by strange visions that may threaten reality itself.

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: A Dark and Stormy Night (REDUX)
programme.desc: Darius reconciles with Luc, while making peace with Dante, but the sinister forces that follow him are not far behind.

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Supermax (REDUX)
programme.desc: After Rudolpho sells the Tulip out from under them, the crew scheme to take it back from the new owner, who wants to turn the ship into a maximum security prison.

programme.title: A Century of Science Fiction: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: From saber-toothed tigers to dinosaurs hidden somewhere on isolated islands or towering mountain tops, lost worlds have been found again and again by science fiction films.

programme.title: A Century of Science Fiction: Mad Scientists
programme.desc: Take a look at the many legendary performers who have taken their turn experimenting with the formula of one of sci-fi's greatest tropes: the sinister mad scientist.

programme.title: A Century of Science Fiction: Mutations
programme.desc: From exposure to intense cosmic radiation to a grand experiment experiment gone horribly wrong, mutations have grown and developed into a key component of science fiction DNA.

programme.title: A Century of Science Fiction: Power of the Mind
programme.desc: This fascinating chapter takes a look at such mental manifestations as ESP, mind control, and telekinesis.

programme.title: Black Hole High: Radio
programme.desc: Lucas finds a radio receiver which is picking up broadcasts from the future. He puts all of his friendships at risk when he uses the radio to win a bet. A bigger problem arises when another broadcast reveals that Blake Holsey will be disintegrated at 5pm.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Affaire de Coeur
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel go to Scotland to find the second ring of the pair of Twining Rings of Calum and Elena.

channel.desc: FARSCAPE, THE DEAD ZONE (Anthony Michael Hall) and RELIC HUNTER (Tia Carrere), watch them all right here on Pluto TV Sci-fi Series, where imagination knows no bounds. Take a journey through space & time to watch all the best sci-fi series in the galaxy!

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder: Faria Khan
programme.desc: After leaving an arranged marriage she claimed was abusive, Faria Khan could have moved on. But she wouldn’t be satisfied until estranged husband Nawajid was dead. And she knew exactly who to ask to help her.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder: Nat Fraser
programme.desc: Arlene McInnes and Nat Fraser had a whirlwind romance, marrying and having their first child within 18 months of meeting. But Nat soon revealed himself as a womanising, violent bully. When she rebelled against him, he hatched a plot to punish her.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder: Tia Young
programme.desc: George Young worked his fingers to the bone to give his loved ones a better future: his wife, Tia, their three sons, even his friend Tim Lee. How was this generosity repaid? With deception, infidelity, and a plot to cash in on his death.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder: Malcolm Webster
programme.desc: The women in Malcolm Webster’s life seemed prone to bad luck. One died in a car crash. Another suffered a mysterious illness. A third, a keen sailor, found her life jacket punctured. How long before police realised this was more than coincidence?

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder: Brian Burns
programme.desc: Brian and Carla Burns were both medics in their 40s when they met and fell in love. But married bliss didn’t last, and divorce proceedings were messy. Carla disappeared, and fingers pointed at Brian, but he was ready with a bizarre explanation.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder: Kelly Cochran
programme.desc: When Chris Regan started dating coworker Kelly Cochran, he knew she was married. But he had no idea of the wedding day pact she had made with husband Jason. Chris had become entangled in a love triangle that would see two people lose their lives.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder: Ramanodge Unmathallegadoo
programme.desc: At the age of 16, Sana Muhammad had an arranged marriage to Ramanodge Unmathallegadoo, a man almost twice her age. She managed to escape the unhappy relationship and found new love, but Ramanodge decided she would never get to enjoy her new life.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder: Ann Marie Anastasi
programme.desc: Ann Marie and Anthony Anastasi had four children, a big house on a desirable street… and a younger lover living in their basement. It was a toxic love triangle, and one that was destined to end in tragedy.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Garry Newlove
programme.desc: Garry Newlove’s wife Helen talks about the events on the night of his murder and the days afterwards, as well as her current work as a peer in the House of Lords combatting anti-social behaviour.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Steven Wright
programme.desc: A closer look at the crimes of Steve Wright, who was dubbed 'The Suffolk Strangler' after murdering five women who worked as prostitutes in Ipswich in 2006.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: The Omagh Bombing
programme.desc: Survivors, victims' relatives and former detectives reflect on the Real IRA car bomb that killed 29 people in Omagh, Northern Ireland in 1998.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Keith Blakelock
programme.desc: In 1985, PC Keith Blakelock was murdered during a riot on a housing estate in London, triggered after a black woman died of heart failure during a house search. Nobody has been brought to justice for his murder, despite three investigations.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Stephen Port
programme.desc: A chilling look at the crimes of Stephen Port, the east London serial killer who poisoned four young men with lethal doses of a date rape drug.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Rachel Nickell
programme.desc: A hard-hitting look at the murder of Rachel Nickell, who was sexually assaulted and murdered in front of her two-year-old son on Wimbledon Common in 1992.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: The Russell Murders
programme.desc: Bludgeoned to death whilst walking down a country lane, the horrific murders of Lin and Megan Russell made worldwide news. Discover the events of that shocking day.

channel.desc: Get behind the headlines of some of the UK’s most infamous crimes, opening the door to real life crime scenes and forensics labs, police archives and courtrooms, to piece together the clues, examine the evidence and uncover the truth.

programme.title: National Park Mysteries: Mark Twain National Forest
programme.desc: Mark Twain National Forest: Some claim that the dark, mysterious energies that surround this national park point to treasures from a lost civilisation that are hidden there.

programme.title: National Park Mysteries: Chaco Culture National Historical Park
programme.desc: Was Chaco Canyon a complex ceremonial center with extraordinary astronomical alignments of buildings and roads?

programme.title: National Park Mysteries: Yosemite National Park
programme.desc: One of America’s most beloved wilderness areas, Yosemite National Park, has a dark side – ghost and UFO sightings, mysterious disappearances and a pre-historic Pterodactyl - which experts believe is caused by a rift in the fabric of time.

programme.title: National Park Mysteries: Great Sand Dunes National Park
programme.desc: Great Sand Dunes National Park: A stroll through Great Sand Dunes National Park, where strange lights, animal mutilations and other bizarre incidents have been spotted.

programme.title: National Park Mysteries: Lassen Volcanic National Park
programme.desc: Lassen Volcanic National Park: Reports of sightings here include reptiles - known as reptoids - who work with aliens and can appear in human form.

programme.title: National Park Mysteries: Crater Lake National Park
programme.desc: The tourist-attracting waters of Crater Lake National Park may also be the epicenter of dark and sinister forces from Native American lore that lure visitors to their deaths.

programme.title: National Park Mysteries: Canyonlands National Park
programme.desc: Claims of a demonic truck driver, disembodied voices, nightmarish skinwalkers and a time loop are reported in Canyonlands National Park.

programme.title: Secrets In The Ice: Ancient Ice Zombies
programme.desc: Thirty World War II aircraft all crashed in the same spot on the Greenland Ice sheet, causing experts to wonder if they all fell victim to the Arctic’s Bermuda Triangle.

programme.title: Secrets In The Ice: The Vanishing Of Flight CS-59
programme.desc: A secret underground military research station in the middle of the Greenland Ice Sheet is revealed as one of the most elaborate cover stories in the history of the Cold War.

programme.title: Secrets In The Ice: Curse Of The Ice Princess
programme.desc: Merging advanced scanning technology and scientific research, this series investigates curiosities that have been lost for millennia, or never seen before, exploring how and why they ended up in the most desolate and distant corners of the planet.

programme.title: Secrets In The Ice: Lost On Killer Mountain
programme.desc: Merging advanced scanning technology and scientific research, the series investigates the curiosities that have been lost for millennia, or never seen before, exploring how and why they ended up in the most desolate and distant corners of the planet.

programme.title: Secrets In The Ice: Inca Child Sacrifice
programme.desc: Merging advanced scanning technology and scientific research, the series investigates the curiosities that have been lost for millennia, or never seen before, exploring how and why they ended up in the most desolate and distant corners of the planet.

programme.title: Secrets In The Ice: Revenge Of The Ice Mummy
programme.desc: Canadian divers spot an object that may solve a Cold War nuclear mystery. A mummified businessman is found atop Mexico’s highest peak. In Iceland, a cave said to be home to a fire giant is investigated. Mummified penguins are found in Antarctica.

programme.title: Secrets In The Ice: Mystery Of The Arctic Shipwreck
programme.desc: A Russian mystery involving the deaths of nine hikers may finally be solved. A legendary ship is pulled from icy Arctic waters. In Antarctica, a melting glacier could cause a global disaster. Russian researchers find a strange arrangement of bones.

programme.title: Secrets In The Ice: Mystery Of Glacier Mummy
programme.desc: Mountain climbers in California find the body of a U.S. Army soldier. In Alaska, strange bundles of canvas and wood high up on a mountain are discovered. Volcanic glass is found in an unexpected place. A vital WWII weather station is uncovered.

programme.title: Secrets In The Ice: Siberia's Frozen Necropolis
programme.desc: Researchers find a mummy buried in a strange way. A legendary polar exploration vehicle goes missing in Antarctica. A glacier cave on Mt. St. Helens is explored. An island in the Bering Sea may contain clues to the extinction of the woolly mammoth.

programme.title: Secrets In The Ice: Secrets Of The Ice Arsenal
programme.desc: An unidentified metal object is found on Kiska Island. A centuries-old gold mining mystery is investigated. In Siberia, a network of ice tunnels is explored. Fossils unearthed in the Canadian Arctic lead to the discovery of a new species of camel.

programme.title: Secrets In The Ice: Russia's Mountain Mummy Enigma
programme.desc: Russian soldiers make a grim discovery on a mountain. An abandoned town has an unusual past. Scientists working in Antarctica find something surprising beneath the ice. In Greenland, strange depressions in the ground are investigated.

programme.title: Secrets In The Ice: Buried Secrets Of Mount Cook
programme.desc: Merging CGI recreations, advanced scanning technology and scientific research, this series journeys to the planet’s most remote, cold and inhospitable places to reveal great mysteries that were once frozen in time.

programme.title: Secrets In The Ice: Riddle Of Whale Bone Alley
programme.desc: Merging CGI recreations, advanced scanning technology and scientific research, this series journeys to the planet’s most remote, cold and inhospitable places to reveal great mysteries that were once frozen in time.

channel.desc: Delve into a world of mystery, the supernatural and the unexplained, from aliens and UFOs to monsters and curses, lifting the lid on government secrets, conspiracies and cover-ups, as we investigate some of the world’s greatest mysteries.

programme.title: Moesha: Age Ain’t Nothing
programme.desc: Hakeem begins to date an older woman he meets at his store.

programme.title: Moesha: The Play Scene
programme.desc: Mo writes a scene from a play set in a Blues Lounge in the 1940s for her English class, and our cast acts it out for us.

programme.sub-title: Use Me Once – Shame On You – Use Me Twice I’ll Kill Ya

programme.title: Moesha: Keepin’ It Real
programme.desc: Mo is attracted to a classmate she is working with on a project.

programme.title: Moesha: Halloween Part 1 – Kim’s Revenge
programme.desc: Mo, Kim and Niecy decide to dress as “The Women of Batman” for Halloween.

programme.title: Moesha: Break It Down
programme.desc: Frank takes Hakeem to the father/son “lock-in” at the local church, to encourage open communication and trust between fathers and sons.

programme.title: Moesha: Rhythm Dues
programme.desc: Mo encourages CPQ to submit their latest song to the local radio station for their “play it or stuff it” segment. When the song is played, it is well received. Q has written lyrics over a Morris Day song, and Morris shows up at “The Hole” where he plays.

programme.title: Moesha: The Double Date
programme.desc: Mo has been dating Bridgewood classmate Jeremy since her break up with Q.

programme.title: Moesha: He Ain’t Heavy – He’s Dee’s Brother
programme.sub-title: He Ain’t Heavy – He’s Dee’s Brother
programme.desc: Mo gets a crush on Dee’s very attractive younger brother when he comes to visit.

programme.sub-title: It’s My Paper And I’ll Cry If I Want To
programme.desc: Mo decides to publish her own Bridgewood newspaper when editor Mary Ellen refuses to add her to the staff of the existing paper.

programme.title: Moesha: The “Short” Story
programme.desc: Mo’s group at the Den includes a short kid known as “Biggie”.

programme.title: Moesha: She’s Back
programme.desc: A famous female broadcast journalist who used to be friends with Frank speaks at Bridgewood, so Mo invites her to their house for dinner.

programme.title: Moesha: This Time You’ve Gone Too Far
programme.sub-title: This Time You’ve Gone Too Far
programme.desc: Mo, Kim, Hakeem, Niecy, Morgan, Marco, and Chris head off on a road trip to San Diego.

programme.title: Moesha: Body Language
programme.desc: Mo, Kim and Niecy play a game of “Truth or Dare”.

programme.title: Moesha: Pajama Jam
programme.desc: Mo asks Frank if she can go to a slumber party at Morgan’s house.

programme.sub-title: Mo’s Money – Mo’s Money – Mo’s Money
programme.desc: Moesha wants to get cable and her own phone now that she has a job and is making money.

programme.title: Moesha: A House Is Not A Home
programme.sub-title: A House Is Not A Home
programme.desc: Moesha is living with Andell after having moved out of Frank & Dee’s home.

programme.title: Moesha: Moesha Meets Brandy
programme.desc: Moesha meets Brandy at a concert and we discover that Moesha is having a romance with Aaron, a college student.

programme.title: Moesha: Homecoming
programme.desc: With a little help from Myles and a visit from Grandma Mitchell, Moesha moves back home and returns to Crenshaw High.

programme.title: Moesha: Hello! What’s This?
programme.desc: Dee finds a joint in the couch while cleaning the house. Frank and Dee assume and accuse Mo, but Moesha is shocked when she catches Myles smoking.

programme.title: Moesha: Psyche Your Mind
programme.desc: Based on the family turmoil, the family begins counseling, but Moesha doesn’t want to air the family’s 'dirty laundry'.

programme.title: Moesha: Teacher
programme.desc: Moesha is attracted to a substitute teacher at Crenshaw. After they kiss, he leaves the school for 'personal reasons'.

programme.title: Moesha: I Know What You Did In The Third Grade
programme.sub-title: I Know What You Did In The Third Grade
programme.desc: Moesha and her friends are stalked by a student who was just released from jail who they haven’t seen since the third grade when he got into trouble because of them. Parody of Brandy’s feature 'I Still Know What You Did Last Summer…'

programme.title: Moesha: A Terrible Thing Happened On My Tour Of College
programme.sub-title: A Terrible Thing Happened On My Tour Of College
programme.desc: Moesha and her friends are invited to a college to attend a Prospective Freshman Weekend and someone slips a 'roofie' in her drink. Her boyfriend Aaron keeps her from being taken advantage of.

programme.title: Moesha: Birth Control
programme.desc: Moesha gets birth control pills when she decides she would like to lose her virginity to Aaron. However, things get complicated when Dee finds the pills in her purse.

programme.title: Moesha: A Class Act Christmas
programme.desc: Moesha, Hakeem, and the other employees of the Class Act are held hostage by a man dressed as Santa Claus protesting age discrimination.

programme.title: Moesha: The Crush
programme.desc: A friend of Myles who has a crush on Moesha pretends he cannot read so she can tutor him. However, after an article she writes about the success she has had with the little student is published in the LA Times, Moesha learns a hard lesson.

programme.title: Moesha: Barking Up The Wrong Tree
programme.desc: Hakeem accepts a job as assistant manager of the Class Act claiming there are financial difficulties at home. Moesha, concerned about his college education, confronts his mother who denies his claims.

programme.title: Moesha: Life Imitating Art
programme.desc: Racial tensions mount in Moesha’s high school after a mural depicting Latin American hero Caesar Chavez is purposely defaced.

programme.title: Moesha: OhMiGod, Fanatic
programme.desc: After Moesha and Kim have a huge fight, Moesha is surprised when MTV shows up at her door to film her bringing her best friend Kim to meet her favorite singer. Leanne Rimes guest stars.

channel.desc: Navigating the twists and firsts of high school, Moesha juggles friendships, romance and the occasional drama while trying to keep her family together.

programme.title: Diana - A Celebration
programme.desc: Whether at the White House, a formal visit to the Vatican or a building site in Australia, Princess Diana always brought a spontaneity, enthusiasm and a spectacular sense of style to whatever she did.

programme.title: Royals And Their Pets
programme.desc: The Royal family has always had a very special relationship with their pets: from the lapdog who hid under Mary, Queen of Scots' skirts at her execution to Caesar, King Edward VII's terrier who took precedence over 9 Kings at his masters' State Funeral.

programme.title: Behind The Palace Walls: Royal Sisters
programme.desc: The Heir and The Spare. It has been said that two sisters were never less alike and, indeed, Elizabeth and Margaret travelled very different paths throughout their lives.

programme.title: 50 Glorious Years: The Remarkable Marriage of the Queen and Prince Philip
programme.desc: Celebrating the Golden Wedding Anniversary of the Queen and Prince Philip, this programme is a sympathetic look at not only their lives together, but also an insight into Britain and the changes it has gone through in 50 Glorious Years.

programme.title: Diana Princess Of Wales: Everlasting
programme.desc: This documentary examines all that Diana left the world; her two extraordinary sons, Princes William and Harry; the Diana Memorial fund; and the charities that she helped to fund.

programme.title: Diana: The Royal Truth
programme.desc: A captivating first hand account of the life of one of the most iconic figures of the 20th century, Diana Princess of Wales, by the man who lived through it all. From innocent dreamer to divorced change-bringer the turbulent life of Diana was rocked th...

programme.title: Royal Secrets: For King and Country
programme.desc: When Edward VIII abdicated, his younger brother, George, suddenly became king and 'inherited' the second world war. The father of Britain's present queen, joined forces with Winston Churchill to stand firm against Adolf Hitler.

programme.title: Kate Middleton: Working Class to Windsor
programme.desc: Wife, mother, duchess; a journey from working class to Windsor. Kate Middleton’s rise to royalty and influences of international intrigue and admired the world over.

programme.title: Royal Secrets: The Man Who Would be King
programme.sub-title: The Man Who Would be King
programme.desc: Prince William is seen as the 'future' of the British monarchy. The heir to the throne who surveys say most people want to see succeed his grandmother, Queen Elizabeth. Why has William become so popular?

programme.title: Princes of the Palace
programme.desc: Discover the lives of the British Royal Family's princes and their importance to the Royal House of Windsor. Profiling Princes Phillip, Charles, William, Harry and young Prince George.

programme.title: Royal Secrets: First Steps
programme.desc: Britain's royal babies used to be born and raised behind closed palace gates. Today, they are part and parcel of the commercialisation of Britain's Royal Family. Not so long ago, access to royal babies was restricted and they didn't even go to school

programme.title: Inside Royalty: The Clothes Show
programme.desc: Behind the image of Princess Diana as one of the world’s most photographed women is a revealing story of glamour, sex and perfection.

programme.title: Royal Jewels
programme.desc: The Royal Jewels truly represent the mystery and majesty of Monarchy on display, with the Imperial State Crown itself featuring no less than 2,800 diamonds.

programme.title: The Diana Story: Part I: The Young Princess
programme.desc: In the summer of 1980 a shy young girl arrives at Balmoral Castle, two years later that girl becomes a royal Princess. At just 20 years old Lady Diana Spencer married HRH Prince Charles to become HRH Princess Of Wales.

programme.title: The Diana Story: Part II: Broken Hearts
programme.desc: The marriage of Prince Charles and Princess Diana remains infamous for being one of the most turbulent royal weddings in modern history. As the cracks began to form the world watched.

programme.title: The Diana Story: Part III: Legacy of Love
programme.desc: A late-night phone call from Paris brought news that would rock the world. The sudden and tragic death of Princess Diana devastated millions. Hear what it was really like to be at the eye of the storm.

programme.title: Royal Secrets: An Extraordinary Queen
programme.desc: Queen Elizabeth II is the world's oldest monarch and Britain's longest serving Queen. This episode explores the secret of the woman who never expected to become a Queen.

channel.desc: Celebrate Our Royal Family with Pluto TV and the Daily Mail. Look through the doors of Buckingham Palace to the life of King Charles and his family, and uncover the history and traditions of The Windsors.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Kent and Sussex
programme.desc: This week Phil and Kirstie are concentrating their efforts in Kent and Sussex.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Tufnell Park
programme.desc: This week Kirstie and Phil almost come to blows when they take on the impossible – finding a flat with private parking in pricey North London for £290,000. They're helping Laura Cream, a very single-minded young lady.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: North Leeds
programme.desc: From two young first-time buyers looking to settle down to a family who have been scarred by a previous purchase, this search challenges Kirstie and Phil in ways they never anticipated.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Jersey
programme.desc: This week we're on Jersey hunting for a fabulous family home for the young couple Nick and Katrina. We show them the many highs and lows this Channel Island has to offer.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Sheffield
programme.desc: This week Kirstie and Phil are house hunting in Sheffield. Fire fighter Justin and his sales manager wife Deborah have got £250k burning a hole in their back pocket and they're desperate to find the perfect do-up property to settle down in.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: South Liverpool
programme.desc: Will Phil be the knight in shining armour to rescue these damsels in distress, and will Kirstie turn out to be Kate's property fairy godmother? Will they fail in their quest or find property success in Liverpool South?

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Episode 16
programme.desc: With the market constantly shifting, there's no such thing as a "simple search" anymore. Our dynamic duo will have to work harder than ever before to make sure they come up with the goods.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Revisit: Hastings
programme.desc: Kirstie and Phil revisit two couples in Hastings, Jakki and Scott, and newlyweds Nicola and Chris, only to find that one couple is now in a very different place.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Yorkshire
programme.desc: This week we've been called in to help a lucky couple that have just scooped almost two million quid on the lottery and want to splash out on a swanky new pad.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Surrey
programme.desc: This week Kirstie and Phil are in Surrey - and at opposite ends of the property ladder.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Berkshire Revisits
programme.desc: Our two couples are at a similar stage in their lives, looking to buy their first homes together. Each had set their sights on pricey patches in the costly capital, but did they really know what they wanted and where they wanted it?

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Lincolnshire
programme.desc: With a wide range of budgets across the whole of the UK, Phil and Kirstie are challenged at every turn, and there are many!

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Warwickshire
programme.desc: It's like Doctor Dolittle meets Lawrence of Arabia as Kirstie and Phil help the camel-racing Fossett clan relocate their ever-expanding menagerie of children and wild beasts.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Bristol
programme.desc: This week Kirstie and Phil come to the aid of newly qualified doctor Ian Ensum, as he takes his first steps on the property ladder.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Revisit: Sheffield
programme.desc: A year after two troublesome searches, Phil heads back to Sheffield to see how a couple of doctors and a firefighter are faring.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: East Midlands
programme.desc: Kirstie and Phil are back and busier than ever, as they attempt to find homes for two sets of house hunters with very different needs in an extremely challenging market.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Tees Valley
programme.desc: First-time parents Nicola Moore and Tony Curry are desperate to find their first home where they can bring up 1-year-old son Lucas.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Home Counties & North Yorks Revist
programme.desc: In Yorkshire, Trudi & Steve were moving to be closer to family-whilst in Luton, Zena wanted to get out of mum and dad's.

channel.desc: No floorboard is left unturned as dynamic property experts Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer help house-hunters find the perfect home in the perfect location.

programme.title: Running Wild With Bear Grylls: Bear Grylls, Zac Efron
programme.desc: Hollywood actor Zac Efron heads into the Appalachian wilderness of the Catskill Mountains in New York. They parachute into the woods, rappel down cliffs and search for shelter.

programme.title: Running Wild With Bear Grylls: Bear Grylls, Julia Roberts
programme.desc: Movie star Julia Roberts joins Bear on a lifesaving Red Nose Day adventure in Kenya. They're on a two-day trek enduring blistering savannah temperatures.

programme.title: Running Wild With Bear Grylls: Bear Grylls, Mel B
programme.desc: Spice Girl Mel B joins Bear on the two hundred foot cliffs of the Welsh coastline, where a final descent sends Mel into breakdown mode; Bear is stung by a jellyfish, forcing Mel to practice some first aid skills.

programme.title: Running Wild With Bear Grylls: Bear Grylls, Tom Arnold
programme.desc: Tom Arnold heads into the unpredictable coastal mountains of Oregon. They take a helicopter to an isolated forest, hike through woodland, catch a trout and cross a river with the help of a log.

programme.title: Running Wild With Bear Grylls: Bear Grylls, Uzo Aduba
programme.desc: Uzo Aduba joins Bear on a harrowing journey to Spain's Pyrenees Mountains, where they face a poisonous viper and secure a dinner of field mice; Uzo shares the story of her path to fame and her family's emigration from Nigeria.

programme.title: I Shouldn't Be Alive: Jaws Of The Death
programme.desc: A conservationist survives an airplane crash in Zimbabwe. Suffering severe injuries Greg must do everything he can to survive until help arrives.

programme.title: I Shouldn't Be Alive: Frozen at 20,000 Feet
programme.desc: In April 1999, three British climbers get caught in a snowstorm near the summit of Mt. McKinley. After a night in a cave, one climber develops snow blindness and another volunteer to go down to base camp but breaks both his legs in a fall.

programme.title: I Shouldn't Be Alive: Lost At Sea
programme.desc: Two fathers and their son's fishing trip in Mexico turns bad when they find themselves forced to ditch their plane in the sea during a storm.

programme.title: I Shouldn't Be Alive: Swept Away
programme.desc: When 2 best friends take a Kayaking trip, they are hoping for nothing less than a great adventure. Powerful currents and bad weather quickly expose how one is inexperienced and both, in grave danger.

programme.title: I Shouldn't Be Alive: Shipwrecked
programme.desc: Cousins Mark and Rob go on a fishing trip on the Sea of Cortez, when they find themselves shipwrecked on a small island with no food or water, they must do whatever they can to survive on the island.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain Parts Unknown: Thailand
programme.desc: Tony teams up with Chef and Author Andy Ricker of Pok Pok Restaurant fame. He's made a name for himself faithfully reproducing the cuisine of Northern Thailand at his restaurants in Portland and NYC.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Roy Choi’s food reflects a new American idea of "natural" fusion. Bourdain examines the meeting point of Asian, Mexican, Latino culture in modern LA.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Tony will explore several regions of Colombia from the mountains down to the Caribbean coast to the coca leaf growing inlands formerly controlled by drug cartels.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Tony travels to Las Vegas Nevada with his food author friend Michael Ruhlman. Whatever your need, whatever bad behaviour you’d like to display Las Vegas is the place that will allow it... for a price.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain Parts Unknown
programme.desc: The first time Tony visited Beirut, it didn't end well. Now Tony is back in Beirut, where all the world’s troubles and all the world's good comes together to form a city like no other.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain Parts Unknown
programme.desc: In this episode of Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown, Tony travels to Madagascar, a place that outsiders understand surprisingly little about.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain Parts Unknown
programme.desc: In this episode Tony travels to the lesser-known, North Eastern Coast of Jamaica. White sandy beaches and a cool breeze with a tropical umbrella drink in hand is usually the perception of island life.
