programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Snitches Get Fishes
programme.desc: Midway through the North Atlantic bluefin tuna season, a long-­-running feud lands one Gloucester captain in hot water, while another boat struggles to keep their crew intact.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Opposites Distract
programme.desc: At the halfway mark of the North Atlantic bluefin tuna season some teams are working well together and killing it while others are floundering and on the verge of killing each other.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Take It to the Bank
programme.desc: The Gloucester captains face a familiar decision: whether or not to take the long, high-¬-risk journey to Georges Bank to increase their chances of a big bluefin haul.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Doubling Down
programme.desc: After a massive haul offshore on Georges Bank last week, Captain Dave Carraro of FV-¬-Tuna.com and Captain TJ Ott of Hot Tuna decide to double down and make the long trip again.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Riders in the Storm
programme.desc: When a violent storm rolls in during week eleven, the Gloucester captains face a tough decision at a critical time: do they fish... or flee?

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Comeback Kid
programme.desc: With four weeks left in the season, Hard Merchandise and FV-¬- Tuna.Com struggle to stay at the top of the fleet as an unexpected adversary, the Wicked Pissah.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Tuna Invaders
programme.desc: With only three weeks left, the North Atlantic captains face more competition than ever as boats from all over head to Gloucester and battle for those last bluefin of the season.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: The Thin Bluefin Line
programme.desc: There is a narrow margin separating the top four boats and only two weeks left in the season.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: The Final Fishdown
programme.desc: In the last week of the Atlantic bluefin tuna season, the closest race in Wicked Tuna history is a tossup among four top contenders.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: The Bite is On
programme.desc: Meet the fleet, as peak season begins and the adrenaline rush of \\"monstah\\" hunting hits Gloucester.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Payback's a Fish
programme.desc: After going bust on his last trip and coming home empty-handed, Marciano of Hard Merchandise now wrestles with the trials of being a husband and father who has to be away from home so often.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Weekend Warriors
programme.desc: Tuna.com continues its winning streak, catching two fish in one day while the rest of the fleet struggles to even find a spot to fish in between the weekend recreational boaters.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Size Matters
programme.desc: Meet Kevin and the Christina, a boat that gets its own real-life fish story when it snags an 1,100-pound \\"monstah\\" right out of the gate.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Greed, Ego & Jealousy
programme.desc: After watching the Christina catch the biggest tuna of the season, the uber-competitive Captain Dave of the Tuna.com is obsessed with beating the record, and catching a fish bigger than 1,075 lbs!

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Mann gegen Sturm
programme.desc: Marciano, captain of Hard Merchandise, risks the elements to hook a giant bluefin and finds himself with boat trouble in the midst of the storm.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Mutiny at Sea
programme.desc: A mixture of bad luck and mutiny brews in this tumultuous episode of Wicked Tuna. Tensions erupt on New England's top tuna boat, Tuna.Com, when Captain Dave and Paul get into a heated confrontation that causes Paul to quit!

channel.desc: Teams of salty fishermen battle the elements, and each other, to land the biggest bluefine tuna in this gripping reality series.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner: Deadly Doses
programme.desc: When Dr. G receives Lea Conrad's body, she suspects the woman may have died from an antihistamine overdose. Then, Dr. G learns that Lea was being treated for lupus.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner: Hidden Hazards
programme.desc: A daughter wants to surprise her dad with breakfast in bed but finds him unresponsive. His family is convinced they know what killed him, but Dr. G must let the evidence speak for itself.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner: Deadly Circumstances
programme.desc: Dario Romano is found dead by his son at the bottom of the attic ladder. What happened to this 45-year-old? With Dr. G’s guidance, Dr. Stephany must solve the mystery.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner: Hidden Killers
programme.desc: When Marie Allen visits her sister, she makes a gruesome discovery: the 49-year-old is dead on the couch. Now, it’s up to Dr. G to figure out if this was an accident or something sinister.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner: Fatal Flaw
programme.desc: Parents rush their baby to the hospital, but she tragically dies in her mother’s arms. Now, Dr. G must help these devastated parents understand what happened.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner: Ticking Time Bomb
programme.desc: Manny Alvarez mysteriously crashes his car into a fence. He dies en route to the hospital, leaving behind a wife and son. It is up to Dr. G to find out what cut this young man’s life short.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner: A Cry for Help
programme.desc: Police patrolling the night streets hear gunshots and head to the scene. They find a nude middle-aged man in a parking lot lying face down in a puddle of blood.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner: Deadly Destination
programme.desc: A retired businessman travels from England to Florida to visit his family but dies soon after arriving. Dr. G must now determine what mysteriously killed this healthy man so suddenly.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner: A Mother's Love
programme.desc: While in the process of adopting a five-week-old baby, a mother takes him to work with her. While there, the baby inexplicably obtains a skull fracture while unsupervised.

programme.title: Conmen Case Files: John Myatt and John Drew – The Art World Con
programme.sub-title: John Myatt and John Drew – The Art World Con
programme.desc: The pair pulled off the biggest art con of the 20th Century, passing off works painted by Myatt as genuine works by famous artists.

programme.title: Conmen Case Files: Juan Carlos Guzman-Betancourt – Globe-trotting Trickster
programme.desc: In 1993, a young boy made the headlines when he was found as a stowaway on a plane which had arrived in Miami.

programme.title: Conmen Case Files: Stephen Klenczar – Bogus Barrister
programme.desc: Obsessed with boys toys, he posed as a barrister and claimed he worked for the British Government secret service.

programme.title: Conmen Case Files
programme.desc: Fake celebrity clairvoyant Williams preyed on the elderly by performing fake readings, including one where he directed his client to a forged will.

programme.title: 72 Hours: Faith Healer
programme.desc: A trucker at a roadside rest station discovers the fully clothed body of a dead East Indian woman.

programme.title: 72 Hours: Sweet Killer
programme.desc: An aging hippy is going through bad times. When he's found dead in his home with a gut of antifreeze, it's a closed case. Then a shocking confession reveals a maelstrom of lies and a story of cold-blooded murder.

programme.title: 72 Hours: Predator
programme.desc: The phone rings in the middle of the night. On the other end of the line, the sounds of an attack. The couple that receive the call rush to its source and discover a horrific scene.

programme.title: 72 Hours: Hate Crime
programme.desc: A young Orthodox Jewish man is in Pittsburgh to celebrate Passover with family when he is gunned down simply because of the way he is dressed.

programme.title: 72 Hours: Hunted
programme.desc: A real estate broker doesn’t return home. Her family can't find her. But police do - dead in a closet in her office. The DNA on her body is tested against 150 men. No match. The case runs cold.

programme.title: 72 Hours: Burning Obsession
programme.desc: In 1988, a promiscuous 22-year old boy from the Sikh community has one affair too many and ends up losing his life. Diligent detective work and DNA help police nail the killer who believed he had gotten away with murder.

channel.desc: Get deep into the world's most shocking crimes 24/7 on Pluto TV Investigation.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers: John Wayne Gacy
programme.desc: John Wayne Gacy murdered 33 boys and young men during a six-year period in the 1970s. He hid the bodies of his victims in the walls of his suburban home.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers: Volker Eckert
programme.desc: Volker Eckert, a German truck driver, strangled and killed as many as nineteen women across Europe in a murderous career that lasted over thirty years.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers: Joachim Kroll
programme.desc: Joachim Kroll murdered at least thirteen people during a span of over twenty years.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers: Beverly Allitt
programme.desc: Beverley Allitt killed four children and attempted to murder nine more while working as a nurse at Grantham and Kesteven Hospital in Lincolnshire in 1991.

programme.title: Surviving Evil: Handcuffed
programme.desc: A group of violent and sadistic thugs overpower and abduct 19-year-old Kim Case from her driveway. And although they torture and rape her throughout the night, she ultimately proves to be a more formidable adversary than they ever imagined.

programme.title: Surviving Evil: Nobody's Victim
programme.desc: Late at night on November 3, 1984, suicidal Florida teen Lisa McVey is heading home to end her life. But as she leaves work, a notorious serial killer terrorizing the Tampa area abducts her at gunpoint.

programme.title: Almost Unsolved: Vulnerable
programme.desc: A killer appears to be targeting the most vulnerable members of a community. With each death more brutal than the last, the police need to find this murderer before another life is lost.

programme.title: Almost Unsolved: Wi-Fi
programme.desc: A young Indigenous woman goes missing during a visit from her remote hometown and the clock is ticking as police use the latest computer forensics to track down her last known whereabout.

programme.title: Almost Unsolved: Relentless
programme.desc: When a young couple is discovered murdered, It will take almost 40 years to uncover the killer of childhood sweethearts.

programme.title: Crime Stories: The Candy Man
programme.desc: On August 8, 1973, police in Pasadena, Texas received a phone call from a young man who had just committed murder.

programme.title: Crime Stories: The BTK Strangler
programme.desc: In 1974, a man identifying himself as the BTK (Bind, Torture, Kill) Strangler started a killing spree in Kansas spanning the next two decades.

programme.title: Crime Stories: The Happy Face Killer
programme.desc: A common-law couple was found guilty of the 1990 rape and murder of Taunja Bennett near Portland, Oregon.

programme.title: Crime Stories: The Murderous Mastermind
programme.desc: In downtown Edmonton, a prominent business owner is found shot to death in his business.

programme.title: Crime Stories: The Lady-Killer
programme.desc: A hunter on the outskirts of Saskatoon, Saskatchewan stumbles across human remains.

programme.title: Crime Stories: The Killing Cousins
programme.desc: On July 26, 1983, police in Vero Beach, Florida received a report of a nude man firing shots at a naked girl on a residential street.

programme.title: Crime Stories: The Wilderness Murders
programme.desc: Ricky Dale Hemphill and companion Charla Toma set out for a picnic along a river near Brookings, Oregon in the fall of 1979. A day later Ricky is found murdered and Charla is missing.

channel.desc: Prepare to be immersed in the thrilling world of investigations, mysteries, and the pursuit of justice. Tune in to More TV Crime and embark on an unforgettable adventure into the heart of darkness, where truth is the ultimate prize.

programme.title: Helicopter ER: Roadside Surgery
programme.desc: Air Ambulances go to a head-on crash on a road near the coast where they perform surgery on a driver at the roadside. A biker is thrown from his bike on the busy A1 motorway and a heart patient is dashed to a specialist unit for micro surgery.

programme.title: Helicopter ER: Llama Out of Control
programme.desc: Helimed 99 is involved in a race to reach a walker in cardiac arrest on a hill in the North Yorkshire Moors. Plus, a woman is badly injured in a freak accident with a llama.

programme.title: Helicopter ER: Pillion Launch
programme.desc: Paramedics fight to save a biker badly injured in a collision with a car, while they try to reassure his wife who was thrown from the pillion in the impact. A chauffeur is trapped in his hi-tech car and a horseman is in agony after a freak hunting fall.

programme.title: Emergency Bikers: Episode 3
programme.desc: Paramedic Mark Hayes struggles to work out what’s wrong with a man collapsed on the bank of a canal and Steve Harris tends to a lady badly injured in a fall in the city centre.

programme.title: Emergency Bikers: Episode 4
programme.desc: Essex biker cop PC Martin Ackers takes on illegal drivers and the bike squad crack down on drivers without seatbelts. And paramedic Steve Harris helps a woman to smile through the pain.

programme.title: Emergency Bikers: Episode 5
programme.desc: Essex biker cops clamp down on offences in the Christmas traffic. Paramedic Steve is called to a case of hypothermia and we meet the nation's blood bikers to discover their life-saving work.

programme.title: Emergency Bikers: Episode 6
programme.desc: Paramedic Mark Hayes responds to a stabbing and has to rescue a woman from a car crash who's on her way to her critically ill baby. The Emergency Bikers go head to head in a battle of biking skill.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 7
programme.desc: The chopper team are about to take off to rescue a seriously injured man.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 7
programme.desc: The chopper crewmen have their hands full with five badly injured patients after a car crash near Waiuku, and a massive motorcycle pile-up leaves injured bikers all over the road, and a man may have broken his neck after falling from his horse.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 9
programme.desc: The chopper team is called out to save a pilot who's trapped in the wreck of his hang glider and a diabetic bus driver is found seriously ill after four days lying on his floor.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 1
programme.desc: Auckland's Westpac helicopter crew races to save two teenage girls fighting for their lives after their car crashed and rolled the Waiwera Hill.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 10
programme.desc: The Rescue 1 team are en route to the scene of a horrific accident. A pedestrian has been hit by a truck and is in a critical condition.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 6
programme.desc: The helicopter rescue crew responds to Pauanui to save a truck driver who's smashed through the windscreen after rolling his truck and a Port Charles family is distraught after a young girl is run over by a quad bike.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 2
programme.desc: A teenage motorcyclist is fighting for his life after crashing on a remote farm near Warkworth, a man has 2nd degree burns to his face and hands from an accidental explosion, and four men are missing after two boats capsized on the Kawhia bar.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 4
programme.desc: The Rescue 1 team respond to a call out where an elderly couple in their 60s are in a critical condition after a head on collision.

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: Dr Taylor offers comfort to a partially-sighted lady.

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: A recovering alcoholic who has fallen off the wagon.

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: A young woman with abdominal pain is sent straight to A & E.

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: Two long-term patients arrive for a consultation.

programme.title: Casualty 24/7: Every Second Counts: Episode 3
programme.desc: A man with potential spine injuries is given pain relief while waiting for scan results.

channel.desc: Across the UK, ambulance teams and Casualty department staff experience dramatic highs and lows as they attend to people in urgent need of medical assistance. 5 Emergency Rescue follows them as they tell their incredible stories of life and death.

programme.title: Scorpion: Super Fun Guys
programme.desc: Team Scorpion goes undercover on the "Super Fun Guy" movie set in Kazakstan in order to disable a Soviet-era nuclear missile being sold by terrorists.

programme.title: Scorpion: Tech, Drugs, and Rock 'n Roll
programme.desc: Walter's attempt to "normalize" goes horribly wrong when a nefarious virus is uploaded to his computer.

programme.title: Scorpion: Crazy Train
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must stop a sabotaged runaway subway train with Paige and Ralph on board. Also, in his attempt to impress Happy, Toby has his first boxing match.

programme.title: Scorpion: Area 51
programme.desc: To help fund Walter's research into saving his sister's life, Team Scorpion takes a lucrative job for the CIA to find a top-secret aircraft in the mysterious Area 51.

programme.title: Scorpion: US vs. UN vs. UK
programme.desc: Team Scorpion is blackmailed to break into the United Nations to assist in the assassination of a menacing arms dealer.

programme.title: Scorpion: Arrivals And Departures
programme.desc: When Team Scorpion and Walter's parents visit Megan in the hospital as her health deteriorates, they are quarantined after a deadly fungus outbreak threatens to infect everyone.

programme.title: Scorpion: The Old College Try
programme.desc: Team Scorpion goes undercover at a university to find a hacker who infiltrates the Federal Reserve and threatens to collapse the world economy.

programme.title: Scorpion: Dam Breakthrough
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, Team Scorpion must prevent a catastrophe when torrential rains create a large crack in a dam, threatening to wipe out an entire town in its wake.

programme.title: Scorpion: White Out
programme.desc: In order to save a United States Special Forces unit from certain death, Team Scorpion must brave the subzero temperatures of Antarctica.

programme.title: Scorpion: Sun of a Gun
programme.desc: Sylvester comes face to face with his estranged father who asks Team Scorpion for help.

programme.title: Scorpion: Da Bomb
programme.desc: Team Scorpion is helping with NASA's top secret rocket launch, but they must sabotage their own mission.

programme.title: Scorpion: Fractured
programme.desc: After a powerful earthquake rocks Los Angeles, Team Scorpion must fix a pinched gas line to prevent a massive explosion.

programme.title: Scorpion: Adaptation
programme.desc: While Team Scorpion works to stop an influx of drugs being smuggled into the country via drones, Walter gives Happy and Toby an ultimatum on their new relationship.

programme.title: Scorpion: The Fast & The Nerdiest
programme.desc: After Sylvester scores big on THE PRICE IS RIGHT, Team Scorpion must infiltrate a high-end car smuggling operation about to ship bioweapons to South America.

programme.title: Scorpion: Ticker
programme.desc: When Los Angeles' blood supply is hacked and deemed unusable because of fear it's been tainted, Team Scorpion must find the culprit.

programme.title: Scorpion: Djibouti Call
programme.desc: While on a secret mission in Djibouti, Africa, with his new Homeland protege, Tim Armstrong (Scott Porter), Cabe is captured and Team Scorpion must save him.

channel.desc: An eccentric genius forms an international network of super-geniuses to act as the last line of defense against the complicated threats of the modern world.

programme.title: Transformers: Cyberverse I
programme.sub-title: Sabotage/Teletraan - X/Matrix of Leadership/Siloed/King of the Dinosaurs
programme.desc: To convince Bumblebee that he is a Decepticon, Shockwave traps him in a false memory.

programme.title: Transformers: Cyberverse I
programme.desc: The newly formed team of Autobots must stop Shockwave from destroying all life on the planet.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Cybertron City
programme.desc: It's been 10 years since Megatron disappeared, and the Autobots and Decepticons now work side by side with humans to harvest Energon. But the Autobots face a new threat: attacks by Transformers known as Terrorcons.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Energon Stars
programme.desc: After analyzing the Terrorcon threat, the Autobots decide to send away all the civilians living in the Energon mining bases.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Scorponok
programme.desc: Scorponok captures Tidal Wave and makes him follow his orders so that they can revive Megatron with energon.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Megatron's Sword
programme.desc: Tidal Wave sees Megatron's sword.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: The New Cybertron City
programme.desc: Super Optimus Prime emerges to find his team searching for Energon.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Megatron Resurrected
programme.desc: Megatron is alive again and forces Scorponok to serve him, but Scorponok is loyal to only one master Alpha Q.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Megatron Raid
programme.desc: Megatron launches his first Energon raid since his resurrection.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Starscream the Mysterious Mercenary
programme.desc: Alpha Q has revived Starscream, whose mission is to destroy Optimus Prime, to regain a new body.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Battle of the Asteroid Belt
programme.desc: The Autobots go into the asteroid belt to see what is going on after seeing something on radar, and find parts of Unicron.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Energon Tower
programme.desc: A new Autobot weapon is revealed that unleashes vast destruction to the Decepticons.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: The Legend of Rodimus
programme.desc: Alpha Q prepares to bring Unicron to life, while yet another Energon Tower is secured into place.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Crisis in Jungle City
programme.desc: Alpha Q is not ready to let Earth go without a fight, and sends a group of stealth Terrorcons, named Command Ravage and Blackout.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Kicker Beware
programme.desc: Megatron forces Demolishor to divulge the Autobots' secret of finding energon: Kicker.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Energon Grid
programme.desc: Megatron has taken yet another plan, to create three meteors from Unicron and propel them at Earth before the energon grid has been completed, which he feels will “strike fear in Optimus Prime.”

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Rodimus: Friend or Foe?
programme.desc: While Snow Cat tests his power against the Energon Grid by sending frozen asteroids, Megatron decides to go after Alpha Q instead of Earth after finding a Terrorcon spy.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Go For Unicron!
programme.desc: Optimus reveals their mission is twofold: they are also going to destroy Unicron, and they prepare to set up a space bridge.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: The Return of Demolishor
programme.desc: The Autobots face a new threat: for Demolisher is revived in a new power, who is tougher than ever.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: A Tale of Two Heroes
programme.desc: The Autobots continue on their journey and intercept a Decepticon warp signal which turns out to be Rodimus's ship. Rodimus asks permission to aboard and Optimus obliges.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Battle Stations
programme.desc: The autobots continue their planning on taking out Unicron.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Alpha Q: Identity
programme.desc: Unicron's arrival causes the Decepticons on Cybertron to rebel, while Kicker learns the truth about Alpha Q.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Laser Wave: Rampage
programme.desc: Shockblast disables Cybertron's energon grid, while Kicker tries to convince the Autobots to listen to Alpha Q.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Survival Instincts
programme.desc: Starved for Energon, both Unicron's head and body begin lashing out at their respective captors.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Each One Fights…
programme.desc: Megatron commands Shockblast to lead an assault on Cybertron to take out the Energon towers, and allow Unicron to “feed” on Cybertron.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Unicron Unleashed
programme.desc: Megatron uses the Energon to revive Tidal Wave into Mirage.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Open Fire
programme.desc: As the Autobots fought their way to Megatron within Unicron's body and with Megatron throwing everything at them, Alpha Q provides support by fighting for the control of Unicron.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Ripped Up Space
programme.desc: Limping to join with the rest of the Autobots, Optimus Prime is confronted by Shockblast, who plans to take out Optimus Prime to prove that he is superior to Megatron.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Team Optimus Prime
programme.desc: Megatron escapes into a black hole and Optimus Prime decides to give chase, even though he doesn’t know what he will find on the other side. Kicker joins his Autobot friends on their mission and pilots the Miranda II into the black hole.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Protection
programme.desc: On the other side of the rip, the Autobots must now defend a whole new set of planets, and Wing Saber finally gets the chance to re-capture his prisoner Shockblast.

programme.title: Survivorman: Transylvania - Part 1
programme.desc: The Survivorman disappears into the thickly forested Transylvanian Alps to test the skills of a premiere search-and-rescue team -- and himself.

programme.title: Survivorman: Transylvania - Part 2
programme.desc: Les simulates a broken-leg injury and must rely on Romania's search-and-rescue to team to find him, deep in the mountains of Transylvania.

programme.title: Survivorman: 24hrs
programme.desc: Les and Bill Engvall survive for 24 hours in the deserts of Nevada.

programme.title: Survivorman: Frigate Island
programme.desc: Les first strands himself on an uninhabited island called Frigate an active volcano chain found in the Grenadine Islands deep. Surviving on the island means scouring the shoreline, securing freshwater, building a shelter and making fire.

programme.title: Survivorman: Canadian Boreal Forest
programme.desc: The Boreal Forest is home to 85 species of mammals including; moose, deer, bear and wolves. Crisscrossed by rivers and lakes, the Boreal forest is frost-free for only about three months of the year.

programme.title: Survivorman: Colorado Rockies
programme.desc: Out for a casual day's ride, Les (and horses) have to survive temperatures that vary from 70°F in the day to snow flurries at night.

programme.title: Survivorman: Grenada Jungle
programme.desc: Les pits his jungle survival skills against the incredibly diverse mountain jungle terrain of Grenada's largest active mountain, Mt. St. Catherine.

programme.title: Survivorman: Survivorman & Son Tofino
programme.desc: Les and his 16-year-old son Logan find themselves trapped without supplies and without a way home while sea kayaking along the coastline of British Columbia.

programme.title: Survivorman: Grenada Jungle
programme.desc: Les treks through the thick mountain rainforest to survive on the peak of Grenada's largest active mountain. Mona Monkeys, tarantulas, scorpions, armadillo, parrots and possums all live in this vibrant ecosystem, offering an abundance of food and danger.

programme.title: Survivorman: Cook Islands, South Pacific
programme.desc: Les, equipped with only his scuba gear, is abandoned by his crew at sea to recreate a frightfully common occurrence; separated from your boat and left alone in the ocean waters.

programme.title: Survivorman: Amazon
programme.desc: After brushing up on wilderness and hunting tactics from the skilled Waorani tribe, Les will have to survive on next to nothing while capturing it all with the camera equipment he lugs around.

programme.title: Survivorman: India
programme.desc: Les takes his survival skills to the Indian subcontinent, where he accidentally stakes out a shelter right in the heart of a tiger's territory.

programme.title: Survivorman: Fighting To Survive
programme.desc: Les Stroud, TV's Survivorman, will teach Elias the ways of survival. However, he won't teach him everything he needs to know.

programme.title: Survivorman: Arizona Desert
programme.desc: Riding a dirt bike out into the official middle of nowhere, Les simulates a break-down scenario. Half a gallon of water, a snack bar and his multi-tool are all he has with him for the next 7 days.

programme.title: Survivorman: Hidden World of Bigfoot
programme.desc: Les jumps from forest to forest across North America in search of Sasquatch, returning to a legendary Bigfoot hotspot in the Canadian wild. Here, he'll use a brand-new approach to discover whether there's any way to explain mysterious noises in the night.

programme.title: Survivorman: Canadian Boreal Forest
programme.desc: The Boreal Forest is home to 85 species of mammals including; moose, deer, bear and wolves. Crisscrossed by rivers and lakes, the Boreal forest is frost-free for only about three months of the year.

channel.desc: Outdoorsman and survival expert Les Stroud permits himself to be stranded for a week in a remote location with no equipment or supplies apart from his one-man camera rig, documenting his experience and providing insight into how to manage the wilderness.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A young prostitute is found dead in an Ohio waterway. Authorities have one tiny clue which could point to her killer, but face huge challenges due to her policemen clients and DNA evidence being washed away.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A small town in Colorado is on edge after a series of deadly bombings. Can the tools used to make the bomb lead the police to the killer before he strikes again?

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: For 20 years the loved ones of a murder victim have been kept in the dark, but now forensic investigators can approach the case in a new light.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A murder in Australia baffles police until they discover a device that serves as a unique witness in this landmark forensic case.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: An expert in accident reconstruction establishes why eye witness accounts contradict the evidence found at the scene of the death of a socialite.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a woman's body is found in ravine, tiny clues reveal a killer with an olive-green carpet, a white blanket, and distinctive bullets made from wax.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a house is burnt to the ground and a woman's remains are found in the rubble, investigators must determine whether it was a tragic accident or arson and murder.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a millionaire and his family were butchered in their own home, the case went unsolved for years. Investigators come across new fibrous evidence.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: In one of the most sensational and bold crimes in years, the chairman of the Coors Brewing Company was kidnapped. We look at how he was finally found.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Information can be extracted from a tissue left at the scene of a murder 12 years later.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a young girl is found dead, police quickly make an arrest, but could cutting-edge technology from NASA prove the wrong man is behind bars and a killer is on the loose?

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Investigators turn to forensic evidence to determine whether a missing teacher has just gone on holiday or is the victim of a crime.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a man's wife kills herself 14 years after his college sweetheart committed suicide, police start to get suspicious. Is is coincidence or double murder?

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Detectives discover that a woman shot on her drive had recently rejected a co-worker half her age. Did his love turned into obsession and a motive for murder?

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: With a long list of suspects, forensic experts are clear on one thing in this brutal murder, the killer knew his victim.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Police are on the hunt for a serial killer. Could a bloody fingerprint on one of his victims be the breakthrough they need?

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When the only witnesses to a horrific murder were the victim's dogs, police call in a canine behavioural expert with the hope of making a breakthrough in the case.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A cold-blooded killer believes he has found an ingenious way to cover his crime, but he hasn't banked on the talented team of forensic scientists out to catch him.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A husband and wife had been shot to death in their bedroom. Investigators thought their 16-year-old daughter was lucky to have escaped unharmed.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: In a small South Carolina town in 1991, 17-year-old Crystal Faye Todd, a popular high school student, was raped, murdered and dumped in a deserted field. With few leads, authorities DNA tested several friends and the match was a shock to all.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A woman vanished from her home on Prince Edward Island. Her abandoned car was found in a field; inside, the windows were spattered with blood. During the search for her body, police found a plastic bag containing a sneakers and a leather jacket.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: In 1984, hundreds of people in Oregon became ill with food poisoning. Detectives tracked down the outbreak to a cult which aimed to use germ warfare to take down the government.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a woman is found dead from a gun-shot wound, police suspect her husband. However, forensic teams prove what really happened and the truth is stranger than fiction.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When American Atheists founder Madalyn Murray O'Hair went missing, there was no shortage of suspects, but the discovery of a mutilated body helped police catch the culprit.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Two people witnessed a truck driving over an unconscious man. They fled into a nearby bar, but when the police turned up, the truck and the man were gone.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a woman's badly decomposed body is found in a box, police call on forensic entomologists to find out how and when she was killed. The presence of insects may hold some vital answers.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When an 18 year old girl was abducted at gunpoint from her home, she was determined to prove who took her by leaving DNA at the scene of the crime.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Police find a severed leg in a rubbish bin, but are unable to use conventional methods of victim identification. Can toxicology and DNA tests give police a name?

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: The killers of Charles Lynch tried to burn his body to cover their crime, but a forensic examination revealed 24 stab wounds. The hunt was on for at least two murderers.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Following four sexual assaults in Indiana in 1996, a man is arrested and convicted but, six years later, forensic developments reveal new facts about the case.

channel.desc: This long-running iconic true crime series examines the extraordinary forensic techniques used to catch some of America’s most infamous murderers, featuring expert testimony and reconstructions to reveal how science helps resolve criminal convictions.

programme.title: Mega Transports: Power Generator
programme.desc: A three hundred and ninety ton giant on a daring journey: A team of German heavy-lift-specialists have to transport a generator from a disused coal plant to its new operation site 120 kilometers away.

programme.title: Mega Transports: ITER Magnet
programme.desc: This giant magnet will revolutionize the world and energy production in the future. The world's largest nuclear fusion reactor is currently under construction in southern France.

programme.title: Mega Builders: Crossing the Colorado
programme.desc: In a rugged canyon, just downriver from the Hoover Dam, a team of construction veterans is hard at work, building the biggest concrete-arch bridge on the continent.

programme.title: Mega Builders: Ice Hotel
programme.desc: Building the world's largest structure of snow and ice is a mega challenge of towering proportions. Anything can go wrong. And often it does.

programme.title: Mega Builders: World's Biggest Wave Machine
programme.desc: On the resort island of Tenerife, just off the coast of North Africa, a small army of designers and labourers are building what will be the largest man-made surfing wave in history - and one of the most ambitious waterparks ever conceived.

programme.title: Mega Builders: The Big Rig
programme.desc: The Aker H6e is the biggest oil rig on the planet – built for the extreme conditions of the Barents Sea. Marine operations chief Knut Engebretsen and his team have tight deadlines for some major moves to put this monster together.

programme.title: Mega Builders: Blockbuster Bridge
programme.desc: In South Korea engineers are fighting against the forces of the wild West Sea to build the Incheon Grand Bridge. It’s part of a visionary plan to link the biggest airport in the nation, with a new international investment zone called New Songdo.

programme.title: Mega Builders: Roller Coaster
programme.desc: At Six Flags Magic Mountain the worlds longest, fastest and tallest Flying Roller Coaster is under construction. If the Park can't get the ride up and ready for the Spring break crowds 2007 this 21 million dollar investment won't be worth a penny.

programme.title: Mega Builders: The Big Lift
programme.desc: In a city known for building big, Hong Kong is about to set the standard for bridges around the world. But it’s not just its massive 300 metre towers or 1 kilometre span across open water that will set Stonecutters Bridge apart from other bridges.

programme.title: Mega Builders: The Fast Track
programme.desc: In Johannesburg, South Africa, engineers are less than 2 years away from delivering South Africa's first new commuter rail line in four decades. It's called the Gautrain.

programme.title: Megastructures: China's Smart Tower
programme.desc: Take 60,000 tons of steel, 260,000 cubic meters of concrete, 2,000 dedicated Chinese workers, and some of the best design brains in the business, and the Shanghai World Financial Center is what you get.

programme.title: Megastructures: World's Tallest Tower
programme.desc: Building one of the world’s tallest TV towers, the Guangzhou Sightseeing and TV Tower (now called the Canton Tower).

programme.title: Megastructures: Bejing Water Cube
programme.desc: China has erected some of the greatest monuments on Earth. When they held the Olympic Games in Beijing, the main stadium was a feat of architectural beauty. It was up to engineers to design the Beijing Water Cube to match it.

programme.title: Megastructures: Shanghai Super Tower
programme.desc: Typhoon winds to withstand, a rigid deadline to meet, and a towering goal no skyscraper has ever reached. The Pearl River Tower even generates its own power; it is the holy grail for mechanical engineers.

programme.title: Megastructures: China's Ultimate Port
programme.desc: In 2002 Chinese engineers and workers tackled one of the biggest construction projects on Earth. Thirty kilometers out to sea, in the middle of the ocean, is the location for Yangshan Deep Water Port.

programme.title: Giant Constructions: Suspension Bridges
programme.desc: Suspension bridges – impressively wide and stretched high over supporting cables or stay cables. The landscape-shaping icons: The superlative Golden Gate, Akashi Kaikyo, Aizaih, El Baluarte and Russky Bridge.

channel.desc: Join us on Pluto TV Big Builds as we celebrate the world's most gigantic marvels of engineering! Get ready for a massive line-up of shows that delve into the biggest, most complex and most dangerous building projects in the world.

programme.desc: A wounded deer has locked horns with another buck creating a dilemma for Warden Burroughs.

programme.title: Wardens: 18 Minutes
programme.desc: On this episode, the Wardens investigate a possible elk harassment case, and a possible poaching in Montana.

programme.title: Wardens: Thin Ice

programme.title: Wardens: 700 Yards
programme.desc: On this episode of Wardens, Joe Kambic patrols Deer Lodge, Montana and Kqyn Kuka attempts to rescue a sick buck from the ice.

programme.title: Wardens: Sullivan Hill
programme.desc: This week on Wardens, its elk hunting season in Montana and Bryan Golie is after suspicious hunters, and Paul Luepke addresses two hunters shot mule deer does without the proper permits.

programme.title: Wardens: Log Jam
programme.desc: Dangerous log jams on the Flathead River threaten unprepared boaters and tubers.

programme.title: Wardens: Casting Doubt
programme.desc: A slew of un-licensed anglers catch the attention of Game Wardens.

programme.title: Wardens: Operation Wildfire
programme.desc: This week on Wardens, we're tracking down a pesky bear who has been digging through the neighbors trash. In another region, we're citing several people for fishing without a license.

programme.title: Wardens: Never Ending Day
programme.desc: The Warden's day starts early with an opportunity to capture a convicted game violator who has dodged the law for over 3 years. But just as one case closes another begins - forcing them to work late into the night.

programme.title: Wardens: Angry Like a Moose
programme.desc: Region 4 Wardens are called in to round up a 1000 pound bully. But this youngster is not leaving the safety of his home. The Wardens turn to drastic measures to secure the situation.

programme.title: Wardens: River Rescue

programme.title: Wardens: Failure To Tag
programme.desc: Birds, bucks and missing licenses. This week the Wardens watch a clear violation take place in Region 5. Property lines are crossed in pursuit of upland game and a license check comes up empty.

channel.desc: A factual documentary channel following police units as they serve and protect within their communities.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: "Moving Day"
programme.desc: 15 Division is assigned to a community outreach program, “Moving Day”, to help tenants move out of a subsidized-housing complex that’s being torn down

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Fragments
programme.desc: Andy’s former rookie, Duncan, is back on duty and looking to reconcile – something she’s not ready for yet. But personal feelings get thrust aside when a bomb explodes in a downtown parking garage

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Everlasting
programme.desc: The officers of 15 Division work to track down TED MCDONALD (the car-bomber from Ep. 510). But even after catching him, they realize Ted has more targets set to explode out there. The clock is ticking

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Open Windows
programme.desc: Andy is attacked by an intruder at Traci’s place and the Sex Crimes Unit steps in to take over the case their way, 15 Division will have decide whether to take matters into their own hands.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Perfect Family
programme.desc: Andy’s ideas about what makes a perfect family are put into perspective when she meets an out-of-control teen who needs to be protected from her own conservative family.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Uprising
programme.desc: A riot breaks out at a women’s correctional institute while Andy, Juliet, Nick, and Gail are there to transfer prisoners. They end up in a lock-down situation that finds Andy and Juliet trapped with a woman desperate to prove her innocence

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Letting Go
programme.desc: When Nick’s estranged older brother emerges with new information on someone from their tragic past, Nick goes off the grid to track the man down. But Juliet is hot on his heels, and Nick is forced to let her into the secrets of his past.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: A Real Gentleman
programme.desc: When Traci is a no-show for her first raid, 15 Division fears the notorious gun dealer they’re after has kidnapped her. But when Andy realizes that the serial rapist we never caught is back, it’s all hands on deck to find Traci

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Home Run
programme.desc: After a community-outreach baseball game erupts in a drive-by shooting, Gail’s relationship with her brother is put to the test . Meanwhile, Swarek plans a getaway with Andy up to Oliver’s cabin, which goes off the rails in every possible way

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Best Man
programme.desc: Andy and Sam are shocked to learn that Oliver is the prime suspect in IA’s corruption investigation into 15 Division. They only have until end of day today to find Chris Klem – the missing explosives-dealer – and clear Oliver’s name

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Integrity Test
programme.desc: With Oliver still the prime suspect in the bombing of 15’s evidence room, Andy, Dov, Gail, and Nick undertake a risky – and potentially career-ending – plan to prove that Commissioner Alonso Santana is corrupt.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Ninety Degrees
programme.desc: Andy heads out with a very-pregnant Marlo to find a volatile woman who’s gone missing after group therapy, but neither Andy nor Marlo are prepared when Marlo suddenly goes into labor.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Breaking Up the Band
programme.desc: Now that Sam and Marlo’s baby girl has arrived (Ep. 520), it’s clear nothing could have prepared Andy for this moment. So when Juliet offers Andy an opportunity to leave town for 4 months on an undercover project, Andy starts to consider it.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: 74 Epiphanies
programme.desc: Andy and Sam’s wedding comes just in time for the gang to celebrate one last hurrah. But when Andy is taken off-course by a hitchhiker and then stranded on the side of a dead-end road with a dying man, she finds herself with no way to get help

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Fresh Paint
programme.desc: Andy McNally’s first shift on the job turns into mayhem when shots are fired in a downtown rooming house. In the midst of the chaos, Andy triumphantly makes her first big arrest

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Mercury Retrograde
programme.desc: As the other rookies hunt down a dangerous escaped convict, Swarek drags Andy through his undercover hauntson a mission he won’t explain. At first, Andy assumes Swarek is a rogue cop trying to settle scores from his undercover days.

channel.desc: Serve. Protect. Don’t screw up. At the police academy they trained, fought, drank and slept together. Now they’re on the job together. They’re ready to brave anything on the job; it’s only their personal lives that could use the back-up.

programme.title: Saw IV
programme.desc: An officer has only 90 minutes to save his friend, a SWAT commander, from a series of demented traps.

programme.title: Saw V
programme.desc: As the apparently last disciple of Jigsaw, Hoffman (Costas Mandylor) goes on the hunt to protect his secret.

programme.title: Saw VI
programme.desc: Hoffman (Costas Mandylor) emerges as the next heir to Jigsaw's twisted legacy, but as the FBI closes in, he sets in motion a game that is designed to reveal Jigsaw's grand scheme.

programme.title: American Psycho 2
programme.desc: Obsessed with serial killers, a college student (Mila Kunis) resorts to murder in order to become a professor's teaching assistant.

programme.title: A Secret Life
programme.desc: Sarah lives a perfect life with husband Jason and son Brandon until Jason disappears. When she finally tracks him down to get a DNA sample to save their son from a rare genetic disease, he tries to make sure she can't ruin his secret life.

programme.title: Shattered Glass
programme.desc: Washington, D.C., journalist Stephen Glass (Hayden Christensen) swiftly falls from grace when the news breaks that many of his stories were fabricated.

programme.title: Good Night, and Good Luck.
programme.desc: CBS newsman Edward R. Murrow (David Strathairn) criticizes Sen. Joseph McCarthy's tactics in the 1950s, with the backing of producer Fred Friendly (George Clooney).

programme.title: Churchill
programme.desc: British Prime Minister Winston Churchill clashes with his political opponents as D-Day nears in June 1944. Clementine, his devoted wife, tries to prevent his physical, mental and spiritual collapse while inspiring him to achieve greatness.

channel.desc: The MovieSphere Channel is serving up an endless stream of top-quality movies, from blockbuster hits to cult classics and everything in between.

programme.title: Sanctuary: End of Nights Pt 1

programme.title: Sanctuary: Hero

programme.title: Sanctuary: Pavor Nocturnus

programme.title: Mutant X

programme.title: Alien Contact: UFO Invaders

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: A respected doctor must race against time to find a cure for a lethal virus, unleashed by a paramilitary militia leader. Starring: Steven Seagal, L.Q. Jones, Gailard Sartain, Camilla Belle, Brad Leland

programme.title: ShockWave: Countdown to Disaster
programme.desc: A stolen seismic weapon is activated in Yemen. A hostage freed there tries in vain to warn against it's global effect. It starts seismic activity at the Californian fault line where her daughter and ex are monitoring it. Can they stop it?

programme.title: The Shooter
programme.desc: A CIA agent gets caught up in political intrigue after he gets brought in to solve the murder of a Cuban ambassador.

programme.title: Reprisal
programme.desc: A veteran looks to raise money for his son's healthcare by teaming up with another vet to track down criminals.

programme.title: Triple Cross: Triple Cross
programme.desc: During WW2, convicted bank robber Eddie Chapman becomes a triple agent working for both the British and the Germans.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Fountain of Youth
programme.desc: While Nigel rehearses his keynote speech in a Seville hotel room, a girl nearly breaks his nose demanding something - it turns out she was after the water from the Fountain of Youth.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Arthur's Cross
programme.desc: Scotland Yard calls Sidney and Nigel to identify a 5th century murder weapon. It turns out to be the burial cross of King Arthur, but besides the victim several others are looking for it.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: So Shall It Be
programme.desc: When Sidney and Nigel are about to enter the site of a Bristol lecture, a young author approaches them to follow up immediately on a tip about a map to the lost keys to the druid cult in Stonehenge.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Buddha's Bowl
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel head to Nepal to recover Buddha's fabled overflowing alms bowl for villagers who are building a shrine to the original Buddha.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: The Headless Nun
programme.desc: When Sydney's plane crashes, she's asked by a group of nuns to find the head of another nun who was decapitated several centuries ago.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Smoking Gun
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel search for Al Capone's diamond-encrusted gun at the behest of a man hoping it will clear his grandfather of a murder he was framed for.

channel.desc: It’s time to go into overdrive by jumping off buildings, flying a burning plane, driving in a car chase and saving the world. Pluto TV Action brings you blockbusters, stars, and a strong dose of high-octane excitement.

programme.title: Prospect
programme.desc: A teenage girl and her father travel to a remote alien moon to harvest the moon's elusive gems.

programme.title: Alien Outbreak
programme.desc: A small rural community is quarantined by an alien presence. Local police officers Zoe and Patrick battle through the night to take control as they become cut off from the outside world.

programme.title: Magical Adventures in the Forbidden City
programme.desc: In another world Abigail lives in a city whose borders were closed years ago because of a disease. She takes us on a magical adventure, rising against the forces in command and shows how being brave and following your heart can show anything is possible.

programme.title: The Survivor
programme.desc: After mankind moves into space, the old planet Earth is forgotten, a polluted wasteland where only expelled prisoners still survive. Starring: Xavier Declie, Richard Moll, Lisa Robin Kelly, Vito LoGrasso, Richard Herd

programme.title: Robot Apocalypse
programme.desc: When expert hacker Tara tries to stop a powerful, sentient A.I. as it takes over the world's military, the A.I. marks her as a terrorist.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Heroes and Heartbreak
programme.desc: Augur is recruited by a Taelon weapons project, but the others are worried about his involvement. When the project is launched earlier than originally planned to fight a Jiridian fleet, the Earth is in danger.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Message in a Bottle
programme.desc: A Jiridian probe headed for Earth is shot down by the Taelon Embassy and crashes outside of D.C. Liam recovers the probe, but he, Augur, and Julia are captured by another underground resistance movement led by the real Colonel Liam Kincaid.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Crossfire
programme.desc: As the election draws near, Liam believes Zo'or is trying to have Jonathan Doors murdered. The Resistance worries that an attack is imminent at the final debate. Julia mobilizes a group to protect Doors against Liam's wishes.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Crackdown
programme.desc: An unknown woman saves Augur and Liam from the raids on the Resistance. Lili sabotages the mother ship, but Zo'or stops its total destruction. Lili is reportedly dead. The investigation on the President's shooter continues.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Vanished
programme.desc: Some who were detained during the Resistance sweep have not reappeared after their release. Lili is taken to a lab run by Sandoval and implanted. Renee tries to help Liam find the missing people.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Emancipation
programme.desc: A group posing as volunteers attacks using a stolen skrill prototype that does not require an implant to control. It is discovered that the skrill queen is also missing. The investigation leads to a resistance group called Black Wednesday.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Déjà Vu
programme.desc: A joint Doors International/Taelon venture creates a machine that allows people to vividly relive a memory, but Liam suspects a back alley version of the device is leading to the death of some users.

channel.desc: Explore the farthest reaches of space, battle evil robots, and travel through time on Pluto TV Sci-Fi, the mothership for the best science fiction and fantasy movies in the galaxy, beaming up to you 24 hours a day.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: A sun-bleached red Vauxhall Astra GTE gives the team a serious headache. In addition, they also buy an old French moped and catch up on the restoration of a barn find Mini Cooper S.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The team gamble on restoring a Vanden Plas saloon from the 1970s and a child's tricycle from the 1960s. Plus, catch up on the restoration of a rare Sunbeam Lotus.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: Derek encourages the team to buy a Francis Barnett Plover at auction. Plus, the wheels come off the restoration of an MG Metro.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: Derek thinks a 29,000-mile Ford Capri should be kept original. Plus, a Hercules women's racing bike from the '50s.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash: Restoring Classics

programme.title: Eddie Eats America

programme.desc: The Staten Island spouses return. Renee receives a letter from Junior and fears she and AJ are being targeted, and Drita and Big Ang attempt to settle an on-going feud.

programme.desc: Joe's newest girlfriend is introduced to Carla, and the duo explain their serious relationship. Drita is unsure whether to take her kids to visit their father in prison.

programme.title: Mob Wives: Threats And Thongs
programme.desc: Renee is in shock after she opens a malicious letter from Junior. Ramona is scared about her boy-friend's upcoming court appearance.

programme.title: Mob Wives: Of Vice And Men
programme.desc: Drita decides that it's time to go visit Lee in prison with their daughters. Carla goes on with her life while Joe is preparing to terminate his marriage with Carla.

programme.title: Mob Wives: The Gathering Storm
programme.desc: Ramona is forced to finally confront Drita over a birthday party invitation. Renee tries to turn a corner at rehab but has a hard time letting go of her anger.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: Following the investigation that reveals the predator responsible for numerous sexual assaults.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: Covering the 38-year investigation into Jeannie Moore's murder.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.sub-title: The Perplexing Case of Kay Mortensen
programme.desc: The story of the senseless murder of Kay Mortensen and the unusual investigation that followed.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: The story of the brutal and senseless murder of Sandra Rozzo. Attempting to understand how and why she died, and how determined police work and forensic science eventually crack the case.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: Kristen Swanson was murdered in 1980 however the suspect was not found. Eventually following a 30 year investigation into her death revolutionary DNA techniques allowed the police track down her killer and bring him to justice.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: Attacking in broad daylight, the `M25 Rapist' became synonymous with fear and triggered one of the biggest manhunts in British history. All the police had to go on was a trace.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: Digital forensics, traditional police work and a good old fashioned stake out stop a killer in his tracks, when all he's left is a digital trace.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: Just as Baton Rouge starts to feel safe they discover a second serial killer is at work. However, when he leaves a trace at a scene, and the police find it, they get an unexpected breakthrough.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.sub-title: Mystery of the Dispersed Body Parts
programme.desc: When a box containing human limbs was discovered in Florida, an investigation started that tested forensic capabilities, with detectives desperate to discover who the victim was.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: The story of a sadistic crime and how investigators brought the merciless attacker to justice.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: The investigation into the brutal murder of Shelby Weatherly, and how the police caught her killer.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: The investigation to catch a serial rapist and how advanced DNA technology finally tracked him down.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: The story of a double-homicide and how dedicated police work, alongside forensics, solved the case.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: How investigators uncovered what happened in the moments leading up to the death of Jchandra Brown.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: The death of an innocent mother and how detectives identified her killer and proved his guilt.

channel.desc: The series relives some landmark criminal cases of recent times where these new and innovative investigative techniques have changed the course of the investigations and dramatically assisted detectives in bringing the guilty to justice.

programme.title: South Park: Free Willzyx
programme.desc: Free Willzyx: The boys are tricked into believing the killer whale at Sea Park is from the moon. How will Timmy's wheelchair, the Russian government and their skateboards help to free him? (S9, E13)

programme.title: South Park: Bloody Mary
programme.desc: Bloody Mary: Randy is arrested for drunk driving and must attend AA, where he is told he is powerless to control himself. Maybe the bleeding Virgin Mary statue can perform a miracle or two? (S9, E14)

programme.title: South Park: The Return of Chef
programme.desc: The Return of Chef: The boys notice that Chef is acting weird after returning from the 'The Super Adventure Club'. Why is he trying to seduce them? Can a trip to a strip joint help? (S10, E01)

programme.title: South Park: Smug Alert!
programme.desc: Smug Alert: Kyle's father buys a new hybrid car but it's not long before his smug levels reach ridiculous levels - must be time to move to San Fran! How will Cartman deal with no Kyle? (S10, E02)

programme.title: South Park: A Million Little Fibers
programme.desc: A Million Little Fibers: Towlie writes his memoirs and it's not long before he's invited onto The Oprah Winfrey Show. (S10, E05)

programme.title: South Park: ManBearPig
programme.desc: ManBearPig: Ex U.S. Vice President Al Gore visits South Park Elementary and warns the pupils about ManBearPig, a monster which is "half man, half bear and half pig" - you can't be "cereal"! (S10, E06)

programme.title: South Park: Tsst!
programme.desc: Tsst: Cartman's mum realizes she can no longer control him, so attempts to get help from various reality TV experts. Only when she recruits the "Dog Whisperer" do results start to happen. (S10, E07)

programme.title: South Park: Make Love, Not Warcraft
programme.desc: Make Love, Not Warcraft: The boys are all shades of mad when a 'griefer' repeatedly kills them in an online game. Some serious training is in order so they can defeat him and play the game! (S10, E08)

programme.title: South Park: Mystery of the Urinal Deuce
programme.desc: Mystery of The Urinal Deuce: Someone defecates in a urinal at school! Cartman rants that it's a conspiracy "like 9/11!" The entire town think so too! Time for a trip to the White House. (S10, E09)

programme.title: South Park: Miss Teacher Bangs a Boy
programme.desc: Miss Teacher Bangs A Boy: Power goes to Cartman's head when he becomes "Dawg the Hallway Monitor". Meanwhile, Kyle is shocked to discover his little brother Ike and his teacher are at "it"! (S10, E10)

programme.title: South Park: Hell on Earth 2006
programme.desc: Hell On Earth 2006: Satan has a Sweet 16 style party in L.A. on Halloween! The gang perform a ritual and manage to summon Biggie Smalls - who demands Butters helps him get to the party! (S10, E11)

programme.title: South Park: Go God Go (Part 1)
programme.desc: Go God Go (1): Cartman is impatient to get his hands on the latest games console. Result? A visit to the atheistic future of 2546! Richard Dawkins pays a visit to South Park Elementary. (S10, E12)

programme.title: South Park: Go God Go XII (Part 2)
programme.desc: Go God Go XII (2): Cartman is stuck in the future, caught up in a battle between atheists and sea otters! And what will become of Richard Dawkins and Mrs. Garrison's love affair? (S10, E13)

programme.title: South Park: Stanley's Cup
programme.desc: Stanley's Cup: In a parody of underdog sports films, Stan is sentenced to community service and ends up coaching the Park County Pee-Wee hockey team - can he turn these losers into winners? (S10, E14)

programme.title: South Park: With Apologies to Jesse Jackson
programme.desc: With Apologies to Jessie Jackson: Randy faces public ridicule for using the "N" word on live TV. Cartman can't resist teasing a little person who comes to school to teach about prejudice. (S11, E01)

programme.title: South Park: Cartman Sucks
programme.desc: Cartman Sucks: After being caught in a compromising position with Eric, Butters is sent to a special camp to "Pray the Gay Away". Cartman tries to retrieve the incriminating photo. (S11, E02)

programme.title: South Park: Lice Capades
programme.desc: Lice Capades: Eric tries to discover the source of an outbreak of lice at the school. The lice are living peacefully in a village until they see the school nurse staring at them! (S11, E03)

programme.title: South Park: The Snuke
programme.desc: The Snuke: The citizens of South Park are gearing up for the arrival of Hillary Clinton. Eric suspects that a new student is planning a terrorist attack but the real culprits are deadlier. (S11, E04)

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Former holiday camp bluecoats enter the competition with their `launcher' Apollo. Father and-son-team Kan-Opener have a robot with huge piercing claws. A team of engineering students have created a future tech machine called Sweeney Todd.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Featuring one of the most bizarre, but certainly the tallest robot ever seen on `Robot Wars', Gabriel, built by Mensa member Craig and his three sons. It has wheels as tall as a washing machine and a huge samurai sword.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Winner robots from rounds one through five battle it out in the arena, a wild card from the runners up throws a spanner in the works as it tries to overthrow attempts at glory.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: A new spinner has something to prove and a family team pour blood, sweat and tears into keeping their robot wars dream alive. The robots compete through brutal group battles and fierce head to heads for a place in the heat final.

programme.title: Robot Wars: Revealed
programme.desc: Using competitors own video diaries, exclusive action from the pits and the best of the battles, Philippa Forrester will get down to the nuts and bolts of `Robot Wars: The Second Wars'.

programme.title: Robot Wars: Extreme
programme.desc: Craig Charles and Philippa Forrester oversee the mechanical mayhem. Jonathan Pearce supplies his inimitable brand of commentary and in-depth analysis.

programme.title: Robot Wars: Revealed
programme.desc: Featuring behind-the-scenes footage of Heat C of `Robot Wars: The Second Wars', including video diaries of the Dreadnaut and Oblivion teams preparing their robots competitors for the main competition.

programme.title: Robot Wars: Revealed
programme.desc: presented behind-the-scenes footage of Heat D of Robot Wars: The Second Wars, including video diaries of the Razer, Bodyhammer and Elvis teams preparing their robots for the main competition.

programme.title: Robot Wars: Revealed
programme.desc: Behind-the-scenes footage of Heat E of Robot Wars: The Second Wars, including video diaries of the Technophobic and Killertron teams preparing their robots for the main competition.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The teams are Donald Thump, Behemoth, Sabretooth, Apollo, Apocalypse and The Swarm. Along the way they must dodge arena hazards, menacing house robots and the all-new Fog of War.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Returning champions Carbide mount their title defence against some of the toughest machines in the competition. They will have to fight through brutal group battles and nightmarish knockout rounds to make it to the heat final.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: In the eliminating rounds, Tornado takes on Storm 2, and X-Terminator challenges Typhoon 2, in a fierce attack that takes out the disc weapon of Typhoon 2.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Six robots fight until one is taken down. The remaining fighters regroup and continue until only one remains. Round one begins in a merciless fashion as Ripper flips Robochicken.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Challengers from more than five main competitions battle for supremacy. In a David versus Goliath battle, Dantomkia takes on the might of Behemoth in an attempt to throw it out of the arena.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Eight teams made up of families and friends from across the country put their homemade robots to the test inside a purpose-built arena, packed with arena hazards and four House Robots. The winner at the end will go forward to the grand-final.

channel.desc: Mech+ is the home of Robot Wars, remastered in HD for the first time! Mech+ features every series of Robot Wars UK, both classics and the revival seasons, and also includes never before seen episodes considered ‘lost media’.

programme.title: A Haunting: The Uninvited
programme.desc: Meriden, Connecticut natives Lynn and Jason Ryder purchase a historic restaurant, thinking it will be an adventure to operate an establishment so much a part of their youth. Little do they know their experience is about to turn into their worst nightmare.

programme.title: A Haunting: House of the Dead
programme.desc: Unseen intruders attack 10-year-old Billy Bean. He struggles to learn the secrets of the house.

programme.title: A Haunting: Demon Whispers
programme.desc: When Phil Pritchard’s beloved father dies, he falls into a deep depression that renders him vulnerable to an unearthly evil that begins influencing him and will stop at nothing to render him a pawn in its relentless thirst for misery and murder.

programme.title: A Haunting: Curse Of The Mummy
programme.desc: On a visit to an exhibit of ancient Egyptian artifacts, Caleb Weaver experiences a chilling encounter with an unwrapped mummy and unleashes the wrath of a vile beast. Now stronger and more furious than ever, it seeks to possess Caleb.

programme.title: A Haunting: Legend Trippers
programme.desc: High school classmates test out an old ghost story on Halloween night.

programme.title: A Haunting: Conjuring Evil
programme.desc: Harold and Cindy have found the perfect retreat in suburban Alaska for their family. But after their daughter begins to experiment in witchcraft, she unknowingly attracts the attention of a dark entity. Harold calls in experts to help reclaim the home.

programme.title: A Haunting: The Haunting of Summerwind
programme.desc: Ginger moves her family into an old mansion. A supernatural presence torments her husband.

programme.title: A Haunting: The Possessed
programme.desc: Mary Vogel, a spiritual counselor for ten years, has a run in with a demonic force.

programme.title: A Haunting: The Shadowman
programme.desc: Tim Yancey and his older brother Tom love playing in the woods surrounding their Florida home. One afternoon Tom senses a presence watching him from among the shadows. Days later, the same entity confronts Tim and chases him through the woods.

programme.title: A Haunting: The Haunting Of Allen House
programme.desc: Professor Mark Spencer and his wife Rebecca have just purchased the historic Allen House in Arkansas. Shortly after moving in, Rebecca comes face to face with a faceless spirit. Mark calls investigators to determine if the spirit means them harm.

programme.title: A Haunting: Echoes of the Past
programme.desc: The Johnson’s young daughter reveals that two fairies visit her room each night.

programme.title: A Haunting: Living Nightmare
programme.desc: Angela, a newlywed, is excited to start her new life with Stephen when nightmares that she experienced as a child suddenly resurface. Soon the menacing old hag from her dreams terrorizes her daughter and takes temporary possession of her son.

programme.title: A Haunting: Darkness Follows
programme.desc: A girl commits suicide and her spirit haunts the new tenants.

programme.title: A Haunting: The Presence
programme.desc: Sarah Miller believes that something supernatural in her home is terrorizing her children.

programme.title: A Haunting: Love Curse
programme.desc: When Lee and his new bride Claire settle into their first home, an evil entity emerges and attacks Claire while she's carrying the couple's unborn baby. A ghost hunter determines the dark spirit is a demon and brings in demonologists to cleanse the home.

channel.desc: The terrifying 'true' stories of the paranormal told by the people who experienced them. Watch, as the mystery and origin of each haunting unravels. By the end, you will be left with the sense that life and death are far stranger than you ever imagined.

programme.title: Medium: The Darkness is Light Enough
programme.desc: Allison tries to help a woman prove that she is being secretly watched at night.

programme.title: Medium: Death Takes a Policy
programme.desc: Allison fears that her time is up when the Angel of Death keeps revealing himself to her.

programme.title: Medium: Twice Upon a Time
programme.desc: Allison discovers how different her life would have been if she had not married Joe.

programme.title: Medium: Be Kind, Rewind
programme.desc: Allison relives the same horrific day over and over again in her dreams.

programme.title: Medium: Ghost In The Machine
programme.desc: Allison uncovers clues to a mysterious homicide through the lens of a videocamera.

programme.title: Medium: Blood Relation
programme.desc: Allison fears that Dr. Charles Walker a psychotic killer from the 1800s is back.

programme.title: Medium: Four Dreams (Part 1)
programme.desc: When a series of brutal home invasions hit the Phoenix area, Allison hopes the dreams she and Bridgette are having will help end the executions of innocent families.

programme.title: Medium: Four Dreams (Part 2)
programme.desc: When a series of brutal home invasions hit the Phoenix area, Allison hopes the dreams she and Bridgette are having will help end the executions of innocent families.

programme.title: Medium: Profilers In Terror
programme.desc: When a young woman is found dead in a park Allison believes she may have been another victim of the notorious Suitcase Killer.

programme.title: Medium: The Whole Truth
programme.desc: When a prominent Arizona citizen is found dead by his wife, Allison is suspicious that he was murdered.

programme.title: Medium: Mother's Little Helper
programme.desc: Allison and Ariel are starting to have dreams about a crime. They are dreaming about it from different perspectives, which reveals two suspects.

programme.title: Medium: Better Off Dead
programme.desc: Allison's attempts to help two ghosts who've bonded over their respective murders are somewhat hampered by one who's left a sizable inheritance to a woman he barely knew.

programme.title: Medium: Very Merry Maggie
programme.desc: Allison becomes spooked by a young boy's doll.

programme.title: Medium: Apocalypse, Push
programme.desc: Arliss Howard reprises his role as Texas Ranger, Captain Kenneth Push, who returns to Allison's life when he experiences unnerving visions about a Phoenix-based slaying. Meanwhile, Joe tells a little white lie---and suffers the consequences.

programme.title: Medium: Second Opinion
programme.desc: After a dream, Allison faces a horrible question – What would you do if you learned that your 2-year-old daughter was going to die of leukemia in 20 years?

programme.title: Medium: The One Behind The Wheel
